raidersofscythia.description_text:
Many centuries ago, the Greek, Persian and Assyrian empires controlled vast amounts of land and riches. Yet, despite their fortifications and imposing armies, rumours began spreading of a formidable foe in the lands above the Black Sea. They came on horseback. Fierce warriors, both male and female. Skilled with the sword, axe and bow. But they weren’t mindless savages. Their artisans were renowned for their ability to craft detailed trinkets of gold. They fashioned leather armour and improvised the recurve bow. They trained eagles for hunting and war. Some even believe they inspired the Greek tales of the Amazons. But they were more than legend or fable. They were the Raiders of Scythia.

The aim of Raiders of Scythia is to be the player with the most Victory Points (VP) at the game’s end. VP are gained by raiding Settlements, taking Plunder and completing Quests. Players will need to assemble a Crew, train Animals and gather Provisions. The game ends when there are only 2 unraided Settlements or 2 Quests remaining on the Main Board.

Features:

  • Play as one of eight Scythian Heroes each with their own unique player power. 
  • Play against up to 3 friends or against the rival Scythian Chieftain in a highly intuitive Solo Mode. 
  • Builds on the award-winning game play of Raiders of the North Sea
  • Adds eagles and horses to customize your crew with special abilities, strength and VP bonuses.
  • Designed for 1-4 Raiders ages 12+ to explore in 60 min. 

Contents:

  • 1 Main Board
  • 4 Player Boards
  • 26 Quests
  • 136 Cards
  • 1 Plunder Bag
  • 80 Plunder Tokens
  • 32 Wounds
  • 32 Kumis
  • 32 Provisions
  • 31 Workers
  • 6 Dice
  • 4 Score Markers
  • 32 Silver
  • 1 Illustrated Rulebook

inventorsofthesouthtigress.description_text:
Inventors of the South Tigris is set during the height of the Abbasid Caliphate, circa 850 AD. Over the past decades, Baghdad has become home to thousands of mathematicians, astronomers, chemists, and physicians. As inspired innovators, players are eager to develop clever contraptions to impress their peers. Will your ingenious devices adorn the House of Wisdom, or are they destined for dust and decay?

The aim of Inventors of the South Tigris is to be the player with the most Victory Points (VP) at the game’s end. Points are primarily gained by Inventing, Building, Testing, and Publishing Devices. Players can also score points by training their Craftspeople, developing their Workshops, Researching, and Influencing the 3 scientific Guilds.

Features

  • New stand-alone game in the South Tigris trilogy!
  • Clever dice mechanisms whereby players can customize their pool of dice throughout the game.
  • An innovative resource management system where players upskill their craftspeople as they build and publish their various devices.
  • The huge variability, strategic depth, and multiple paths to victory make the game massively replayable.
  • Packed with plenty of positive player interactions thanks to the shared infrastructure, and many off-turn benefits.
  • Intuitive and easy to use solo mode.

Contents Summary

  • 13 Workers
  • 4 Royalties Markers
  • 102 Influence
  • 16 Tents
  • 120 Dice
  • 4 Ships
  • 24 Craftspeople
  • 1 First Player Marker
  • 4 Tent Tiles
  • 8 Pass Tiles
  • 20 Tower Tiles
  • 27 Invention Tiles
  • 27 Research Tiles
  • 42 Workshop Tiles
  • 6 Starting Workshop Tiles
  • 8 Camel Tiles
  • 3 Dummy Tokens
  • 50 Silver
  • 44 Device Cards
  • 6 Setup Cards
  • 4 Player Aids
  • 1 Reference Card
  • 15 Scheme Cards
  • 6 Dummy Cards
  • 1 Score Pad
  • 18 Device Boards
  • 4 Player Boards
  • 1 Main Board
  • 1 Rulebook

At a Glance:

  • Number of Players: 1-4
  • For Ages: 12+
  • Playing Time: 90-120 min
  • Game Type: Strategy Euro Game

viscountsofthewestkingdom.description_text:
Viscounts of the West Kingdom is set at a time when the King’s reign began to decline, circa 980 AD. Choosing peace over prosperity, our once strong King began offering our enemies gold and land to lay down their axes. But peace is a tenuous affair. As poverty spread, many people lost faith in his ability to lead and sought independence from the crown. Since finding favor in his courts, our future has also become uncertain. As viscounts, we must be wise and decisive. Loyalty is to be upheld, but gaining favor among the people must be our priority, should there be a sudden shift in power.

The aim of Viscounts of the West Kingdom is to be the player with the most victory points (VP) at game's end. Points are gained by constructing buildings, writing manuscripts, working in the castle and acquiring deeds for new land. Players begin with a handful of townsfolk, but should quickly seek out more suitable talents to advance their endeavors. Each turn they will be travelling around the kingdom, looking to increase their influence among the various areas of society. The game ends once the Kingdom reaches poverty or prosperity or potentially both!

Features:

  • As the King’s reign comes to an end, seek the favor of the townsfolk.
  • Construct buildings, write manuscripts, work in the castle, and acquire deeds for new land.
  • Increase your influence while traveling throughout the kingdom.
  • Viscounts of the West Kingdom is the third game in the West Kingdom Trilogy.
  • Designed for 1-4 players, ages 12+, to enjoy in 60-90 minutes.

Components:

  • 4 Corruption Markers

  • 4 Virtue Markers

  • 50 Silver

  • 80 Workers (20 per color)

  • 4 Viscounts (1 per color)

  • 12 Guildhalls (3 per color)

  • 12 Trading Posts (3 per color)

  • 12 Workshops (3 per color)

  • 24 Ink Wells

  • 24 Gold

  • 24 Stone

  • 35 Manuscripts

  • 1 Castle

  • 1 Start Player Marker

  • 4 Player Boards

  • 5 Main Board Segments

  • 68 Neutral Townsfolk Cards

  • 10 Hero Townsfolk Cards

  • 32 Starting Townsfolk Cards

  • 4 Cleric Bonus Cards

  • 1 Castle Leader Card

  • 1 Poverty Card

  • 1 Prosperity Card

  • 10 Player Cards

  • 4 Multiplier Cards

  • 30 Debt Cards

  • 30 Deed Cards

  • 8 Starting Scheme Cards

  • 8 Future Scheme Cards

  • 1 AI Reference Card

paladinsofthewestkingdomcityofcrowns.human_name: Paladins of the West Kingdom City of Crowns
paladinsofthewestkingdomcityofcrowns.description_text:
Increase Your Skills in Diplomacy and Rally Support!

In Paladins of the West Kingdom: City of Crowns, noble allies have responded to the recent attacks against our borders. Only through careful negotiation and diplomacy will these dukes, barons, counts and margraves offer the aid we so desperately need. Will you be able to muster enough support to once again defend this great city, or will you crumble beneath the weight of indecision and apathy?

Download the rulebook here.

Features:

  • Muster support to defend the city!
  • Negotiate with Dukes, Barons, Counts and Margraves to gain aid!
  • Manage the new Diplomacy attribute to request help from noble allies.
  • Includes new Townsfolk, Outsiders, Paladins, King's Orders and King's Favors.
  • Updated rules for more challenging solo play!
  • Enjoy with 1-4 Players, ages 12+, in 90-120 minutes.

circadiansspeclaiistspack.description_text:
An Expansion for the popular Circadians: First Light. A competitive, confrontational area control game with highly asymmetric Factions.

The days on Ryh are longer than those on Earth. Yet somehow it was still 33 rotations before we encountered the Oxataya - another 12 before we met any Ahzuri. So far our negotiations have gone well. Oxataya are an ancient water-dwelling clan, full of wisdom, knowledge and insight. Ahzuri are an ascetic mountain tribe of which we still know very little. We have learnt a lot from Oxataya, and their temples, but there is still much to discover. Our new research outposts and specialists have shown great promise so far. Still, only time will tell.

Features:

  • New Specialist Dice and Outposts for powerful actions and added versatility when assigning Dice;
  • 2 additional Factions to Negotiate with - Oxataya and Ahzuri;
  • 12 new Leader Cards, each their own unique and game-changing ability
  • 26 new Contract Cards (added to the original 36 in the base game), for even more strategies and combos to discover;
  • More Farm Tiles, Ship Tiles, and Event Cards;
  • Additional rules and components for the already highly praised solo mode.

chaosorderharbingersexpansion.description_text: An Expansion for the popular Circadians: Chaos Order.  A competitive, confrontational area control game with highly asymmetric Factions. Each Faction now has 2 new Leaders to choose from. After deploying their starting Leader during setup, they must select 2 of their other Leaders, and return them to the box. This provides a lot more variability and strategies to discover within each Faction.

circadiansalliespack.description_text:
The Allies Expansion for Circadians: First Light introduces 4 more characters with their own unique abilities. These allies are non-human citizens living aboard Moontide.

The new characters and their abilities are:

  • UL KAH TAL You begin the game with your unique upgrade tile installed in your second garage.
  • SUNARI You begin the game with your unique farm tile installed in your research base.
  • BJORG AND SAL You may use Sal as a 3-valued die at any location, except the Depository and Negotiation Board.
  • ZAPPORAH You may immediately roll and assign any dice gained during the execute phase to your farms.

westkingdomtomesaga.description_text:
Build the kingdom, defend its borders and increase your influence throughout the lands. In the campaign mode, players will be competing in an epic journey to collect the most tomes and earn their place among the chronicles of their people. Alternatively, players may instead band together to take on the ruthless Overlord in separate co-operative modes for each game in the West Kingdom Trilogy.

Features:

  • Build the kingdom, defend its borders and increase your influence throughout the lands.

  • Play through all three games in the series using campaign mode!

  • Band together to defeat the Overlord in Co-op mode for each of the games in the series!

architectsofthewestkingdomworksofwonder.human_name: Architects of the West Kingdom Works of Wonder
architectsofthewestkingdomworksofwonder.description_text:
Construct glorious buildings and choose your path to victory!

In Architects of the West Kingdom: Works of Wonder, builders from far and wide have travelled to partake in the King’s latest endeavour - five glorious monuments to beautify the city. However, not just any architect can be entrusted with such a task. Only those of influence and charitable reputation shall receive this great honour. Will you accompany the Princess as she surveys the projects, or rally support from the elusive Profiteer?

Architects of the West Kingdom: Works of Wonder is and expansion. Architects of the West Kingdom is required to play.

Features:

  • Travel to partake in the King’s latest endeavour!
  • Work towards building five glorious monuments to beautify the city!
  • Adds 6 new unique Player Boards!
  • Dynamic main board as the Princess, Profiteer and Wonders enter play!
  • Includes an entirely new solo mode with 6 unique opponents!
  • Enjoy with 1-5 Players, ages 12+, in 60-80 minutes.

explorersofthenorthsearocksofruin.human_name: Explorers of the North Sea Rocks of Ruin
explorersofthenorthsearocksofruin.description_text:
Features:

  • New ways to play Explorers of the North Sea!

  • Use Battering Rams to Raid Fortresses!

  • Includes mini expansion for The North Sea Runesaga!

  • Add a 5

    th

     player to your game!

  • Expansion for 2-5 players, ages 12 and up.

raidersofnorthseafieldsoffame.human_name: Raiders of North Sea Fields of Fame
raidersofnorthseafieldsoffame.description_text:
Features:

  • Components for an extra player

  • Township Board with 3 new raids

  • Jarls bring new strategies and more ways to score Victory Points

  • Crew Members can take wounds in battle, weakening players' crews

  • Players collect Fame in battle, worth Victory Points at the game's end

basic_data.human_name: Humble Video Learning Bundle: The Complete Networking Bundle by Packt
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Building any network comes with risk, from malware to denial-of-service attacks, and knowing how to shield your personal or team data is basically a full-time job. To help you turn your collection of programs into an impenetrable fortress, we’ve partnered with Packt to bring you the complete bundle of networking and cybersecurity courses for an unbelievably low price. Think of this bundle of guides and video courses as the ultimate boot camp, with topics ranging from exam training for CCNA, CCST, and ENCOR, information on building advanced network topologies, and crash courses on Azure and GitHub. Everything in this bundle comes straight from the experts, so act now to get it all at the price of your choosing, and support women and children in poverty with Lotus Outreach International.

ciscoccstnetworking_videotrainingseries.human_name: Cisco CCST Networking - Video Training Series
ciscoccstnetworking_videotrainingseries.description_text:
This course is meticulously designed to help you succeed in the Cisco CCST Networking certification exam. You'll begin by exploring fundamental networking concepts such as network topologies, classifications, and performance metrics. From there, you'll dive deeper into the essential networking models and protocols, mastering the OSI and TCP/IP models, along with protocols at each layer of the stack. This foundation will prepare you for real-world scenarios and networking environments.

The course then moves on to advanced topics like IPv4 and IPv6 addressing, subnetting, and traffic flows, providing in-depth practice exercises to cement your understanding. You’ll also explore cloud computing models and how networks operate in cloud environments. By gaining a strong grasp of physical and wireless network infrastructures, you'll be well-equipped to handle modern networking systems, from basic cable types to wireless access points and IoT connectivity.

Finally, this course covers Cisco-specific content such as Cisco IOS, diagnostic tools like Wireshark, and best practices for securing networks from common threats. With step-by-step guidance on preparing for the exam, including study strategies and what to expect on test day, this course ensures you're ready to succeed.

comptianetworkpluscertificationn10-009_t.human_name: CompTIA Network+ Certification (N10-009): The Total Course
comptianetworkpluscertificationn10-009_t.description_text:
Begin with a clear overview of the CompTIA Network+ (N10-009) exam, its value, and career benefits. Progress through core networking topics like the OSI and TCP/IP models, Ethernet, and IP addressing, then build practical skills with structured cabling, standards, and real-world hardware setups.nnAdvance into routing, switching, wireless, and WAN technologies with topics like NAT, DHCP, VLANs, BGP, OSPF, and IPv6. Real-world scenarios reinforce theory, while hands-on segments teach you how to secure networks using encryption, access control, and layered defense strategies. You’ll also work with tools like Wireshark and netstat, and understand key protocols such as DNS, NTP, and FTP.

The course concludes with cloud computing, virtualization, and IoT, plus enterprise-level operations and security. You’ll cover configuration management, wireless networks, disaster recovery, and system hardening. Designed for beginners and pros alike, this is a career-focused training solution built to help you pass the exam and grow in IT.

developers.developer-name: Total Seminars, Joe Ramm, Lyndon Williams

clcor350-801v12videotrainingseries.description_text:
This course is your ultimate preparation for the CLCOR (350-801) exam. The course begins by introducing the fundamentals of Cisco collaboration technologies, covering traditional telephony networks and the evolution to IP-based solutions. You will dive into core Cisco components like Unified Communications Manager (CUCM), Cisco Unity Connection, and Cisco IP phones, gaining a deep understanding of how these technologies integrate into enterprise environments.

As you progress, the course covers key elements of collaboration design, such as software licensing, redundancy, disaster recovery, and security measures. You’ll also explore call control concepts, SIP endpoints, and essential protocols like CDP, DHCP, and LDAP. This holistic approach ensures you're equipped to design, configure, and maintain Cisco collaboration solutions tailored to enterprise needs.

The final sections of the course focus on advanced configurations and best practices, such as Quality of Service (QoS) implementation and media resource management. By the end of this course, you’ll not only be ready for the CLCOR (350-801) exam but also capable of handling real-world collaboration challenges. Whether you're installing CUCM or managing Webex services, this course prepares you for success in a fast-paced IT environment.

comptiacloudpluscertificationcv0-003exam.human_name: CompTIA Cloud+ Certification (CV0-003) Exam Prep Course
comptiacloudpluscertificationcv0-003exam.description_text:
Elevate your IT expertise to the cloud with this course. Instructor Tom Carpenter transforms complex cloud concepts into an approachable learning experience. It not only prepares you for the CompTIA Cloud+ Certification but immerses you in the world of cloud architecture, security, and services with lectures that align with real-world applications.

Delve into deployment models, storage solutions, network configurations, and vital security protocols. Through interactive labs and practical demos, you'll master resource management, data migration, and disaster recovery planning, all underpinned by robust security practices. Advance your problem-solving skills with sections dedicated to troubleshooting, ensuring high availability, and implementing automated patch management.

By the end of your journey, you'll be ready to tackle Cloud+ exam domains with confidence, from architectural design to operations and support. This course isn't just about passing an exam; it's about giving you the tools to bring cloud solutions to life, paving your way to roles like Cloud Systems Administrator and Cloud Solution Architect. All the supplementary materials required for this course are available on GitHub and the link is added in the video description.

enarsi300-410v11videotrainingseries.description_text:
This course is designed to provide an in-depth understanding of Cisco ENARSI (300-410) concepts, essential for configuring and troubleshooting advanced network infrastructures. It begins with foundational lessons on route redistribution and Layer 3 technologies, preparing you for the more complex topics like mutual route redistribution and IPv6 configuration. Each video lesson in the course includes lab exercises to solidify theoretical knowledge through hands-on practice.

As the course progresses, you will dive deeper into critical protocols like EIGRP, OSPF, and BGP. You'll learn advanced troubleshooting techniques to resolve common issues within enterprise networks. Special attention is given to understanding how routing decisions are influenced by metrics, timers, and protocol-specific settings, helping you build a solid foundation in troubleshooting and optimization strategies.

Towards the end of the course, the focus shifts to advanced VPN technologies, network security measures, and Cisco DNA Center, providing you with the tools to manage and secure modern network environments. Whether you’re preparing for the Cisco certification exam or seeking to enhance your networking skills, this course will guide you through every step, ensuring you’re confident in your abilities to handle real-world scenarios.

lotusoutreach.description_text:
Donations to support Lotus Outreach are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The mission of nonprofit Lotus Outreach is to empower vulnerable women and children living in poverty. With affiliates in seven countries and local NGO partners in India and Cambodia, LO is a global community that believes empowerment is the heart of sustainable change.

comptianetworkplusn10-009crashcourse.description_text:
This course is an intensive path to CompTIA Network+ certification, offering a complete dive into essential networking skills. Begin with foundational topics like network types, classifications, and topologies, then move into the OSI model and core protocols crucial for network design and management. Hands-on sessions deepen your understanding of Ethernet, MAC addressing, routers, and VLANs, helping you to develop practical, ready-to-use skills.

As you progress, the course explores IP addressing (IPv4 and IPv6), subnetting, and routing, providing clarity on these often challenging areas. You'll also cover security essentials, including network hardening, access control, and encryption, preparing you for real-world scenarios involving common attacks like DoS and VLAN hopping. This in-depth security training ensures you’re ready to identify and mitigate potential threats effectively.

The course concludes with advanced topics in troubleshooting, monitoring, and disaster recovery, plus a focus on cloud technologies like NFV and VPCs. With exam preparation strategies and practical exercises, you’ll finish with the confidence and skill set needed for the CompTIA Network+ exam and to succeed in your networking career.

ciscopackettracerlabmastery_buildandsecu.human_name: Cisco Packet Tracer Lab Mastery: Build and Secure Advanced Topologies
ciscopackettracerlabmastery_buildandsecu.description_text:
This course takes learners through a complete networking journey using Cisco Packet Tracer. It begins with installation and environment setup before moving into building fully functional redundant networks. Concepts such as VLANs, HSRP, spanning tree, and device-level redundancy form the foundation for understanding high availability.

The path then advances to creating datacenter networks, exploring spine-leaf architecture, VLAN databases, internal gateway redundancy, NAT, DNS, tunnels, and web servers. Following this, you’ll configure complete company networks with OSPF routing, DHCP relay, syslog, NTP, ACLs, and QoS. Security is emphasized in the DMZ section, where you’ll configure firewalls, edge routers, and access lists while testing LAN, DMZ, and internet connectivity.

You’ll also simulate IoT labs with smart homes, offices, and industrial systems, leading into hub-and-spoke WAN topologies and enterprise-grade three-tier switching designs. The journey continues with SOHO networks and culminates in a crash course on Cisco small business devices, covering routers, switches, and wireless. By the end, you’ll have the applied skills to configure, secure, and troubleshoot diverse professional networks.

encor350-401v11videotrainingseries.description_text:
This course is designed to give you comprehensive knowledge of the essential technologies that power modern enterprise networks. From the basics of enterprise architecture to advanced topics like SD-WAN and network virtualization, the course provides in-depth instruction across 40 sections. Each module includes a series of videos that explore the design and implementation considerations for networking technologies, ensuring you are equipped with both theoretical knowledge and practical skills.

As you progress, you'll dive into advanced subjects such as wireless networking, software-defined networking, and quality of service (QoS). The course also covers critical security topics, including access control lists, wireless security protocols, and next-generation firewalls. With a blend of detailed instruction and lab exercises, you will gain hands-on experience configuring key technologies like OSPF, BGP, NAT, and more.nnBy the end of this course, you'll have a clear understanding of the core technologies covered in the ENCOR exam, from infrastructure security to network automation with Cisco DNA Center and vManage. You'll also gain valuable insights into the exam registration process and preparation strategies to help you succeed on exam day.

masteringazurecontainerapps_frombasicsto.human_name: Mastering Azure Container Apps - From Basics to Advanced Deployment
masteringazurecontainerapps_frombasicsto.description_text:
In this course, you will explore the capabilities of Azure Container Apps, starting with basic deployments and advancing to complex techniques. Learn to deploy containers using manual and YAML configurations, forming a strong foundation for further topics. Once comfortable with deployments, you’ll dive into scaling with KEDA to automate app scaling based on real-time demand, alongside securing app secrets with Azure Key Vault.

The course shifts to DevOps practices, where you’ll learn to build and manage CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Azure DevOps. Explore infrastructure as code (IaC) with Bicep and Terraform to automate deployments across environments. Through hands-on labs, you'll master key concepts such as managing storage, configuring custom domains, and using private endpoints to secure applications.nThis course offers in-depth demonstrations and real-world applications, ensuring you not only understand theoretical concepts but also gain the practical skills required to deploy and manage scalable applications on Azure.

ccnacybersecurity200-201_videotrainingse.description_text:
This training series prepares you for the CCNA Cybersecurity (200-201) exam, covering critical concepts like digital defense, threat detection, and incident response. Begin with foundational principles such as the CIA Triad and progress to real-world applications of network, endpoint, and application security. Dive into threat detection techniques, identifying DoS, SQL injection, and social engineering attacks. Learn to analyze network traffic with tools like Wireshark and master protocols for malware detection.

Advanced topics, including SIEM, SOAR, and cloud-based security, ensure you’re ready for modern cybersecurity challenges. The course also covers essential skills for building incident response plans, analyzing logs, and categorizing data protection. As the course progresses, you’ll gain hands-on experience and confidence in handling real-world cybersecurity scenarios.

The series concludes with a comprehensive exam preparation section, providing study strategies, registration tips, and exam-day advice. This detailed, practical training equips you to tackle the CCNA Cybersecurity exam and launch your career in cybersecurity.

tlsandhttpsexplained_visualizationsandlo.human_name: TLS & HTTPS Explained - Visualizations and Localhost Setup in 2025
tlsandhttpsexplained_visualizationsandlo.description_text:
Start your journey by exploring how HTTP works and why HTTPS is critical, with early lessons focusing on capturing and inspecting HTTP and encrypted traffic. You'll build a strong understanding of symmetric and asymmetric encryption, hashing, and modern encryption algorithms using OpenSSL and Wireshark.

Next, you’ll dive into the architecture of TLS and how it works with the Public Key Infrastructure. This section unpacks the TLS handshake, hashing for integrity, digital signatures for authenticity, and how certificates are issued and validated. You’ll even examine TLS 1.3, quantum-ready algorithms, and the hybrid key exchange process.nFinally, you'll bring theory to practice by creating your own HTTPS server using XCA, OpenSSL, and Node. This section guides you through building a local certificate authority, generating server keys, and launching your own secure localhost server. By course end, you’ll fully understand how secure web communication is built, verified, and deployed.

automateyourdevopspipelineswithgithubact.human_name: Automate your DevOps pipelines with GitHub Actions
automateyourdevopspipelineswithgithubact.description_text:
This course begins with the fundamentals of GitHub Actions, guiding you through the creation of your first workflow and how to include inputs. You’ll quickly advance to developing workflows specifically for .NET applications, building pipelines that can deploy to Azure. As you progress, you will gain practical experience in deploying infrastructure using Terraform and Bicep, learning to deploy and manage cloud resources directly from GitHub Actions.

As you move deeper into the course, you’ll explore containerization and deployment, including pushing Docker images to container registries and integrating these steps into GitHub Actions workflows. You'll also dive into Kubernetes/AKS, learning the essentials of CI/CD pipelines for containerized applications, and building, pushing, and deploying images to Kubernetes clusters.

The course also introduces cutting-edge GitHub Actions features like self-hosted runners, reusable workflows, and passwordless workflows using OIDC. It further expands your knowledge with advanced security features, such as GitHub Advanced Security and integrating Microsoft Defender for DevOps. By the end of the course, you will have the expertise to build robust and secure DevOps pipelines that automate the full software delivery lifecycle.

worldofcomputernetworkingyourccnastartsh.human_name: The World of Computer Networking. Your CCNA starts here
worldofcomputernetworkingyourccnastartsh.description_text:
Networking is the backbone of modern digital communication, and mastering it is essential for IT professionals. This course introduces you to key concepts, including the OSI and TCP/IP models, protocols, IP addressing, and subnetting. Through hands-on demonstrations, you'll learn to analyze data packets using Wireshark, explore Ethernet, and understand how networks transmit and receive data efficiently.nAs you progress, you'll dive into switching, routing, and network configurations, gaining insights into MAC addresses, network masks, and VLANs. You’ll discover how routers make decisions, examine IPv4 and IPv6 addressing, and explore Network Address Translation (NAT) and the Domain Name System (DNS). Practical examples will reinforce your knowledge, preparing you for real-world networking challenges.

You'll also explore Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), understanding how they enhance security and enable encrypted remote access. By the end of this course, you'll have a solid grasp of networking essentials, positioning yourself for the CCNA certification and beyond. Whether you're a beginner or looking to strengthen your networking fundamentals, this course equips you with the skills to design, troubleshoot, and optimize network infrastructure effectively.

yourultimateguidetoaksinfrastructureandn.human_name: Your Ultimate Guide To AKS Infrastructure And Network
yourultimateguidetoaksinfrastructureandn.description_text:
This course takes you through the AKS lifecycle, from setup to complex network and security configurations. Starting with Kubernetes clusters and deployment objects, you’ll learn to manage workloads with Pods, Deployment objects, and services, ensuring high availability and scalability. You’ll explore public and private cluster architectures, understanding networking nuances and integrating Azure services for enhanced performance and security.

Next, we delve into AKS networking, covering network-isolated clusters, Azure CNI, and Kubenet. You’ll also explore AKS-specific features like private DNS resolution, ingress controllers for traffic management, and managing secrets with Azure Key Vault and the Secret Store CSI. The hands-on demos cover practical scenarios like managing outbound traffic, scaling clusters, using Bastion for secure access, and applying advanced networking solutions like Calico for network policy enforcement.

Finally, the course concludes by exploring the future of AKS with its cost analysis, automatic scaling, and integration with Azure Container Registry (ACR) for secure deployments. By the end of this course, you’ll have gained the skills to confidently deploy, secure, and manage AKS clusters, making you ready for complex production workloads in any organization.

ccstcybersecurityvideotrainingseries.description_text:
This course begins by establishing a solid foundation in cybersecurity essentials, exploring the CIA triad, attack vectors, and threat categories to clarify risks and vulnerabilities. It then examines attacker motivations and techniques, including malware, social engineering, denial-of-service attacks, and IoT weaknesses, providing a comprehensive understanding of today’s cyber threat landscape. Learners gain practical skills to enhance security posture through defense-in-depth, system hardening, multi-factor authentication, and encryption strategies.

The curriculum advances to network security, covering TCP/IP vulnerabilities, cloud security, access control lists, VPNs, and wireless protections to secure diverse infrastructures. It further explores operating system security for Windows, macOS, and Linux, alongside essential network tools, system updates, and log management, enabling learners to maintain robust and secure environments.

The final modules focus on risk management, vulnerability assessment, and incident response, introducing frameworks such as the Cyber Kill Chain and MITRE ATT&CK. The course concludes with targeted exam preparation, empowering professionals to confidently attain certification and apply their expertise to defend against evolving cyber threats effectively.

terraforminaction_buildandmanagecloudinf.human_name: Terraform in Action - Build & Manage Cloud Infrastructure
terraforminaction_buildandmanagecloudinf.description_text:
This comprehensive course takes you step-by-step through Terraform's core concepts, starting with the creation of basic Terraform templates. You'll learn how to use Terraform for managing a wide range of cloud resources, focusing on Azure services like Web Apps, SQL Databases, and more. With practical demos, you'll explore creating templates, deploying applications, and handling variables to tailor your deployments.

As you advance, you'll delve deeper into Terraform's execution plans, state management, and workspace configurations. Learn how Terraform can automate deployments across different environments, streamlining your infrastructure management. The course also covers deploying container services, PaaS offerings, IaaS, and advanced services like Logic Apps and Azure Firewall with Terraform.nBy the end of the course, you will have the confidence and skills to manage cloud infrastructures efficiently using Terraform. Whether deploying single resources or complex multi-environment setups, you’ll walk away with valuable hands-on experience.

infrastructureascodeonazure_practicalbic.human_name: Infrastructure as Code on Azure - Practical Bicep Training for 2025
infrastructureascodeonazure_practicalbic.description_text:
In this course, you'll start by understanding the core principles of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) with Azure Bicep, learning the fundamentals of creating, editing, and deploying Bicep templates. You'll explore various deployment methods, such as using Azure CLI, ARM templates, and Bicep to manage resources in Azure, providing a strong foundation for cloud infrastructure automation.

As you move forward, you'll delve deeper into container app deployments and landings zones, using Bicep to streamline these processes. By the middle of the course, you'll gain hands-on experience converting ARM templates to Bicep, and deploying advanced templates through Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions, automating real-world workflows.

The course culminates with comparisons of Bicep with other Infrastructure as Code tools like Terraform. By the end of the course, you'll have the skills to automate complex Azure deployments, scale container apps, and apply best practices for DevOps pipelines.

ccnav11200-301videotrainingseries.description_text:
This video course offers a thorough guide to mastering networking concepts essential for the Cisco CCNA (200-301) certification. Starting with foundational networking technologies, you'll explore essential components like routers, switches, security appliances, and wireless access points. These lessons build your understanding of network architectures, from WAN topologies to SOHO and cloud models, while also covering network cabling, Ethernet standards, and common troubleshooting methods.

As the course progresses, you’ll dive into detailed lessons on IPv4 and IPv6 addressing, including binary numbering, subnetting, and address assignments. Advanced topics such as static and dynamic routing, OSPF configurations, and VLANs with trunking are covered in depth. These hands-on lessons are designed to give you the technical proficiency needed to work in complex network environments.

Lastly, the course addresses critical modern networking areas such as security and programmability. You’ll learn about access control lists (ACLs), VPNs, and encryption, as well as gain insights into Software Defined Networking (SDN) and network automation tools like Ansible and Terraform, ensuring you are fully prepared for real-world network management and the CCNA exam.

customar-15stylerifle.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 5.4 – 5.6

Elevate your project with this high-quality, game-ready 3D model of a custom AR-15 assault rifle. Meticulously crafted with a focus on detail and realism, this asset is perfect for first-person shooters, survival games, military simulations, or as a high-detail prop for cinematic renders.

Features:

  • High-quality 4K PBR Textures for stunning, realistic detail.
  • Includes a functional, easy-to-use custom rig for essential animations.
  • Demo is set up with Epic's Animation Starter Pack.
  • Vertex Count: 55,985.
  • LODs are included.

zombie_police.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 5.1 – 5.6

This Zombie Police Officer character is an ideal enemy for any apocalyptic world, designed for high-end visuals and smooth performance. Include this undead enforcer in your project to instantly raise the stakes.

Features:

  • Game-ready with clean topology and optimized for real-time performance.
  • Fully rigged to the UE4 Epic Skeleton (IK bones included) and compatible with standard humanoid animations.
  • High-quality 4K PBR textures for realistic uniform and skin details.
  • Vertex count: 31,006.
  • LODs are included.
  • Perfect for open-world survival games, FPS, and zombie-themed cinematics.
  • No animations are included.

restaurantanddivebar_vol2_bar.human_name: Restaurant and Dive Bar VOL.2 - Bar
restaurantanddivebar_vol2_bar.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.17 - 4.27 and 5.0 - 5.6

This project includes everything pictured with all assets, maps, materials, Blueprints, and effects created in the Unreal Engine. Each asset was created for realistic AAA quality visuals, style, and budget.

Features:

  • 70+ Meshes
  • High quality texture sets - most 2048 pixels +
  • Master material set up that control the majority of all props and models
  • Additional controls for roughness, albedo, normals and more
  • Channel packed Roughness | Metalness | Ambient Occlusion | Emissive
  • Realistic Post Process and Look Up Table
  • Free of all legal issues as all branding and labels are custom made by our studio
  • Fully detailed models from all sides
  • Optional emissive on all illumatable assets
  • Some openable, detachable parts and drawers
  • Less than 61 cents a mesh!

roadbike.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 5.1 – 5.7

Jump in the saddle of these fully rideable motorbikes. This game-ready system features satisfying two-wheeled physics and a curated suite of effects, with streamlined blueprints to bring responsive riding to your scenes in minutes.

Important: Enable Chaos Vehicles and OpenXR Plugins, then restart your editor.

Features:

  • Advanced, multiplayer-replicated riding with Chaos Vehicle Physics.
  • Realistic automatic leaning/banking mechanics and dynamic suspension.
  • Immersive features like functional handlebars, working instrument gauges, and a full lighting system.
  • A complete suite of audio (engine, skids) and particle effects (tire smoke, exhaust).
  • Optimized with a ""Smart Actor"" system for near-zero idle cost and hand-made LODs.

policecar_drivable.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.25 – 4.27 and 5.0 – 5.6

This is a game-ready, fully drivable emergency vehicle system featuring satisfying Chaos physics, a full suite of effects, and powerful, easy-to-use blueprints.

Important: Enable Chaos Vehicles and OpenXR Plugins, then restart your editor.

Features:

  • Advanced, multiplayer-replicated driving with Chaos Vehicle Physics and dynamic suspension.
  • Interactive features: functional lights, sirens, doors, hood, boot, and a detailed interior with working gauges.
  • Full suite of SFX (engine, tires) and VFX (tire smoke, skid marks).
  • Highly optimized with a ""Smart Actor"" system for near-zero idle cost and hand-made LODs.
  • Deeply customizable with ~100 exposed parameters, including number plates.
  • Destructible components like windows and mirrors.

oldindustrialcityandshipyardandindustria.human_name: Old Industrial City and Shipyard & Industrial Interiors
oldindustrialcityandshipyardandindustria.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.20 - 4.27 and 5.0 - 5.6

Old Industrial Town made by Freshcan 3D team with Shipyard Pack includes various high quality industrial assets allowing users to create industrial era industrial shipyard environments, industrial warfare scenes , steampunk levels.

Features:

  • Includes assets for slum houses, factories, vessels, and shipyard construction.
  • Factories with interior structures, many of which are pre-decorated with props.
  • A wide variety of props relevant to an industrial era shipyard environment.
  • 1 Old Shipyard Map and 1 Overview Map.
  • 23 easily modifiable Blueprint Factory Buildings.
  • 12 Decals (Door Numbers, Signs to create a detailed environment).

ambulance_drivable.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.25 – 4.27 and 5.0 – 5.6

This is a game-ready, fully drivable emergency vehicle system featuring satisfying Chaos physics, a full suite of effects, and powerful, easy-to-use blueprints.

Important: Enable Chaos Vehicles and OpenXR Plugins, then restart your editor.

Features:

  • Advanced, multiplayer-replicated driving with Chaos Vehicle Physics and dynamic suspension.
  • Interactive features: functional lights, sirens, doors, hood, boot, and a detailed interior with working gauges.
  • Full suite of SFX (engine, tires) and VFX (tire smoke, skid marks).
  • Highly optimized with a ""Smart Actor"" system for near-zero idle cost and hand-made LODs.
  • Deeply customizable with ~100 exposed parameters, including number plates.
  • Destructible components like windows and mirrors.

forestessentialsforestenvironmentprocedu.human_name: Forest Essentials (Forest Environment, Procedural Mountain Forest, Forest)
forestessentialsforestenvironmentprocedu.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 5.1 - 5.7

Forest Essentials is a comprehensive asset pack for creating realistic and immersive mountain forest environments. Featuring a blend of high-quality forest scans and generated elements, it provides everything needed to build vast landscapes from scratch or enhance existing scenes.

This pack fully supports Nanite in UE5.1+

Features:

  • Includes a detailed 4x4 km² Mountain Forest map.
  • Realistic photogrammetry assets.
  • Procedural foliage and grass for dynamic landscapes.
  • Atmospheric fog planes and materials.
  • 85 unique meshes (trees, plants, mountains, and rocks).
  • Optimized with custom collision, LODs, and billboard LODs for trees.

Note: This version contains the Rigged Skeletal Meshes, Textures, and Materials only. No Blueprint systems are included.

Features:

  • Fully rigged and textures, ready for integration.
  • Hero-quality model suitable for FPS, TPS, or cinematic use.
  • High texel density with multiple material slots for maximum visual fidelity.
  • Comprehensive bone structure for turret, cannon, wheels, suspension, and accessories.
  • Standardized skeleton hierarchy for easy animation retargeting.

girlswhocode.description_text:
Donations to support Girls Who Code are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Girls Who Code, a nonprofit organization, was founded in 2012 to encourage more young women to complete a college-level computer science education and gain skills to further enhance their employability. Mobilizing leading executives, educators, and engineers, Girls Who Code has developed a new model of computer science education designed to inspire, educate, and equip girls of all experience levels and backgrounds with the skills to succeed in the field.

In just three years, Girls Who Code has already begun to move the needle: through rapid iteration and expansion of our Summer Immersion Program and highly-scalable Clubs Program, Girls Who Code has delivered 3,000+ hours of instruction to 3,000+ girls nationwide. Our programs have earned support from the CEOs of top Fortune 500 companies, engaged 700+ industry professionals, delivered among the most robust dataset on computer science education, and been featured in 100+ publications, from The New York Times to the Today Show. Our alumnae are overwhelmingly choosing to major in computer science or related studies and consistently name Girls Who Code's programs as their chief incentive to do so.

Girls Who Code is dedicated to closing the gender gap in the technology world. Supporting the work of Girls Who Code is an opportunity to empower the engineers, innovators, and executives of tomorrow.

semi-permanentblooddroplets_yarrawahinte.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.25 – 4.27 and 5.0 – 5.6

This is a lightweight and flexible blood particle system that uses instanced mesh decals to create persistent, randomized gore effects. It's designed for easy integration and customization, adding a realistic and lasting impact to your game's combat.

Features:

  • Spawn hundreds of thousands of persistent droplet decals.
  • Easily customize with a lightweight Blueprint and 14 exposed parameters.
  • Works on angled surfaces with both CPU and GPU particles.
  • Includes an enemy AI example with bone-attachment and blood pool spawning.
  • Simulates drying blood by changing color and roughness over time.
  • Comes with 16 CPU and 14 bonus GPU Niagara systems.
  • Create unique effects like lava or acid by controlling emissive strength.

dystopiancityenvironmentcyberpunkcyberpu.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.22 – 4.27 and 5.0 – 5.7

The Dystopian City Environment is a comprehensive asset pack for creating your own cyberpunk universe. It includes ready-to-use building blueprints, easily modifiable meshes with a wide range of tileable materials, a highway spline system, and numerous cyberpunk-styled street props. The pack also comes with a pre-built, static-lit city map on an island, featuring over 10 city blocks, which you can use as a starting point or for inspiration.

Features:

  • Pre-built City Island Map with 10+ city blocks.
  • 11 pre-built building meshes of various sizes.
  • High-quality tileable materials for easy modification.
  • 25+ Building and Prop Blueprints.
  • Highway Spline System.
  • 3 vehicle props.
  • Animated billboard material for variety.
  • Detailed, multi-level streets with prop groups.
  • 6-layer Landscape Auto-Material.

fpsdevices.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 4.18 – 4.27 and 5.0 – 5.7

This pack provides a collection of animated first-person devices, including a tablet, camera, phone, listening device, and walkie-talkie. All included animations are designed for a first-person perspective.

Please Note: The device screens are not interactive; you will need to add your own video or menu functionality.

Features:

  • Includes 5 devices: Tablet, Camera, Phone, Listening Device, and Walkie Talkie.
  • 75 first-person in-place animations for hands and devices.
  • High-quality 4K PBR textures for all assets.
  • Rigged to the UE4 Epic Skeleton.
  • Includes first-person hand models.

luggagesuitcasesandhandbagsvol2.description_text:
More InfoSupports UE 5.1 – 5.6

Cover your world with high-quality, game-ready luggage, suitcase, and handbag assets. This pack includes an optimized, interactable blueprint that allows you to quickly spawn and randomize luggage in your world, complete with sounds, particles, and physics configured for looting and collision.

Each mesh has a skeletal mesh variation rigged for realistic soft-body physics, allowing you to simulate ragdoll effects when the objects are shot or hit.

Features:

  • 11 set-dressing presets.
  • 5 unique rigged bag meshes with custom physics assets for soft-body simulation.
  • An easy-to-use, level-designer-friendly ""BP_Interactable"" for opening/closing, procedural spawning, and locking/randomizing meshes.
  • Includes sound effects and particles for looting and physics collisions, ready to drag and drop into your world.
  • High-quality 4K textures with detailed albedo, normal, and roughness maps.
  • Includes interior and open/closed variations.

meridian1988_postoffice_modularenvironme.description_text:
A storm has cut Meridian, Virginia off from the mainland—but it isn’t the weather that keeps people from leaving.

The fog has settled. The streets are silent. The townsfolk are acting strange. At night, church bells drift across the harbor, and uneasy gatherings take place behind shuttered windows.

Meridian 1988 is a collection of eerie, story-rich environments inspired by the coastal towns of East Coast America—empty homes, dimly lit chapels, quiet main streets, and weathered seaside structures.

Explore the remnants of the town of Meridian - you may discover something far more sinister watching from the dark.

Documentation: https://dekogon.notion.site/Town-Buildings-Meridian-1988-f9387634a8bd42909e7d8062fa1adc0d?source=copy_link

comptia_techplus_10practiceexams_comptia.human_name: CompTIA Tech+ Complete Certification Exam Preparation with 10 Practice Exams
comptia_techplus_10practiceexams_comptia.description_text:
Your first step into the tech industry starts here. This comprehensive 470+ page preparation covers the broad, foundational knowledge required to understand how technology works today, from coding basics to hardware.

comptiacloudpluscertificationwith10pract.human_name: CompTIA Cloud+ Certification with 10 Practice Exams
comptiacloudpluscertificationwith10pract.description_text:
Take your career to the clouds. This course covers the technical expertise needed to deploy, secure, and automate cloud environments across different vendors.

✔️ Focus on capacity planning, security, and automation.

comptiaaiessentials.description_text:
Your practical guide to working with AI assistants. This book covers how generative AI and large language models work, including their strengths, limitations, and why outputs can vary. You'll learn to write effective prompts by communicating purpose, context, personas, and constraints clearly.

The book also covers how to spot hallucinations, verify AI-generated information, and refine outputs through iteration rather than one-off requests. You'll learn to handle sensitive information responsibly and identify high-value use cases for AI in your daily work.

Designed for beginners with no prior AI experience. Whether you're still guessing with tools like ChatGPT, Copilot, or Claude - or avoiding them altogether - this book gives you a structured foundation to start using AI confidently.

definitivecomptianetworkpluscertificatio.human_name: Definitive CompTIA Network+ Certification Certification with 10 Exams
definitivecomptianetworkpluscertificatio.description_text:
The internet doesn't happen by magic. Master the backbone of the digital world with this definitive Network+ guide. Spanning 400+ pages, this resource takes you from basic cabling to complex network architecture and troubleshooting.

✔️ Master IP addressing, routing protocols, and network security.

✔️ 10 Graded Exams: Practice with massive test banks to ensure you pass.

✔️ Video Course: Watch and learn with the included free online training.

Whether you are troubleshooting a home router or managing enterprise switches, this is your roadmap. Become the network pro every company needs.

comptia_serverplus_10practiceexams_compt.description_text:
Keep the data center running. This course covers the hardware and software that powers enterprise environments, from server architecture to disaster recovery.

✔️ Master storage, security, and troubleshooting for hybrid environments.

✔️ 10 Graded Exams: Simulate the exam environment with graded practice.

comptiadataxcertificationft10practiceexa.human_name: CompTIA DataX Certification ft 10 Practice Exams
comptiadataxcertificationft10practiceexa.description_text:

completecomptiasecuritypluscertification.human_name: The Complete CompTIA Security+ Certification Path with 10 Practice Exams
completecomptiasecuritypluscertification.description_text:
The global standard for kicking off a cybersecurity career starts here. This 360+ page guide gives you the theory and the practice to pass the Security+ exam with confidence, covering the core principles of today's security landscape.

✔️ Cover threats, attacks, vulnerabilities, and identity management.

✔️ 10 Practice Exams: Validate your skills with rigorous graded testing.

Stop guessing and start preparing. This path gives you the resources to get certified and get hired. Join the security frontline today.

expansivecomptiasecaipluscertificationpr.human_name: The Expansive CompTIA SecAI+ Certification Prep with 2 Practice Exams
expansivecomptiasecaipluscertificationpr.description_text:
Defend against the newest wave of digital threats. This course prepares you for the cutting-edge SecAI+ certification, focusing on the intersection of cybersecurity and artificial intelligence. With 330+ pages of content, we cover:

✔️ AI threat landscapes and defensive strategies.

✔️ Securing machine learning pipelines.

✔️ Complete Training: Includes a free video course and a graded online practice exam.

Don't let technology outpace your security skills; learn to secure the AI systems of tomorrow. Future-proof your security career today.

aipocketbookforeveryone_howtoautomateeve.human_name: AI Pocketbook for Everyone: How to Automate Every Day (with Course, Cheatsheet and Exam)
aipocketbookforeveryone_howtoautomateeve.description_text:
Your daily manual for getting more done. This 260+ page pocketbook focuses on practical automation strategies to reclaim your time, whether you are technical or not.

Work smarter, not harder. Let the AI handle the drudgery. Automate your daily grind today.

completegenerativeaiengineercookbookfore.human_name: The Complete Generative AI Engineer Cookbook for Everyone: Become a GenAI Specialist with Python
completegenerativeaiengineercookbookfore.description_text:

✔️ Code-First Approach: Learn by doing with practical Python recipes.

✔️ Full Toolkit: Includes a video course, cheatsheet, and exam.

Transition from a coding enthusiast to a GenAI Specialist. Start engineering your own AI solutions.

✔️ 10 Graded Exams: Practice your offensive security knowledge.

✔️ Video Course: Watch the free online training to see attacks in action.

comptiaaipromptingessentials.description_text:
Build on your AI fundamentals with practical, workplace-ready skills. This book teaches you how to decide when AI is the right tool for a task, how to craft prompts that get accurate results, and how to critically evaluate what AI produces. You'll learn to refine outputs through iteration, apply AI ethically, and build repeatable automation workflows.

The book also covers how to integrate AI into real workplace functions like communication, research, reporting, and planning - helping you apply AI consistently across your daily work.

comptia_dataplus_10practiceexams_comptia.description_text:
Data is the new oil, but only if you know how to refine it. Learn to analyze, interpret, and visualize data effectively to drive business decisions. This course takes you through the lifecycle of data analysis.

✔️ 10 Graded Exams: Test your analytical skills with extensive practice.
