The thrill of taking a trip through Japan with pretty girls is the experience offered by this "Guide Game" -- a guidebook in game format!

  • Beautiful Tour Guides!!
  • Famous Japanese Sightseeing Spots!!
  • Delicious Japanese Dishes!!

*In order to unlock achievements, you will need the 2016 version DLC.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Some Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

expressionamrilato.callout:
97% Positive on Steam

Yuri romance that teaches the Esperanto language through story.
expressionamrilato.description_text:
Yuri Visual Novel

The Expression Amrilato is a girl-meets-girl yuri visual novel.

This visual novel is for people who:
  • Enjoy subtle love-like feelings between girls.
  • Have an intellectual curiosity for learning.
  • Just like watching cute girls having fun.
  • Are willing to take in a touching story that will probably make you cry.

Story

Rin was just buying a snack in her hometown’s shopping district — but she gets a shock when her surroundings suddenly transform.


"...Why is the sky pink...?"

She should know this area well, but the unreadable letters on the signs and the strange language the people are speaking have made things unrecognizable.

...Just then, Ruka, a girl so cute she could be an idol, appears and extends a helping hand.

Rin, who exudes positivity in spades, and Ruka, a supportive girl who speaks only a smattering of Japanese.

This is the story, pure and sometimes frustrating, of two girls intertwined through their fumbling efforts to communicate.

In-depth Alternate World Language

In "The Expression Amrilato", the main character is lost in an alternate world where Juliamo (which in the real world is Esperanto, an existing constructed language) is the official spoken language. Therefore, while enjoying a story between cute girls, you can also learn language of Esperanto!


The text in this game has been officially supervised by the National Esperanto Association in Japan. You additionally might be able to learn another language through the Japanese and Chinese version included in the package!

Game System

  • A full length visual novel with lots of cute voices!
  • Studying Esperanto through the quiz-oriented Study Mode (Also something you can play directly through the main menu.)
  • A story narrative/prioritization mode, settable by just making the quizzes "Homework"
  • After clearing the game, you can select if you want to display the Esperanto translation as subtitles or not for those who want to continue learning the language!


Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this: This game contains an illustration of communal bathing, and thus partial nudity.

ifmyhearthadwings-flightdiary-newwings_a.human_name: If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary- - New Wings: Akari (DLC)
ifmyhearthadwings-flightdiary-newwings_a.callout:
97% Positive on Steam

Flight Diary's Akari DLC
ifmyhearthadwings-flightdiary-newwings_a.description_text:
All characters appearing in this game are over 18 years old.

If My Heart Had Wings -Flight Diary- - New Wings: Akari is a special route which features Akari.

Set after the events of If My Heart Had Wings, New Wings: Akari explores the challenges the Soaring Club faced when they reapply to be recognized as a club again after a year of hard work. Akari, who was doubtful and skeptical about why they were all so passionate about the skies finds herself curious about their activities. She witnessed each of their struggles, and is mystified about how the continue forwards. After Aoi offers to give her a tour of the club's new base, Akari begins to see the passion they hold, and slowly admits to the developing feelings she holds for Aoi.

A thrilling and emotional journey to the sky is about to take flight again.

Mature Content Description

The developers describe the content like this: While there are hints and sex jokes in the game, there is no depiction of any sexual acts.

needystreameroverload.callout:
95% Positive on Steam

Dark streaming management sim with 20+ psychological endings. (Mature)
needystreameroverload.description_text:
NEEDY STREAMER OVERLOAD is a “multi-ending ADV” depicting daily life with “OMGkawaiiAngel”, a young girl with a rather extreme need for approval attempting to become the #1 “Internet Angel” (streamer). Gradually build up OMGkawaiiAngel’s number of followers as she spends her days streaming, using various ”stress relievers”, and generally being kinda messed up. Experience all the different crazy ups and downs and find out for yourself whether this story is even capable of having a happy ending.

Turn “Ame” – somewhat of a hot mess of a girl – into an OMGWTF-cute internet angel and jumpstart her career as a live streamer for the most hardcore nerds online!

CHARACTERS

Ame:

While she may look somewhat low-key and quiet, she’s actually a ridiculously selfish and vapid girl with a tendency to get carried away and a desperate need for approval. She’s, well... kind of troublesome personality. Likes: Her S.O./producer, “P-chan”; psychotropics.

OMGkawaiiAngel:

An “internet angel”. Ame’s alter ego, used while streaming. Pretends to be really nice and sweet. Constantly flirts with nerd types.

P-chan:

Gender, age, and all details are unknown.

Or maybe it's you?

Living with Internet Angel!

■As Ame’s beloved (???) “P-chan”,

offer daily commentary and guidance to help foster her into a top-tier streamer. Under your direction and guidance, she can amass more and more devoted listeners/obsessed fans, turning her into a super-popular streamer.– and thus allowing you to squeeze stupid amounts of Super Chat out of her donation-happy otaku followers.

■Gotta get topics for streaming!

Let's do all kinds of things from afternoon to evening to find out hot topics for streaming. Sometimes you just need to take a little break because streaming can be stressful. Take Ame on dates, serve her up a little bit of naughtiness once in awhile, provide her with a little something-something to take the edge off when she needs to release some pent-up stress, and use social media to grumble about to help keep her happy and mentally healthy.

But be careful. Depending on your actions, she might increase her "sickness level" and be swallowed by the darkness of the Internet!

*NOTE: This is a perfectly wholesome game, containing absolutely no explicit sexual references or expressions nor illegal substances. For real!

You can see the results of your daily actions and behavior via social media, where Ame-chan will use both public and private accounts to talk about you. People have a tendency to act supportive and friendly on the outside, while talking loads of smack and spreading rumors privately.

■You'll get a variety of messages every day!

Let's reply back to them with stickers. Ignoring messages is not a human thing to do. Don't make her angry.

You’ll sometimes receive long-winded, tedious criticisms and insults, but that’s just par for the course when dealing with a cute girl streaming on the internet. Be sure to take proper care of her.

■The game features multiple endings!

Your streamer will do things like become weird and emo for various reasons, subject her trusty P-chan to harm, and generally get messed up in the head. Begin your adventure and see for yourself whether a happy ending is really even possible for a cute yet disturbed girl on the modern-day internet.

askyfullofstars.callout:
95% Positive on Steam

Atmospheric coming-of-age story centered on an astronomy club.
askyfullofstars.description_text:
The starry sky spreads far and wide overhead...
This story full of love, comedy, and excitement follows our protagonist and his stargazing friends as they grow together.
A Sky Full of Stars is a coming-of-age astronomy tale by the same team who brought you If My Heart Had Wings.

Some things change and some stay the same...

Childhood friendships, passed-down traditions, deep bonds forged over time, and even deeper feelings all intersect.
Old relationships and moments left in the past are all drawn clearly in A Sky Full of Stars.

We shared all that sparles in the sky with each other...

It didn't matter if we were near, far, or anywhere...we always looked to the same sky.
A Sky Full of Stars is a tale of young people from different schools' astronomy clubs coming together and gazing at the stars.

HIGHLIGHTS

Innumerable stars twinkling in the night sky...
To replicate the night sky as accurately as possible in A Sky Full of Stars, images were created using data from the Hipparcos Catalogue (found at: hipparcos/tycho2catalog) and the "Starry Winds MMD" planetarium engine software.

Voices that sound like they're right there next to you...
Certain scenes in A Sky Full of Stars have been recorded using the binaural recording method.
Using both a normal mic and a binaural mic to get in as close as possible, we've been able to come up with an audio experience that offers a natural-feeling closeness with the characters.

A breathtakingly wide-open winter view...
A Sky Full of Stars uses the newest methods of visual processing technology.
The images are displayed at 1.5x the size of all previous PULLTOP titles.
The images provide a highly-detailed look into the setting of the story, with even more to draw your eye.
This gives you an even greater immersion in the story.

ifmyhearthadwings.callout:
92% Positive on Steam

Youth drama about reviving a glider club to fly through the sky.
ifmyhearthadwings.description_text:
After a bicycle accident shatters his dreams of becoming a racer, Aoi Minase returns to his hometown, depressed and defeated. With seemingly no hope left for the future and no idea what to do with himself from here on, Aoi meets Kotori Habane--a young girl stuck in a wheelchair with a flat tire. It is on that windmill-dotted hill that Aoi's somber yet touching story of youth, friendship, and flight begins.

Upon witnessing a glider soar overhead, Aoi sets off on a journey to realize the dream everyone has as a child: the dream of flight.

Working together with Aoi’s childhood friend, Ageha Himegi, the main characters of this visual novel begin rebuilding the Soaring Club, which is on the brink of disbandment at the hands of an uncaring school board. These beginners take hold of their passion, overcoming failures, obstacles, and interference from the school to put everything they have into building their own working glider.

Their ultimate goal to fly through the legendary "Morning Glory"--a rare and stunning weather phenomenon producing a special type of roll-shaped cloud that appears in the morning when the conditions are just right.

Join Aoi on this journey as he learns about the sky, his new friends, and much more.

  • Total Play Time: 20 to 30 hours
  • Five character-specific story branches to play through
  • Full voice-overs throughout the game for all characters

endlessmonday.callout:
98% Positive on Steam

Relatable office-life comedy about battling procrastination.
endlessmonday.description_text:
About

Meet Penny, a corporate grunt and serial procrastinator who spent all her time at the office doodling comics and playing phone games instead of working on her project. Now a weekend away from missing her deadline, Penny must find inspiration and overcome all sorts of distractions to finish her project on time and not disappoint her mentor (and not get fired). And maybe she'll learn something about herself in the process.

Features

  • Explore the office and phone up friends and coworkers for ideas and inspiration
  • Avoid (or embrace) distractions from daydreams, video games, mysterious doors, and imaginary(?) friends
  • Behold the consequences of your actions through the story's multiple endings
  • Completely hand-drawn visuals, by me
  • Luxurious OST by the esteemed Chance Thrash
  • State-of-the-art "you can use a mouse, keyboard, or controller to play the game" technology

Overtime!

The end is no longer the end, as they say. Penny's story continues in this brand-new full-length extra chapter, included for free with the latest update!

charitywater.description_text:
Donations to support charity: water are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
Right now, 771 million people on the planet don't have access to clean, safe drinking water. That's one in ten of us.

charity: water is a non-profit organization bringing clean, safe drinking water to people in developing countries. We use 100% of public donations to directly fund sustainable water solutions in areas of greatest need.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Vibrant Visual Novels
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get eden*, A Sky Full of Stars, If My Heart had Wings, The Expression Amrilato, Needy Streamer Overload, Go! Go! Nippon! ~My First Trip to Japan~, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb:
The content in this bundle is intended for mature audiences.

Place yourself in the heat of the story with the all-new Vibrant Visual Novels Bundle of story-driven games. Play The Expression Amrilato, a stunning visual novel–style title centered around two young girls learning to understand each other on multiple levels. Or Needy Streamer Overload, the multi-ending story of a girl obsessed with becoming the biggest personality on social media and her willingness to do anything to succeed. Get these and more engrossing visual novel–style games for a price you choose and help support Charity: Water with your purchase.

Keys expire. Please redeem keys before February 4th, 2027.
from_bundle.author: Publishers

basic_data.human_name: Humble RPG Bundle: So You Wanna Try Out Call of Cthulhu by Chaosium
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Bring a taste of terror to your game nights with this bundle from Chaosium, complete with everything you need to run the dreaded (yet beloved) Call of Cthulhu RPG system! On top of the Call of Cthulhu Starter Set, you’ll get the Investigator Handbook, replete with expanded rules for creating player characters, as well as the Keeper Rulebook, brimming with all the information you need to keep things orderly as your table descends into madness. You’ll also get tons of adventures, including some aimed at first-time game masters, as well as entire campaigns! Pay what you want for over 25 books and game aids for this seminal RPG and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

Codes are redeemable through the DriveThruRPG website.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Invite eldritch terror to your table
basic_data.description:
Invite eldritch terror to your table. Bring a taste of terror to your game nights with this bundle from Chaosium, complete with everything you need to run the dreaded (yet beloved) Call of Cthulhu RPG system! On top of the Call of Cthulhu Starter Set, you’ll get the Investigator Handbook, replete with expanded rules for creating player characters, as well as the Keeper Rulebook, brimming with all the information you need to keep things orderly as your table descends into madness. You’ll also get tons of adventures, including some aimed at first-time game masters, as well as entire campaigns! Pay what you want for over 25 books and game aids for this seminal RPG and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $426. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. The ebooks in this bundle are redeemable on the dtrpg.com website. Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Codes are redeemable through the DriveThruRPG website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support World Wildlife Fund. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

pulpcthulhu.description_text: Two-Fisted Action & Adventure Against The Mythos. Calling All Heroes! It’s Time To Take The Fight to Cthulhu! Pulp Cthulhu is a game of two-fisted adventure, weird science, dark deeds, and brave heroes. With this book, some roleplaying dice, and the Call of Cthulhu Rulebook, you have everything you need to adventure and explore games set in the pulp genre.

callofcthulhu_investigatorhandbook.description_text: An Essential Book for Call of Cthulhu Players. Whether learned professor, nosy journalist, hobo, waitress or hard-hitting detective, investigators need all the help they can get - Let this book be your guide! The Investigator Handbook is an essential player’s aid for the Call of Cthulhu roleplaying game.

grandgrimoireofcthulhumythosmagic.human_name: Grand Grimoire of Cthulhu Mythos Magic
grandgrimoireofcthulhumythosmagic.description_text: Over 550 spells of dire consequences, secrets, and unfathomable power! Contained within are gathered spells drawn from over thirty years of Call of Cthulhu supplements and scenarios. Each spell has been revised for the Call of Cthulhu 7th Edition game, including optional Deeper Magic for the most powerful of Mythos sorcerers and monsters, with which to beguile and confound investigators.

petersenguidetolovecraftianhorrors.description_text: A Field Observer’s Handbook of Preternatural Entities and Beings from Beyond The Wall of Sleep! Weird shapes in the park? Odd rumbling noises in the basement? A lurking dread in the kitchen? Bad dreams involving strange adventures and bizarre creatures? Identifying the lurking horrors of the Cthulhu Mythos is never an easy task, so researchers need all the help they can get—don’t leave home without the Field Guide!

callofcthulhu_keeperrulebook.description_text: The World’s Best Game Of Intrigue, Mystery & Horror! Call of Cthulhu is the world’s best game of secrets, mysteries, and horror. Playing the role of steadfast investigators, you travel to strange and dangerous places, uncover foul plots, and stand against the terrors of the Cthulhu Mythos. You encounter sanity-blasting entities, monsters, and insane cultists. Within strange and forgotten tomes of lore you discover revelations that humanity was not meant to know. The Keeper Rulebook, contains the core rules, background, guidance, spells, and monsters of the game. It is everything you need for Call of Cthulhu at your fingertips, and will enhance all of your games. The Keeper Rulebook is intended for use by the Keeper of Arcane Lore—the Game Master who will present the scenario to the other players.

callofcthulhu_keeperscreenpack.human_name: Call of Cthulhu: Keeper Screen Pack
callofcthulhu_keeperscreenpack.description_text: More than just a screen! The Keeper’s Screen Pack enhances your games of Call of Cthulhu with scenarios, reference tables, and maps that increase the flow of play, and help to immerse you in the horror of the Mythos.

doorstodarkness.description_text: Five scenarios of Cthulhu Mythos terror designed for new players and keepers! Doors to Darkness is a collection of five scenarios for Call of Cthulhu. Explore the signature setting of 1920s New England through these tales of eldritch dread designed for brand new Keepers—if you’re new to Call of Cthulhu, this is your next step!

cthulhudarkages3rded.description_text: Cthulhu Dark Ages is a world lit only by fire. The ancient empires collapsed centuries ago, taking their culture and learning with them. It’s a dark world and people are right to be afraid of the dark. Apart from the Viking raiders, witches, and outlaws, there are the unquiet dead, ancient horrors, and other malevolent beings stalking the countryside. Dark entities, beyond good and evil, wait hidden in the recesses of time and the angles of space. A few brave souls try their best to resist the horrors and push them back from whence they came.

aloneagainstthetide.description_text: Solitaire Adventure by the Lakeshore! What has Professor Harris’ research got to do with the strange green fog enveloping the town? Who are the menacing, dark-suited men that arrived on the ferry with your investigator? And, why is a Buddhist monk visiting Esbury, a town more used to entertaining New England’s wealthy elite? Take on the role of an investigator traveling to a remote lakeside town where strange things are happening. Decide your path through the story, and the fate of the citizens of Esbury!

namelesshorrors2ndedition.description_text:
Six Scenarios Against The Unknown!

The denizens of Nameless Horrors are unlike anything you’ve encountered before. Each is truly of the Cthulhu Mythos, but they come from realms unknown, and will keep even the most seasoned investigators on their toes.

What's Inside:

Nameless Horrors contains six scenarios for Call of Cthulhu, each taking place in a different setting and time period—perfect for one-shot games, and for kicking off a new and unique campaign.

The Scenarios: 

Each scenario in Nameless Horrors contains NPC portraits, maps, and player handouts. These are also provided as separate downloads. 

An Amaranthine Desire -

1895: In the doomed seaport of Dunwhich, England, strange echoes of the past threaten the present.

A Message of Art -

1892: In Paris, France, art and the occult come together in a dangerous fusion.

And Some Fell on Stoney Ground -

1920s: Small-town America. Trouble is brewing that could sweep everyone up in a wave of death and destruction.

Bleak Prospect -

1932: Massachusetts during the Great Depression, residents of a shantytown face strange horrors that jeopardize all they hold dear.

The Moonchild -

2020s: In England, an experiment with the occult casts long shadows and brings unforeseen consequences.

The Space Between -

2020s: Los Angeles, California. The star of a film produced by a popular religious organization has vanished.

An Updated Edition -

Originally published in softcover nearly 10 years ago, this updated edition of Nameless Horrors contains brand new art, player handouts, and maps for each of its 6 scenarios.

developers.developer-name: Paul Fricker, Matt Sanderson, Scott Dorward

petersensabominations.description_text: A collection of five nightmarish modern-day scenarios for the Call of Cthulhu Roleplaying Game. Gathered from across the aeons, this anthology of horror brings together for the first time a series of scenarios from the mind of Sandy Petersen, the creator of the Call of Cthulhu Roleplaying Game. Each one-shot scenario is designed for one or more sessions of play.

deadlightandotherdarkturns.human_name: Dead Light and Other Dark Turns
deadlightandotherdarkturns.description_text: Two unsettling encounters on the road. With the rise of the automobile in the 1920s, people were no longer tied to the railways as a means of getting to distant locations. For those who could afford the relative luxury of a car, the expanding United States’ highway network brought with it the opportunity to travel and see new places, as well as visit those that the railways didn’t reach—and all at your own pace, too.

berlinthewickedcity.description_text: Unveiling the Mythos in Weimar Germany – In the aftermath of the Great War, Berlin has a reputation for licentiousness. A place where anything may be had for the right price. It is both a city of hedonism and a city of business; its streets overflow with disabled veterans, prostitutes, destitute immigrants, and political agitators—all rubbing shoulders with buttoned-down businessmen, scholars, and artists. The gutters run with the blood of political assassinations, where Communists and völkisch Nationalists clash with each other, as well as with the police. Long into the evenings, Berlin’s world-famous cabarets offer music, dance, and titillating entertainment in stark contrast to the gray buildings that run on for endless miles along the sprawling city’s byways. Into this bubbling stew, Berlin the Wicked City introduces the weird elements of the Cthulhu Mythos. A hotbed of occult organizations, strange cults, and half-whispered lore. Amid the wicked air of the world’s capital of sin, the very nature of what it means to be human is questioned. And, as the city hurtles toward its inevitable dark destiny, the oppressive atmosphere pushes the sanity of investigators to its breaking point.

aloneagainstthedark.description_text: A solo play Call of Cthulhu mini campaign. No Keeper is needed as you guide yourself through the adventure. Alone Against The Dark is an adventure for one player, set in the fall of 1931. Your goal is to solve strange disappearances and to forestall a calamity about to beset the world. You will journey from New York City to Greece, Egypt, Germany, and Antarctica.

keepertips.description_text: Collected Wisdom on Running Games! A gathering of wisdom, advice, and tips from Keepers for Keepers of the Call of Cthulhu roleplaying game.

malleusmonstrorum.description_text: Here, shall you know the terrors of the void, the nightmare bringers, and the unspeakable lurkers. Ancient secrets, whispered lore, and collected facts concerning the alien and otherworldly horrors of the Cthulhu Mythos. A cavalcade of monsters and god-like alien intelligences beyond human understanding, all vividly detailed and portrayed. With over 250 entries to inspire countless adventures.

downdarkertrails.description_text: Troubles Afoot! Best put a round in that iron and make haste! Down Darker Trails takes your Call of Cthulhu games to the badlands of America’s wild west! The era of gold rushes, outlaws, cowboys, discovery, and expansion!

doesloveforgive.description_text: Two One-to-One Scenarios for Call of Cthulhu. Does Love Forgive? is a collection of two special scenarios for Call of Cthulhu for one Keeper and one player. Both adventures are perfect for a fun evening of gaming for two people. Each scenario can be played over the course of one to two sessions, and is suitable for Keepers of all experience levels.

reignofterror.description_text: Cthulhu Dark Ages is a world lit only by fire. The ancient empires collapsed centuries ago, taking their culture and learning with them. It’s a dark world and people are right to be afraid of the dark. Apart from the Viking raiders, witches, and outlaws, there are the unquiet dead, ancient horrors, and other malevolent beings stalking the countryside. Dark entities, beyond good and evil, wait hidden in the recesses of time and the angles of space. A few brave souls try their best to resist the horrors and push them back from whence they came.

callofcthulhustarterset.description_text: Horror, Mystery and Investigation In A Box! The Call of Cthulhu Starter Set contains everything you need to play the world’s best roleplaying game of horror, mystery and investigation! Updated for the 40th Anniversary of Call of Cthulhu.

mansionsofmadness_vol1.description_text: Who Knows What Happens... Behind Closed Doors. Mansions of Madness Vol. 1 contains five scenarios for use with the Call of Cthulhu Starter Set or the 7th Edition Call of Cthulhu: Keeper Rulebook. It includes two fully updated and revised classics, along with three brand new adventures, and all can be played as standalone adventures, used as sidetracks for ongoing campaigns, or strung together to form a mini-campaign spanning the 1920s. Suitable for up to six players and their Keeper, each scenario should take between one and three sessions to play through, and are an ideal next step for those who have already experienced the horrors contained within the scenario collections Doors to Darkness and Gateways to Terror.

malleusmonstrorumkeeperdeck.description_text: The monsters of the Cthulhu Mythos at your fingertips! The Malleus Monstrorum Keeper Deck is a collection of 66 monster cards that enhance your Call of Cthulhu gaming experience.

callofcthulhuthecoloringbook.human_name: Call of Cthulhu the Coloring Book
callofcthulhuthecoloringbook.description_text: Color the Uncolorable! Enjoy coloring an amazing array of scenes, with striking images from H.P. Lovecraft’s stories— and the Call of Cthulhu RPG his imagination inspired (Horror on the Orient Express, Masks of Nyarlathotep, The Fungi from Yuggoth and more).

acoldfirewithin.description_text: A Cold Fire Within is a campaign for Pulp Cthulhu. Set in 1935, a missing persons case leads to the discovery of a foul plot that could change time itself and bring disaster to the world. A cult intent on unleashing the power of the Great Old Ones leaves a trail through the Catskill Mountains and into the very heart of the planet!

aloneagainstthefrost.description_text: Solitaire Adventure in Canada’s Wilds. Alone Against the Frost is a solo horror adventure for one player, set during a research expedition to Canada’s Northwest Territories during the 1920s. Here, you choose your own path as you navigate through the story—your choices will determine whether you find success or failure!

gatewaystoterror.description_text: Three Portals into Nightmare! Gateways to Terror contains three short-play scenarios for the Call of Cthulhu 7th Edition roleplaying game, ideal for beginning and experienced players and Keepers alike. Originally, all three—The Necropolis, What's in the Cellar? and The Dead Boarder—were designed as demonstration games to give a taste of the game's core motifs—mystery, investigation, and horror—for those with limited time. The scenarios can be played in as little as one hour but can be expanded for slightly longer play, and each comes with four ready-made investigators so you can jump right into the action! Each scenario includes hints and tips for Keepers new and old, suggestions for additional investigators for larger groups, and a summary of the key rules needed to play.

worldwildlifefund.description_text:
Payments to the World Wildlife Fund are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

WWF is one of the world’s largest and most experienced independent conservation organizations, with over 5 million supporters and a global network active in more than 100 countries.

WWF’s mission is to stop the degradation of the planet’s natural environment and to build a future in which humans live in harmony with nature, by conserving the world’s biological diversity, ensuring that the use of renewable natural resources is sustainable, and promoting the reduction of pollution and wasteful consumption.

The WWF name and logo are used with its permission, which in no way constitutes an endorsement, express or implied, of any product, service, company, opinion or political position. The WWF name and logo is a registered trademark owned by WWF. For more information about WWF, please visit www.wwf.org

from_bundle.tile_short_name: So You Wanna Try Out Call of Cthulhu by Chaosium
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Invite eldritch terror to your table
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Doors to Darkness, Gateways to Terror, Nameless Horrors 2nd Edition, Dead Light and Other Dark Turns, Call of Cthulhu: Keeper Rulebook, Call of Cthulhu: Investigator Handbook, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Bring a taste of terror to your game nights with this bundle from Chaosium, complete with everything you need to run the dreaded (yet beloved) Call of Cthulhu RPG system! On top of the Call of Cthulhu Starter Set, you’ll get the Investigator Handbook, replete with expanded rules for creating player characters, as well as the Keeper Rulebook, brimming with all the information you need to keep things orderly as your table descends into madness. You’ll also get tons of adventures, including some aimed at first-time game masters, as well as entire campaigns! Pay what you want for over 25 books and game aids for this seminal RPG and help support the World Wildlife Fund with your purchase!

Codes are redeemable through the DriveThruRPG website.
from_bundle.author: Chaosium, Inc.

basic_data.human_name: Playful Platformers 2026
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
A great platformer gets maximum entertainment out of a simple format: making your character run back and forth on a 2D track, collecting items, jumping over obstacles, and fighting enemies to achieve a goal. In this bundle, just in time for the holidays, you’ll get 9 of our favorite platformer games made to entertain every type of platformer player! Make the choice between holding down a literally cursed job or saving the world in the fun, existential Peppered. Help a cute little tanuki sprint through her dreams in the 3D SEGA Saturn-inspired Lunistice. There’s even more to enjoy in this great bundle, so get it now for the price of your choosing and help out TD Foundation with your purchase!

Keys expire. Please redeem Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines before August 4th, 2026. All other titles should be redeemed before February 4th, 2027.

kaothekangaroo.callout: A throwback to the golden age of 3D Platformers, join Kao in his most recent game from 2022!
kaothekangaroo.description_text:
🥊 THE GAME 🥊

Kao The Kangaroo is a 3D platformer from veterans of the genre Tate Multimedia, featuring a plucky, cheeky but a cutie, Kao The Kangaroo (Hey, just like in the title!) on a quest to uncover the truth around the disappearance of his father.



🥊 THE JOURNEY 🥊

During his journey, Kao will explore a wide variety of beautifully detailed environments, each harboring secrets to uncover. At every turn, Kao faces new challenges. He’ll have to use all his skills while learning some new ones...not all of them being natural to the world he lives in! As they say, it’s the journey that makes us, not the destination.



🥊 THE CONTENT 🥊

Being inspired by the heyday of 3D platformers, as well as building on Kao’s 21-year legacy, Kao The Kangaroo is packed with plenty of jumping, thumping, puzzle-solving, and collecting. A whole new amazing adventure with all the charm you’d expect from not just the genre, but Kao himself!



🥊 THE CAST 🥊

Kao’s beautiful and bright world is filled with a host of colorful characters just waiting for you to meet them... in some cases (try to) defeat them! From wise mentors and inquisitive inventors to big old bullies, the cast of Kao The Kangaroo is as memorable as it is expansive!



🥊 THE FIGHT 🥊

While on his journey Kao will have to overcome many foes. Quick and nimble strikers, slow and lumbering brutes, and everything in between. Kao will have to use all the lessons he’s learned to defeat those who stand before him…



🥊 THE GLOVES 🥊

The mysterious, mesmerizing, long-buried, gloves Kao has on his paws are oozing with power yet to be fully unleashed. They’ll be a key tool in Kao’s journey, helping to ward off foes and traverse the world. Will the secrets of their power ever be fully understood? Kao looks to find out.



🥊 THE WORLD 🥊

Explore a diverse range of Unique and beautiful interactive worlds filled with fresh challenges, enemies, puzzles, and secrets! Jump, climb, dive and ride your way through highly detailed environments as Kao progresses on his journey!



🥊 THE MISTERY 🥊

Lurking behind Kao’s plane of existence lays a whole other world filled with mystery, uncontrollable power, and chaos...the Eternal World. A link between the two worlds exists, melding together. Its secrets are in Kao’s hands, giving him new powers...but at what cost?

🥊 KAO IS BACK 🥊

lunistice.callout: A linear 3D platformer created with a simple, fun PS1/SEGA Saturn-inspired retro art style. Take the role of Hana the Tanuki as she jumps and fights through dreamscapes created from her own memories.
lunistice.description_text:
Lunistice is a linear 3D platformer that is heavily inspired by the 32-bit era of yesteryear. Follow Hana the Tanuki on her adventure through her dreams!

Explore the different dreamscapes to guide her to her final destination - The Moon - and try to uncover the secrets of "The Lunistice" along the way!

7+ DIFFERENT DREAMS

Explore a multitude of different dreamscapes created from Hana's memories! Jump and run through an old shrine, a fancy water park or a world made out of food!

SIMPLE, AFFORDABLE FUN

Lunistice is designed as a simple and short experience that you can easily play in short bursts! Have fun and enjoy the good vibes!

REPLAYABILITY FOR DAYS

Try to beat your fastest times and highest completion and get an S-Rank on every stage! And if you're looking for some additional variety: play the whole game as a different character with their own skills and gameplay!

demonturf_queensedition.callout: The sequel to the stylized 3D platformer Demon Turf. You play as Beebz, a young demon girl who seeks to kick every turf leader's butt to become the Demon Queen. This version is a unique blend of 2D sprites in a 3D environment.
demonturf_queensedition.description_text:
DEMON TURF
The Demon World is inhabited by all kinds of nasties... Most of them lumped into gangs battling for dominion, each led by its own head honcho. Yet even these bad dudes are no match for the Demon King himself! Instead the task falls to Beebz, a young demon barely a thousand years old, who decides it’s time for her to kick every turf leader’s butt and become the Demon Queen herself.

  • A unique aesthetic combining the expressiveness of 2D illustrations with the depth and sense of exploration 3D environments can offer!
  • A world chock-full of humor and style, from the music accompanied by the protagonist’s rapping to the colorful characters inhabiting the world!
  • A unique take on progression! Take a victory lap and explore previously beaten levels to discover their liberated state, with plenty of mechanical and environmental changes to uncover. Or take some time off in the hub town taking on sidequests and other distinct challenges instead.
  • Pull off some clever platforming combinations or get physical with a special physics-driven combat system that ramps up the chaos and fun. Push, pull and spin your enemies out of your way.
  • A different take on checkpoints, freeing the player to place them wherever they want. Show off without them for a perfect run, or place one in preparation for a challenging section.
  • Unique challenges like the “Photo Hunt” mode where you’re tasked to take pictures of hidden locations & surprising moments! Or simply take picures and selfies for fun and share them across all social media!
  • An awesome collection of purchasable mods that can be combined in clever ways to completely change your play style! Or you could buy some dyes & pets instead, the world's your oyster!
  • Tons of carefully crafted levels that constantly introduce new challenges as well as en- gaging bosses full of character and life! Until Beebz gets to them...
  • Level Creator! Create and share your own custom levels with the world! Includes all the standard assets, allows you to import your own and even features LUA scripting support.

DEMON TURF: NEON SPLASH
Maintain a constant momentum of precision platforming through surreal worlds, filled with bright neon colors, and enjoy the intoxicating combination of 2D & 3D art! Explore and hunt collectables or knuckle-down and master satisfying mechanics to compete for the best times across the world!

  • This painting is no joke! Explore these surreal worlds, filled with bright neon colors, and enjoy the intoxicating combination of 2D & 3D art!
  • Beebz will focus on what she does best! Platforming! Maintain a constant momentum with no stopgaps or combat, it's all about the platforming that is faster & better than ever before!
  • A unique checkpoint system, tweaked to perfection! Place your own checkpoints at any time with no limit! Retreading is for losers!
  • Lots to do! Explore 10 finely crafted levels with a plethora of unique challenges and hazards that are constantly introduced to you at a record pace!
  • Setpiece levels with a fun narrative to boot! After all, Beebz didn't get sucked into the painting alone and her friends certainly are characters!
  • A ton of additional goals for you to complete, such as: Collecting all the sweets in a level, finding the hidden vinyl which unlocks 10 more remix levels & getting all the trophy times!
  • Remix levels?! You betcha! And don't be fooled, these are expertly crafted to be entirely new levels with brand new challenges! Better bring your A-game!
  • Who knows what awaits you if you complete the game 100%? We do, and it's pretty sweet, so you should do it.
  • 6 finely tuned modifications you can buy with your collectables: Sweets! Only the best of the best, such as mods that add an extra hit point, tweak or add new movesets etc. They even change your looks!
  • Leaderboards, baby! That's right, compete for the best times across the world and show off your mettle!
  • Photo Mode! Look, at this point it's mandatory and Beebz is really good at taking selfies! So snap away!
  • Settings galore! Seriously, this thing's packed with options, so customize your game the way YOU want it to be!

DEMON TURF: TOWER
You've been stripped of all your powers and there's only one way to regain them: Climb the Jester's impossibly high tower! Can you overcome all of the hazardous challenges and gain back your abilities, one by one? All it takes is one slip up and you'll have to start over... You'll be sweating, you'll be swearing but with each attempt you'll climb just a bit higher... And just that much closer to beating this incredibly tough challenge! Good luck, fellow demon!

  • Roguelite-lite-esque gameplay! That's a mouthful, what does that mean exactly youy ask? You HAVE to beat the tower in one run but it is NOT randomized. And the higher you get, the more powers you'll permanently unlock to help you in your next climb!
  • One huge level with no loading zones and full of new challenges, hazards and platforming goodness!
  • Ability loadout! Pick & adjust how your unlocked powers work to best fit your playstyle!
  • Any% leaderboard! It'll be tough to beat the tower, but even if you do, can you be the fastest at it?
  • Each time you retry, you'll see where you died last! *Feel* your progress!
  • A brand new story featuring characters new and old!
  • Photo Mode, of course!
  • Settings galore!

pogostuck_ragewithyourfriends.callout: A very challenging precision platformer, renowned for its difficulty. Ascend surreal mountains across various modes and maps, master the mechanics and breeze through previously formidable areas. Featuring online multiplayer.
pogostuck_ragewithyourfriends.description_text:
Pogostuck: Rage With Your Friends is a short and sweet yet very challenging game about climbing a mountain on a pogo stick. Tilt the character, jump, use momentum and 360° powerboosts to reach unimaginable heights.

Jump along with friends and strangers from around the globe via automatic matchmaking for up to 16 players. Customize your character with unlockable gear and compete in leaderboards or live rankings - if you want to!

Inspired by Getting Over It with Bennett Foddy.

Stuck, looking for help or someone to play with? Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/jKaA7EX
For tech support please visit the Steam discussions.

superkiwi64.callout: A chill, open 3D platformer and collect-a-thon that emphasizes exploration and freedom, reminiscent of classic Nintendo 64 titles. You explore eight compact and distinct low-poly worlds using the versatile moveset of Kiwi (jumping, gliding, corkscrew-attacking, and wall-sticking).
superkiwi64.description_text:
Super Kiwi 64 is a 3D-Platformer and Collect-a-Thon, in a low poly late 90s console look.

Features:
- Low poly late 90s retro looks.
- Kiwi can jump, glide, corkscrew-attack and stick to walls in order to jump up almost every wall.
- The levels can be played in any order, and not every level needs to be finished in order to collect enough to reach the ending.
- Features a bird with a long beak!

moveordie.callout: Ruin friendships in this 4-player local and online party game where the mechanics change every 20 seconds
moveordie.description_text:
20 seconds, constantly changing mechanics and a lot of yelling. These are the keywords that perfectly describe a round of Move or Die, the 4-player friendship ruining party game where rules change every single round. Slap your friends’ controllers out of their hands while playing on the same couch, challenge players online from around the world or pretend to practice offline with AI bots. Select what game modes you want to play from an ever-growing list of developer and community-generated modes, each with their own outrageous mechanics and level design crafted to promote hours of good old friendship-ruining fun.

Play online to gain XP and level up, unlocking awesome characters and game modes in the process, or try to work your way up the daily challenge leader boards where players go against AI bots in survival-like matches. As its name suggests, Move or Die forces players to take action. In fact, not moving literally makes your character explode. And, with just 20 seconds per round, Move or Die is a quick game to pick up, but a hard one to put down.

AWESOME FEATURES:

  • 4-Player Local/Online Multiplayer and Offline Practice Modes
    Play as one of several outrageous characters on the couch with friends, online against people from around the world or battle devious bots offline.

  • Game Modes Galore
    Choose from a huge and always increasing variety of hilarious game modes like Jump Shot, Chainsaw Backstab and Rocket Run, each with their own unique mechanics and level design.

  • Easy-to-Learn, Fast-Paced Fun
    Move or die...literally. With not moving resulting in your character exploding and only 20 seconds per round, Move or Die is quick to pick up and incredibly fast-paced.

  • Leveling-Up System
    Acquire crazy skins for your character and unlock new game modes as you squash your opponents online.

  • Daily Contributions - A community-wide challenge!
    Check in every day to earn income and increase your luck, then use said income to pitch in towards a global community goal. Once the community debt bar is filled and the goal is met, special, exclusive items are unlocked for all contributors!

  • Regular Content Updates
    New content, including game modes, characters and new features will be added on a regular basis to keep Move or Die’s friendship-ruining-o-meter high.

  • MOD Friendly and DRM Free
    Build your own characters, game modes, mechanics, levels, soundtracks and more. Includes Steam Workshop support, as well as a super user-friendly level editor.

  • DLC Free...Always
    Everything in the game can be unlocked for free, no paywalls. No bull$#%&. Period.

  • Striking Graphics and a Killer Soundtrack
    Get your blood pumping with vibrant 2D graphics, as well as a heart-thumping soundtrack by Jacob Lincke. Check it out on Bandcamp!

  • Controller and Keyboard Support
    Play with one or 4 controllers, a keyboard, a DDR pad...or...the guitar and drums from Guitar Hero. Your choice. Although, we recommend a controller :D

peppered_anexistentialplatformer.callout: 2D Platformer where you play as an office intern who becomes the unlikely hero tasked with saving the world from the returning God of Death. The choices you make—and whether you succeed or fail at certain platforming challenges and boss fights—permanently affect the story and the ending you receive.
peppered_anexistentialplatformer.description_text:
ABOUT

PEPPERED is an existential platformer where you have ONE SHOT at everything.

Every choice, every boss battle, and every failure impact the branching plotline and determine how the story will go and how it will end. Will you save the world - or fail miserably?

SYNOPSIS

Seeing apathy in the face of doomsday, an office intern decides to save the world by themselves. But the world responds by summoning the police, angry mobs, and the media, branding them as a terrorist.


KEY FEATURES

■ BRANCHING NARRATIVE
Multiple endings. Multiple story routes. Your failures and choices affect the story, which branches out heavily — sometimes taking you to completely unique locations with unique scenes, characters, or gameplay mechanics.

■ PLATFORMING ACTION
Run. Jump. Die. Scream at the screen.

■ ONE-SHOT BOSS FIGHTS
Challenging boss fights! If you lose, the game will not reset or give you a second chance — it will go on, incorporating your loss and changing the story accordingly.

■ CHOICES
Make story choices, ranging from dialogue responses to actions. These will either affect the characters, the scene's outcome, or the ending you get.

■ STEALTH SECTIONS
Get caught, sneak past, or find a secret solution. Every section features a unique character, permanent outcomes, and dumb gags.

■ EXPLORATION
Immerse yourself in a bizarre world full of weirdos and sad people! Talk with colorful NPCs, poke around the environment, or ignore it all.

■ COMPLETELY RANDOM CR*P
Maybe you'll have to use a shopping cart to run away from thugs? Perhaps you'll have to write a presentation or gamble with a street corner lunatic? Who knows? (I do.)

■ AN OFFICE CHAIR
You can spin in it.

grappledogs_cosmiccanines.callout: A fast-paced 2D action platformer and sequel to the acclaimed Grapple Dog. You play as the heroic pup Pablo and the new anti-hero Luna, who team up to save the cosmos.
grappledogs_cosmiccanines.description_text:
FEATURES
  • 🪝 Pure platforming bliss - Fast-paced swinging action meets a whole host of fresh abilities, such as magnetic panels and fire-dashing, all coming together as a tight, fun platforming romp!
  • 🌎 New worlds - Journey across dimensions in an epic quest to save... everything! Each unique world is bustling with vibrant, eye-catching pixel art and bubbling with personality!
  • 🐶 Gameplay galore - Sail across the cosmos to explore multiple worlds filled with tons of levels. Hidden collectibles, secret areas, memorable boss battles, bonus levels, time trials, and more to sink those canines into
  • 🎵 Exhilarating soundtrack - Jazz Mickle's catchy, killer soundtrack will have Grapple Dogs' beats stuck in your head forever, with level-by-level jams that are sure to get that tail waggin'!

TWO DOGS ARE BETTER THAN ONE
More dogs = more action! Mysterious newcomer Luna joins the adventure, with her weaponry adding exciting new gameplay features to the fray. Alternate between playing as the swingin' hero Pablo and the shoot-first-ask-questions-later anti-hero Luna.

THE RETURN OF PABLO
The pettable, adventurous, acrobatic pup Pablo returns, with his trusty grappling hook allowing him to zip across levels and worlds throughout the cosmos, completing tricky challenges and platforming tests, along with new powers and new friends.

SWING YOUR OWN WAY
Hone your grappling skills - or your gun-blasting prowess - with optional collectibles for those who love extra challenge. Try your speedrunning might with the Time Trial modes and race against the world(s) to prove who's the real top dog.

crumble.callout: A dynamic 3D physics platformer where you control a cute blue ball with a grappling tongue mechanic, allowing you to swing around. Join the chaos of a crumbling world where platforms fall away beneath you.
crumble.description_text:
Crumble is a physics platformer with a grappling tongue mechanic.
Join the chaos of unstable platforms and unexpected destructions with this cute blue ball!
Try to progress in exciting levels falling around you.
Move like a Slime , jump like a Ball , swing like Spiderman!

Features:
  • A campaign mode with an increasingly crumbling world
  • A multiplayer Party Mode up to 4 local players
  • Unlock new skins
  • Online leader boards
  • High dynamic physics


Vibrant Environment

Crumbling Chaos

Swing Mechanics

tdfoundation.description_text:
Donations to support TD Foundation are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

TD Foundation is a 100% volunteer organization that provides aid to children of wounded warriors and fallen heroes. We help American Veterans’ families in crisis.

basic_data.human_name: Applied Acoustics Sound Designer Bundle
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with the ultimate bundle for sound designers and engineers. Unlock 20+ unique and specialized audio packs like the soothing Lounge Lizard Session pack, the retro-inspired Ultra Analog Session pack, the foot-tapping Tabby Dance pack, and so much more. Pay what you want for this curated collection of professional-quality audio assets and help support the Malala Fund with your purchase.
basic_data.description:
A+ acoustics await inside. Create the perfect audioscape for your game, film, or creative project with the ultimate bundle for sound designers and engineers. Unlock 20+ unique and specialized audio packs like the soothing Lounge Lizard Session pack, the retro-inspired Ultra Analog Session pack, the foot-tapping Tabby Dance pack, and so much more. Pay what you want for this curated collection of professional-quality audio assets and help support the Malala Fund with your purchase.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $940. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Keys are redeemed through Applied Acoustics website.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Malala Fund. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

stringtheory.description_text: String Theory is a rich and expressive sound expansion designed for String Studio VS-3 and the free AAS Player. Created by acclaimed sound designer Adam Pietruszko, this collection takes full advantage of String Studio’s physical modeling and multitimbral engine to deliver a broad palette of refined tones, from lush acoustic strings and resonant electric textures to bold synth-like leads, basses, plucks, pads, and keys. With 110 professionally crafted presets, String Theory empowers producers and composers to explore cinematic, ambient, electronic, and contemporary music styles with high-quality, dynamic sounds. The included patches respond musically to MIDI input and extend the expressive power of String Studio VS-3, making complex and inspiring sonic landscapes easy to create.

malalafund.description_text:
Donations to support Malala Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Malala Fund is working for a world where every girl can learn and lead. With more than 130 million girls out of school today, they’re breaking down barriers that hold girls back.

asplayerfreepluspackswatches.description_text: Sound Pack Series Compilation. igh-quality sounds from our always expanding Sound Pack Series playable via our free AAS Player plug-in. 720+ high quality sounds

microsoundtextures.description_text: Microsound Textures is a cinematic sound library designed to bring evolving, detailed sonic landscapes to your tracks. Built for use with String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player, this collection focuses on micro-rhythmic textures, granular pads, shimmering atmospheres, organic pulses, and rich ambient layers. Each preset blends expressive motion and intricate sound design, making it ideal for film, TV, games, electronic, and ambient music. From subtle motion beds to captivating rhythmic drones and lush evolving tones, Microsound Textures empowers producers and composers to add depth, emotion, and movement to their arrangements. With intuitive controls and inspiring timbres, it transforms simple ideas into immersive audio environments.

strumsession.description_text: Strum Session combines realistic acoustic and electric guitars in one intuitive virtual instrument designed for effortless guitar performance on a keyboard. Featuring intelligent chord recognition, automatic chord voicing, and expressive strumming and picking engines, it delivers natural-sounding guitar parts without the need for samples. Play authentic down- and up-strokes, scratches, mutes, or create dynamic picking patterns directly from your keys. A built-in MIDI strumming library provides inspiring grooves that can be dragged and dropped into your DAW and fully customized. With guitarist-style chord voicings, amp and effects processing, and expressive articulations such as slides, bends, vibrato, hammer-ons, and pull-offs, Strum Session makes creating convincing guitar tracks fast, musical, and accessible.

masala2.description_text: Masala 2 is a vibrant and versatile sound pack built for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Infused with colorful timbres and rhythmic motion, it delivers a rich selection of expressive presets including lively pads, intricate textures, pulsating sequences, dynamic leads, and organic motion-driven tones. Designed for electronic, cinematic, world, and experimental music, Masala 2 blends exotic sonic flavors with deep harmonic character that responds naturally to MIDI performance. Each preset takes full advantage of String Studio’s resonant synthesis engine, offering evolving motion and intuitive macro controls for expressive shaping. Whether you’re creating immersive soundscapes, textured beds, or energetic rhythmic elements, Masala 2 adds engaging musical depth and creative inspiration to your productions.

ultraanalogsession.description_text: Ultra Analog Session is a compact yet powerful analog synthesizer designed for immediacy and rich sound. With a streamlined interface and carefully selected controls, it delivers bold, inspiring tones that are easy and fun to play. The instrument includes a high-quality sound library featuring signature presets from renowned producers Richard Devine and Sean Divine. Ultra Analog Session adapts effortlessly to any musical context with host-sync and tap tempo, polyphonic or monophonic modes, note priority options, unison voices, glide, legato, and flexible vibrato. A versatile arpeggiator offers multiple sync resolutions, algorithms, and rhythmic patterns for dynamic sequences and evolving melodies. Built-in effects expand its raw analog character into polished, production-ready sounds.

objeqdelay.description_text: Objeq Delay is a creative delay effect that goes far beyond traditional echoes by combining tempo-syncable delay with physically modeled resonator filtering. Instead of simple repeats, Objeq Delay shapes each echo through acoustic resonators inspired by real objects such as plates, beams, strings, and drumheads, adding unique tonal character and depth. A flexible filter section, modulation controls, and LFO allow for evolving textures, rhythmic movement, and expressive sound design. From subtle coloration and rhythmic delays to experimental ambiences, drones, and glitchy effects, Objeq Delay transforms any signal into a dynamic, musical space while remaining intuitive and performance-friendly.

insomnia-appliedacoustics.description_text: Insomnia is a dark, intense sound library crafted for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Focused on deep, atmospheric, and moody textures, it offers a rich collection of haunting pads, brooding drones, glitchy rhythmic elements, and evocative soundscapes that bring tension and character to your music. Leveraging String Studio’s expressive resonant engine, each preset responds organically to MIDI performance and features evolving motion, harmonic depth, and dramatic color. Whether you’re producing cinematic scores, ambient soundtracks, electronic music, or experimental pieces, Insomnia provides intuitive macro controls and inspiring sonic elements that spark creativity. Its immersive and bold timbres help you craft compelling musical worlds full of emotion and edge.

loungelizardsession.description_text: Lounge Lizard Session is a versatile electric piano instrument that delivers the warmth, bite, and expressiveness of classic acoustic and electric pianos through advanced physical modeling. Shape your sound with built-in compressor and equalizer to add clarity and punch, then dive deeper using key synthesis controls that affect the mallet, pickup, tine, and tone bar. A curated collection of high-end effects—including tremolo, chorus, phaser, and reverb—is carefully tuned for electric piano tones, making it easy to create polished, mix-ready sounds. The Character knob offers five distinctive studio and stage signal path emulations, letting you move effortlessly from vintage soul to modern pop and electronic textures.

harmonicgeometry.description_text: Harmonic Geometry is an expressive and richly textured sound library crafted for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Focused on harmonic motion and evolving sonic shapes, it delivers a diverse palette of atmospheric pads, intricate textures, organic pulses, dynamic rhythmic elements, and emotive leads. Each preset takes full advantage of String Studio’s resonant synthesis engine, offering evolving motion, harmonic complexity, and responsive performance that reacts naturally to MIDI input. Whether you’re composing ambient soundscapes, cinematic beds, electronic pieces, or experimental music, Harmonic Geometry provides intuitive controls and inspiring sonic elements that spark creativity and deepen your productions. Its expressive, evolving sounds help bring depth, movement, and character to any musical project.

poprocks.description_text: Pop Rocks is a vibrant and modern sound library created for the physically modeled synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Designed for contemporary genres like pop, rock, indie, and electronic, it delivers a dynamic collection of expressive tones including shimmering pads, punchy rhythmic textures, bright leads, crunchy basses, and evolving atmospheric layers. Each preset makes full use of String Studio’s unique resonant and motion-driven synthesis engine, offering lively, musical sounds that respond organically to MIDI performance. With intuitive controls and inspiring sound design, Pop Rocks empowers producers, composers, and sound designers to craft catchy hooks, colorful textures, and polished arrangements that shine in modern productions — from radio-ready tracks to cinematic scores.

raw.description_text: Raw is a powerful and versatile sound library designed for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Built for producers, composers, and sound designers, it delivers a bold collection of textured tones, gritty basses, expressive leads, organic pads, and evolving timbres that bridge acoustic warmth and electronic edge. Each preset explores the expressive potential of String Studio’s engine with rich motion, dynamic resonance, and detailed sonic character. Whether you're crafting cinematic soundscapes, ambient textures, modern electronic music, or experimental sound design, Raw provides inspiring sounds with intuitive controls for shaping and performance. Its diverse palette and emotive presets make it an essential addition for creative music production.

digitalsins.description_text: Digital Sins is a cutting-edge sound library crafted for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. This collection delivers a bold palette of gritty digital timbres, glitchy textures, spectral pads, metallic pulses, and futuristic soundscapes that push sonic boundaries. Designed for electronic producers, sound designers, and composers, Digital Sins blends organic resonant motion with experimental digital character to create immersive atmospheres, evolving drones, and edgy rhythmic elements. With expressive presets and intuitive macro controls, it empowers you to sculpt intricate tones and dramatic textures that work perfectly in cinematic, ambient, game, and electronic music. Whether you need bold leads, shimmering layers, or unpredictable sound design elements, Digital Sins adds depth and modern color to your productions.

bluerhythms.description_text: Blue Rhythms is an inspiring sound pack designed for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Focused on rhythm-driven textures and motion-rich timbres, it delivers a vibrant collection of pulsing sequences, textured grooves, dynamic rhythmic pads, and expressive tonal elements with an organic feel. Each preset makes full use of String Studio’s unique synthesis engine, blending resonant motion with musical color to create sounds that move and evolve with your playing. Whether you’re composing electronic, ambient, pop, or cinematic music, Blue Rhythms provides intuitive controls and inspiring sonic elements that spark creativity and add rhythmic life to your tracks.

cinematix.description_text: Cinematix is a cinematic and ambient sound library created for the physically modeled synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Designed for composers, sound designers, and producers, it delivers a rich selection of evolving textures, atmospheric pads, shifting soundscapes, rhythmic textures, and expressive tonal elements that spark creativity in modern media production. The presets explore organic motion, spectral motion, and deep ambient coloration, allowing you to easily craft dramatic beds, immersive drones, and fluid harmonic layers. With intuitive macro controls and deeply expressive timbres, Cinematix transforms simple MIDI input into intricate, cinematic audio environments — perfect for films, trailers, games, and electronic compositions.

powerchords.description_text: Power Chords is a high-energy sound library designed for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Built for rock, pop, electronic, and hybrid music styles, it delivers a bold collection of punchy, expressive chord-driven sounds, rich harmonic pads, dynamic rhythmic textures, and powerful tonal elements. Each preset takes advantage of String Studio’s unique resonant motion engine, offering lively motion, harmonic depth, and musical responsiveness to MIDI input. Whether you’re crafting driving progressions, cinematic beds, or catchy hooks, Power Chords provides intuitive controls and inspiring sonic character that spark creativity and add strength to your arrangements. With its diverse palette of vibrant, guitar-inspired and synth-oriented sounds, this library brings energy, attitude, and modern color to your productions.

fearwithin.description_text: Fear Within is a dark and atmospheric sound library created for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Designed for cinematic, ambient, electronic, and experimental music, it delivers a rich palette of eerie textures, haunting pads, deep drones, glitchy pulses, and evocative soundscapes. Each preset leverages String Studio’s unique resonant synthesis engine to produce sounds with organic motion, evolving character, and emotional depth. Whether you’re crafting film scores, game soundtracks, or immersive ambient pieces, Fear Within provides intuitive controls and inspiring sonic elements that spark creativity and add tension, mystery, and mood to your tracks. Its expressive and detailed sounds help bring complex and haunting audio environments to life.

epicycles.description_text: Epicycles is a dynamic and inspiring sound bank designed for the physical-modeling synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Created by leading sound designers, Epicycles delivers a rich palette of evolving timbres that blend organic motion with electronic flair. The library features ambient pads, shifting textures, shimmering sequences, plucked tones, and expressive leads, all crafted to take full advantage of the unique resonant and spectral capabilities of String Studio’s engine. Whether you’re composing cinematic soundscapes, ambient music, or experimental electronic pieces, Epicycles adds depth, movement, and emotion to your productions. With intuitive controls and inspiring presets, it makes it easy to explore complex sound design and expressive musical ideas.

tabbydance.description_text: Tabby Dance is a high-energy EDM sound pack designed for Ultra Analog VA-3 and the included AAS Player. Created by sound designer Christian Laffitte, it delivers 100 modern presets tailored for today’s electronic music styles, including Big Room, Techno, Progressive, Future House, Electro, Trap, and Psy Trance. The collection features punchy basses, sharp leads, lush pads, keys, arpeggios, plucks, and rhythmic sequences, all crafted for immediate impact. Each preset includes expressive macro controls for easy shaping and automation inside your DAW. Whether you’re producing club-ready tracks or experimenting with dynamic electronic textures, Tabby Dance brings power, movement, and inspiration to your sound.

plasticpop.description_text: Plastic Pop is a bright and energetic sound library designed for the physically modeled synthesizer String Studio VS-3 and the included AAS Player. Created with modern pop, electronic, and indie styles in mind, it delivers a lively palette of sparkling pads, punchy rhythmic textures, warm leads, shimmering sequences, vibrant basses, and expressive tonal elements. Each preset takes full advantage of String Studio’s resonant synthesis engine to produce sounds that are rich, dynamic, and organically responsive to performance. With intuitive controls and vibrant sonic character, Plastic Pop empowers producers, composers, and sound designers to craft catchy hooks, polished arrangements, and fresh melodic ideas. Whether you’re building radio-ready tracks, atmospheric layers, or colorful grooves, this library adds energy, clarity, and contemporary flair to your productions.

malalafund.description_text:
Donations to support Malala Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Malala Fund is working for a world where every girl can learn and lead. With more than 130 million girls out of school today, they’re breaking down barriers that hold girls back.

Unlock 20+ unique and specialized audio packs like the soothing Lounge Lizard Session pack, the retro-inspired Ultra Analog Session pack, the foot-tapping Tabby Dance pack, and so much more. Pay what you want for this curated collection of professional-quality audio assets and help support the Malala Fund with your purchase.
