from_bundle.tile_short_name: Film Makers VFX Bundle
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get VFX Portals Pack, 100 Epic LUTs Pack, 10 Gas Explosions Pack, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Any movie can ride or die by its visual effects, and if you’re a filmmaker you know exactly how important these details really are. Finished production on your project but need a few VFX tweaks to make it really pop? We’ve got just the bundle for you: a collection of all the VFX software you need to add a little spark to your final product—maybe even literally! In this bundle of over 50 VFX packs, you’ll find everything from fiery explosions and muzzle flashes to floating embers and rain, along with animations, backgrounds, and LUTs to give your film that finished polish. Pay what you want for this great bundle, and support children and families in crisis with Save the Children!
from_bundle.author: Eldamar Studio LLC

basic_data.human_name: Humble Comics Bundle: Dynamite Character Crossover Comics by Dynamite
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: We’ve assembled Dynamite Entertainment’s hottest eComics into a bundle you won’t want to miss. Vampirella, John Carter of Mars, Red Sonja, and the universe’s greatest heroes collide in an epic series of battles across DIE!NAMITE Vols. 1–6. Grab your boomstick for the action-packed mayhem of Army of Darkness: Ash vs. the Classic Monsters, Vols. 1–6. Bad guys beware—the femme fatales of Dynamite unite to stop a legendary evil in Swords of Sorrow: The Complete Saga. Pay what you want and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Killer character crossovers for the new year
basic_data.description:
Killer character crossovers for the new year. We’ve assembled Dynamite Entertainment’s hottest eComics into a bundle you won’t want to miss. Vampirella, John Carter of Mars, Red Sonja, and the universe’s greatest heroes collide in an epic series of battles across DIE!NAMITE Vols. 1–6. Grab your boomstick for the action-packed mayhem of Army of Darkness: Ash vs. the Classic Monsters, Vols. 1–6. Bad guys beware—the femme fatales of Dynamite unite to stop a legendary evil in Swords of Sorrow: The Complete Saga. Pay what you want and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the comics in this bundle is as much as $582. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The comics in this bundle are available in PDF and ePub formats, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Comic Book Legal Defense Fund. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

armyofdarkness_ashvstheclassicmonstersvo.human_name:
Army of Darkness: Ash vs the Classic Monsters, 
Vol 1-6
armyofdarkness_ashvstheclassicmonstersvo.description_text:
Winner of the SPIKE TV SCREAM AWARD best screen to comic adaptation!

This massive Six issue collection features not only the Ash vs. the Monsters storyline, but the two issues that lead into the cross-over event of the year - ARMY OF DARKNESS VS. THE MARVEL ZOMBIES! From the creative team of writer James Kuhoric and artists Kevin Sharpe and Fernando Blanco, the ASH VS. THE MONSTERS (AND MORE) TPB collects issues 8-13 of the DYNAMITE series! Issue 8-11 comprise the ""Monsters"" storyline - which pits Ash vs. Dracula and introduces the vampires daughter, Eva, while issues 12 and 13 present Ash's final conflict with the Deadit's and the Necronomicon! Also includes a complete cover gallery!

vampirellavspurgatorivol1-5.description_text: The unholy alliance you prayed would never happen! For countless generations, the fight between good and evil has been fought, as much behind the scenes as in plain view. Unbeknownst to the world at large, one force has stood as a safeguard against the potential triumph of evil and the unleashing of the apocalypse: The 36. Now, someone is after them, a creature of evil known as Purgatori, and the only thing standing in her way is Vampirella. So with all of existence hanging in the balance, what could possibly bring these two enemies to join forces? Hint: Whatever it is, it must be really bad. Collecting VAMPIRELLA VS. PURGATORI #1-5.

comicbooklegaldefensefund.description_text:
Donations to support Comic Book Legal Defense Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Comic Book Legal Defense Fund is a non-profit organization protecting the freedom to read comics! Our work protects readers, creators, librarians, retailers, publishers, & educators who face the threat of censorship. We monitor legislation & challenge laws that would limit the First Amendment. We create resources that promote understanding of comics & the rights our community is guaranteed. Every day we publish news & information about censorship events as they happen. We are partners in the Kids' Right to Read Project & Banned Books Week. Our expert legal team is available at a moment's notice to respond to First Amendment emergencies. CBLDF is a lean organization that works hard to protect the rights that our community depends on. Please support our important work!

armyofdarknessandreanimator_necronomicon.human_name:
Army of Darkness / Reanimator: 
Necronomicon Rising, Vol 1-5
armyofdarknessandreanimator_necronomicon.description_text: HORROR ICONS CLASH! When an archaeological dig unveils an important element from the world of the Army of Darkness, it ends up in the absolute worst hands of all: Dr. Herbert West's. As West tinkers in God's domain, our reluctant hero is once more drawn into the sphere of destiny as he faces a triple threat of danger! Writer Erik Burnham is joined by returning Dynamite artist Eman Casallos to bring you all the excitement and Deadite action!

chaosvol1-6.description_text: The horror "heroes" of Chaos! Comics are back! The undead Evil Ernie, goddess Purgatori, vampire Chastity, and supernatural band of misfits known as The Omen have individually witnessed visions of the world's impending doom, and rush headlong into conflict. Some try desperately to avert the holocaust, out of altruism or self-interest, while others just want to raise some hell. So begins the return of the Chaos! universe on an epic scale, the resurrection of fan-favorite boogeymen and femme fatales amidst a violent, apocalyptic upheaval!

vampirellavsreanimatorvol1-4.description_text: Herbert West--the Reanimator--has long sought the secret to perfecting his reagent and break death's hold on mankind once and for all. The key to his success lies in only one place--the forbidden tomb of the Aztec god of death! But disturbing sleeping gods is as troubling (to put it mildly) as raising the uncontrollable, murderous dead... especially when this deity is an ancient enemy of Vampirella of Drakulon! It's vampire versus mad scientist in a battle that threatens to tear the gates of the underworld asunder!

projectsuperpowers_omnibus_vol1.description_text: From the dawn of the 20th Century came a new chapter in mankind's history, unleashed during a time of great war and destruction. It was the beginning of the Age of the Superpowers, yet with the closing of the Second World War, this new spark seemingly flickered and died. Now the story can be told of the great lost superheroes - men and women with incredible abilities who changed the course of mankind forever, and who had been thought lost...until now!

vampirellaanddracula_unholyvol1-6.description_text:
Has Vampirella cheated fate? That's the question our interstellar vampire faces as she unites in unholy matrimony with the man who would be DRACULA!

The honeymoon begins! The adventure of several lifetimes begins as Vampirella and new husband Matt journey to Castle Dracula in Transylvania in an attempt to cheat fate by preventing both a high-tech virus and an ancient curse from using Matt's body to resurrect the deadliest threat the world has ever known. Meanwhile secrets and mystery grow around Vampi's spouse, who may not be nearly as innocent as he appears to be. Join us for Vampirella's next tale, by twice-bitten writer Christopher Priest and bloodthirsty artist Donny Hadiwidjaja!

elvirainmonsterland_issue2.description_text: What's scarier than Dracula? ALL THE DRACULAS! Vlad the Impaler is back, and he's raiding the Multiverse of Movies to build a monster army and conquer the world. And only one woman can stop him! Vampirella! But she's busy in her own books... so it's up to Elvira, the Mistress of the Dark, and bane of Vlad's existence, to stop his evil plan! It's monster movie madness horror from writer David Avallone (Elvira in Horrorland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist Kewber Bal (Vampirella, Red Rising, Red Sonja).

elvirainmonsterland_issue1.description_text: What's scarier than Dracula? ALL THE DRACULAS! Vlad the Impaler is back, and he's raiding the Multiverse of Movies to build a monster army and conquer the world. And only one woman can stop him! Vampirella! But she's busy in her own books... so it's up to Elvira, the Mistress of the Dark, and bane of Vlad's existence, to stop his evil plan! It's monster movie madness horror from writer David Avallone (Elvira in Horrorland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist Kewber Bal (Vampirella, Red Rising, Red Sonja).

masksvol1-8.description_text: The Shadow. The Green Hornet and Kato. Black Terror. The Spider. Peter Cannon, Thunderbolt. Miss Fury. These are just a few of the masked vigilantes drawn into a mystery that spans the decades. Inspired by Edgar Allan Poe's infamous short story and able to kill thousands of people in mere seconds, the Red Death hosts a bizarre masquerade across the 1930s, 1970s, modern day, and beyond, exposing her hapless victims to plague and threatening a legacy of costumed heroes. Over a dozen crime-fighters must risk their lives, hurling themselves into the time stream, to halt the madwoman's bloodbath!

vampirellaanddracula_ragevol1-6.description_text:
Inconsolable grief hardens into unstoppable fury in Vampirella/Dracula: Rage, as Vampirella tracks the cultists who threaten her son across Europe and America, unsettling political and economic alliances and unraveling the global network of the baby's father - Dracula!

In a macabre exchange of norms, it is Dracula, the Lord of Vampires, who now hunts the elusive Vampiri in an effort to save Vampirella from herself - or, more precisely, to save her from becoming just like him.

Bookending Vampirella/Dracula: Unholy and Vampirella: Year One, this climactic, take-no-prisoners tale from acclaimed author CHRISTOPHER PRIEST and celebrated artist CHRISTIAN ROSADO brings Vampirella's conflict with the Prince of Darkness to its ultimate conclusion - and marks an unprecedented turning point for the Daughter of Drakulon! Collects Vampirella/Dracula: Rage #1-6.

elvirainmonsterland_issue5.description_text: IT'S VLAD VS. ELVIRA - AND THE FATE OF THE WORLD IS AT STAKE! Vlad the Impaler has plundered the Multiverse of Movies to build his monster army, and now he's ready to invade! Can the Mistress of the Dark stop him before he conquers reality itself? It's the final issue, so this is Elvira's last chance! Tune in for this pulse-pounding, senses-shattering, all-action ish, courtesy of writer DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Horrorland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Red Rising, Vampirella)!

elvirainmonsterland_issue4.description_text: OH NO, THERE GOES TOKYO - BUT HERE COMES ELVIRA! Vlad the Impaler's rampage through the Multiverse of Movies has switched into high gear as he goes Cuckoo for Kaiju, recruiting the biggest and most dangerous of all cinematic creatures for his Monster Army. Can the Mistress of the Dark stop him in time - or will she have to go all Terror of Mecha-Elvira and Destroy All Monsters? Find out in this atomic fire-breathing, city-stomping issue from writer DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Horrorland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Vampirella, KISS)!

barbarellaholidayspecial.description_text: Comics legend Jean-Marc Lofficier (Mobius, Doctor Strange) steps aboard the Barbarella Cosmic Express to tell an intergalactic tale of Christmas and...murder?! Helas, c'est vrai! Someone's been given the ultimate gift, and jolly old St. Nick must figure out by whom. Enter the space siren for all holidays, Barbarella! Guest-starring France's Hexagon Comics' super-patriot hero: The Guardian of the Republic.

vampirellaanddejahthorisvol1-5.description_text: The encounter that was destined to happen! When an alien scout ship crashes on Mars, Dejah Thoris must risk reigniting war with the Green Martians and becoming dinner for the white apes. But the stakes are raised so much higher when the ship is revealed to carry Vampirella, who is on a desperate mission of survival-one that might end before it truly begins!

armyofdarknessvsreanimatorvol1-4.human_name:
Army of Darkness vs Reanimator, 
Vol 1-4
armyofdarknessvsreanimatorvol1-4.description_text:
Winner of the SPIKE TV SCREAM AWARD best screen to comic adaptation!

The Army of Darkness features the crossover no one ever expected to see: Army of Darkness vs. Reanimator! Ash Vs. West! The Ultimate Lovecraftian battle as Herbet West leaps from the literary page to fight Ash! Winner takes all! Ash finds himself committed to Arkham Asylum. it's here that he runs afoul of a rather ghoulish and creepy Herbert West... and the battle of the century begins!

This TPB features the four issues of this titanic teaming as well as a complete cover gallery (J.G. Jones, Sanford Greene, Gabriele Dell'Otto, Nick Bradshaw, and more) and a Nick Bradshaw Monster Gallery Sketchbook! Featuring 2 covers at a 50/50 split - one by JG (Wanted/52) Jones and the other by Gabriele (Secret War/Red Sonja Vs. Thulsa Doom covers) Dell'Otto!

sonjaversalvol1.description_text:
BEHOLD, A TALE OF INFINITE SONJAS.

RED Sonja, BLUE Sonja, GREEN Sonja, ORANGE Sonja, SAINT Sonja, HELL Sonja...and ENDLESS MORE.

Across dimensions, a greedy god comes calling for every Sonja, to pay their debt. What do they each owe? SONJA'S MUST KILL SONJA'S. It is up to RED Sonja to determine which Sonja's are friend, foe and...DINOSAUR!? Collecting Sonjaversal #1-5.

vampirellavsthesuperpowersvol1-6.description_text: Vampirella and her trusty sidekick Dyna Might have become superheroes, and are assigned to save a world that looks strangely similar to 1940s Earth - rife with crime, corruption, and two-fisted superheroes who don't take kindly to meddling from interdimensional vampire aliens! Can Vampirella survive an onslaught of conflict from villains and heroes alike, all while solving a murder mystery and keeping her precocious sidekick alive? Find out in this full-throttle throwback action adventure, courtesy of superstar writer DAN ABNETT (Avengers, Warhammer) and red-hot artist PASQUALE QUALANO (DC Vs. Vampires)! Collects issues #1-6.

redsonjaandhellsonja_issue4.description_text: Reality comes undone in the shocking finale of Red Sonja/Hell Sonja. Having come face to face with the Black Void, each Sonja is faced with a cosmic truth that will change them forever. Is there life after madness? And what will it cost?

bloodqueenvsdracula_issue4.description_text: The blood-soaked conclusion! You've seen the preliminaries, but now it's time for the main event! We've got Dracula versus Ottoman assassins, the Blood Queen versus a vengeful sorcerer, and lest we forget, Blood Queen versus Dracula! Surrounded by foes in her own castle, is there any way for Elizabeth to survive? Even if she defeats the enemies of her people, she could still wind up a servant of the Lord of Vampires!

bloodqueenvsdracula_issue3.description_text: The gloves come off as Dracula lays siege to the Blood Queen's castle! The dark prince brings his powers to bear, unleashing his servants and stalking the stone halls with one purpose: draining the life from Elizabeth. But she didn't become the Blood Queen by accident; torment and death have been her long-time companions. Will Dracula add her to his list of victims, or will Elizabeth have a deadly surprise for the lord of vampires?

bloodqueenvsdracula_issue2.description_text: The epic meeting between the Prince of Darkness and the Blood Queen continues! When Dracula and Elizabeth come face to face, sparks (and quite possibly, blood) will fly. With their common enemy rising from the Ottoman Empire, will they put aside their differences to fight back, or will they be consumed by their own war? it's two classic characters in one bold new series from Dynamite!

redsonjaandhellsonja_issue2.description_text:
HELL'S CREATURES ARE INVADING THE EARTH!

RED SONJA AND HELL SONJA HAVE FORGED A TRUCE - BUT HOW LONG CAN IT LAST?

Red Sonja and Hell Sonja forge a decidedly uneasy truce, banding together to defeat the horrendous creatures that followed Hell Sonja out of the very bowels of Hell itself. But how long can only two warriors hold back an entire chaotic underworld?

vampiversevol1-6.description_text:
A different Vampirella for every thread-for every kind of story - across the Fabric of time and space. A Vampirella of every conceivable notion born to protect her particular reality...but now something-someone-is killing them and stealing away their precious life energies and growing in power. It is up to the Vampirella of one of these universes to gather some of her special sisters to stop this growing threat and keep it from destroying the Creator of all things - the Artist - and preventing the unraveling of all reality.

Collects Vampiverse #1-6, as well as a complete cover gallery!

elvirainmonsterland_issue3.description_text: After first collecting an army of vampires, then Frankenstein and his monsters, who could Vlad the Impaler be after next? You know the answer: it's Wolfmen, Jack! The Vampire King continues his plunder of the Multiverse of Movies, and only Elvira can stop him. Will the Mistress of the Dark get bit? Watch the fur fly in this hairy, scary horror tale from writer DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Horrorland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Vampirella).

vampirellavsdraculavol1-6.description_text:
Spinning out of Alan Moore's retelling of the ageless horror classic, Dracula has come to America to play out his timeless narrative in this brave, New World. Only he didn't realize ANOTHER vampire already beat him to it. Drawn to one another across continents and centuries by a mysterious force, both Vampirella and Bram Stoker's immortal monster find themselves sucked into a time-tossed epic of love, hate, death, and damnation. But can an epic built for one vampire possibly hold them both?

Collecting the six-issue series in one volume, along with a complete cover gallery featuring art by Joe Linsner.

elvirameetsvincentpricevol1-5.description_text:
The two titans of horror and comedy unite in comics for the very first time! Dynamite Entertainment Proudly Presents...Elvira Meets Vincent Price!

Elvira is back, with her most historic AND greatest costar ever! The ghost of Vincent Price is a spirit with a mission, and only the Mistress of the Dark can help! The Apocalypse is coming, and it's going to be live-streamed for binge-watching, but a long-lost movie can save the world... if only the movie star specter and the horror hostess with the mostest can find it in time! Thrills, chills, and all sorts of terrible puns!

greenhornetandmissfury_issue5.description_text:
FRIENDS TURNED FOES!

With Miss Fury missing in action and the case of the Silver Shrike's murder unraveling around them, the Green Hornet and Kato find their mutual resentments boiling over into a no-holds-barred brawl!

Will the two crimefighting partners come to their senses in time to save the city? Or is this truly the end for one of the most iconic partnerships in comic book history?

Find out in this penultimate issue of The Green Hornet/Miss Fury, as breathlessly reported by ALEX SEGURA and HENRY BARAJAS and unflinchingly illustrated by FEDERICO SORRESSA - with scandalous covers provided by FRANCESCO FRANCAVILLA, JAE LEE & JUNE CHUNG, JONATHAN CASE, and JACOB EDGAR!

greenhornetandmissfury_issue4.description_text:
FRIENDS TURNED FOES!

With Miss Fury missing in action and the case of the Silver Shrike's murder unraveling around them, the Green Hornet and Kato find their mutual resentments boiling over into a no-holds-barred brawl!

Will the two crimefighting partners come to their senses in time to save the city? Or is this truly the end for one of the most iconic partnerships in comic book history?

Find out in this penultimate issue of The Green Hornet/Miss Fury, as breathlessly reported by ALEX SEGURA and HENRY BARAJAS and unflinchingly illustrated by FEDERICO SORRESSA - with scandalous covers provided by FRANCESCO FRANCAVILLA, JAE LEE & JUNE CHUNG, JONATHAN CASE, and JACOB EDGAR!

greenhornetandmissfury_issue1.description_text:
When Marla Drake and Britt Reid meet, sparks fly - and it's not just because of the bullets ricocheting around them!

As their alter egos Miss Fury and The Green Hornet, the two vigilantes have very different styles of crimefighting. But when they both turn up to investigate the murder of beloved professor Javier Mercado, they soon discover that they have more in common than they realized: Mercado was a mentor to both of them at different times, back when he too led a double life as the Silver Shrike.

With each having a personal stake in finding Mercado's killer, Drake and Reid must learn how to work together to solve the case if they don't want to end up sabotaging each other's efforts. But there's another, even more compelling reason to join forces: Whoever killed the Silver Shrike is going after other heroes, past and present - and at the top of that list are Miss Fury and the Green Hornet!

Award-winning author ALEX SEGURA (Star Wars, Secret Identity) and rising star artist FEDERICO SORRESSA kick off the action in the finest noir tradition in The Green Hornet/Miss Fury #1 - featuring hard-boiled covers from FRANCESCO FRANCAVILLA, JAE LEE & JUNE CHUNG, JONATHAN CASE, and JACOB EDGAR!

swordsofsorrow_thecompletesaga.human_name: Swords of Sorrow: The Complete Saga
swordsofsorrow_thecompletesaga.description_text: Dynamite's fiercest females appear in a massive genre-spanning crossover event featuring an all-star line-up of female authors, headlined by Gail Simone (Batgirl, Birds of Prey)! The ultimate pulp adventure features Vampirella, Dejah Thoris, Red Sonja, Purgatori, Lady Demon, Chastity, Jungle Girl, Jennifer Blood, Kato, Lady Zorro, and many, many more! Villains and heroes from a dozen worlds and eras face off against a legendary evil that threatens all their homelands. Written by Gail Simone, Mairghread Scott, Nancy A. Collins, G. Willow Wilson, Erica Schultz, Leah Moore, Marguerite Bennett, Emma Beeby, and Mikki Kendall, and featuring artwork by Sergio Davila, Mirka Andolfo, Dave Acosta, Noah Salonga, Francesco Manna, Crizam Zamora, Rod Rodolfo, and Ronilson Freire!

developers.developer-name: Gail Simone, Mairghread Scott, Nancy A. Collins, G. Willow Wilson, Erica Schultz, Leah Moore, Marguerite Bennett, Emma Beeby, Mikki Kendal

sherlockholmesvsharryhoudinivol1-5.human_name: Sherlock Holmes vs Harry Houdini, Vol 1-5
sherlockholmesvsharryhoudinivol1-5.description_text: The world's most famous detective meets the world's most famous magician... and death ensues! Famed sleuth Sherlock Holmes and brash showman Harry Houdini must combine forces to defeat a mysterious mystic dedicated to destroying Houdini's career and killing anyone who gets in his way. Written by Anthony Del Col and Conor McCreery, the Harvey Award-nominated creators of Kill Shakespeare!

greenhornetandmissfury_issue2.description_text:
Someone has murdered the Silver Shrike, and finding the culprit has become a matter of honor for both the Green Hornet and Miss Fury, each of whom regarded the man behind the Shrike's mask as a personal mentor. But solving the case quickly is also becoming a matter of survival, because the killer is now targeting other costumed crimefighters - and either one of them could easily be next!

The danger hits home for the inexperienced Miss Fury when she runs into the Emerald Vigilante while investigating the "mask murders" - only to find that it's up to her to keep the Green Hornet from becoming the latest victim!

The shadows deepen around our hardboiled heroes in this second issue of ALEX SEGURA and FEDERICO SORRESSA's The Green Hornet/Miss Fury - enhanced by a set of starkly sensational covers from FRANCESCO FRANCAVILLA, JAE LEE & JUNE CHUNG, JONATHAN CASE, and JACOB EDGAR!

elvirameetshplovecraft_issue2.description_text:
The comedy duo of Elvira, Mistress of the Dark, and Howard Phillips, Neurotic Ghost, take their show on the road to Arkham, Massachusetts! With the Cult of Nyarlathotep hot on their pointy heels, the two horror icons visit storied Miskatonic University - where the last copy of the Necronomicon may be hidden deep in the college library!

Secret knowledge is uncovered, hideous space gods are revealed, and late fines go unpaid in this madcap monster mash from writer DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Monsterland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Elvira in Monsterland, Vampirella), with cover artists BAAL, DAVE ACOSTA, and DAVID HACK all returning from the grave, as well as a enchanting Elvira photo cover

elvirameetshplovecraft_issue3.description_text: The quest for the last true copy of the Necronomicon brings Elvira and H.P. Lovecraft to the crumbling mansion of an old friend and colleague - an ancient pulp writer with disturbingly animated bookshelves. Will the Mistress of the Dark survive her visit to the Strange High House in the Mist, where the Terrible Old Man and the Haunters of the Dark guard the Lurking Fear From Beyond? All these and even more storied hijinks can be found in this exciting issue, brought to you by writer DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Monsterland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Vampirella), and featuring cathartically creepy covers from BAAL, DAVE ACOSTA, DAVID HACK, and a stunning Elvira photo!

elvirameetshplovecraft_issue1.description_text:
It had to happen someday! Elvira accepts the Collect Call of Cthulhu and finds herself on a comical quest for the last copy of the Necronomicon with the ghost of H.P. Lovecraft. Will she be able to tolerate Lovecraft long enough to save the world from the Great Old Ones? Or will this particular Whisperer in the Dark drive her straight past the Mountains of Madness?

Discover the unspeakable answer in this eldritch tale of cosmic comedy and tentacled terror from writer DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Monsterland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Elvira in Monsterland, Vampirella) - featuring cyclopean covers by BAAL, DAVE ACOSTA, ROBERT HACK, and a singularly stunning Elvira photo cover!

redsonja_thesuperpowersvol1-5.description_text:
The She-Devil With A Sword has battled barbarians, scuffled with sorcerers, and mangled magical creatures of all sizes. But when a collective of superheroes from THE PROJECT enter her world, will Sonja know how to adjust to their foreign ways, before they all kill each other?

...and be sure to pick up the parallel story, VAMPIRELLA: THE DARK POWERS!

barbarella_dejahthoris.description_text:
From opposite ends of time, two heroines unite for an otherworldly adventure! Barbarella, the siren of space, meets Dejah Thoris, Princess of Barsoom, and together they must solve a murder mystery that spans time and space in order to find their way home.

Leah Williams (Adventure Time Comics, Age of X-Man: X-Tremists) teams with German Garcia (Action Comics, X-men) for a fun, deadly, mind-bending epic!

elvirameetshplovecraft_issue4.description_text: Elvira is lost in the psychedelic madness of Dreamland, with no escape plan, no tour guide, and the last copy of the book every evil space god in the universe wants to get its tentacles on - the Necronomicon! Can a showgirl survive in a world full of monsters that look like 1970s prog rock album covers? Will Lovecraft rescue her, or trap her there for all eternity? You never know with that guy. Find out for sure in Chapter Four of this otherworldly comedy from author DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Monsterland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and artist KEWBER BAAL (Vampirella) - featuring non-Euclidean covers from BAAL, DAVE ACOSTA, ROBERT HACK, and the Mistress of the Dark Herself!

elvirameetshplovecraft_issue5.description_text: It's Elvira versus Lovecraft in the final showdown between the Mistress of the Dark and the Master of Cosmic Horror. Will Earth succumb to the Great Old Ones? Will a dead racist author rule over all of reality? What are the overdue fees like when you've had the Necronomicon out on loan for 4,000 years? These and other questions will finally be answered by stygian scribe DAVID AVALLONE (Elvira in Monsterland, Bettie Page: Unbound) and atavistic artist KEWBER BAAL (Vampirella, Red Rising) in this senses-shattering, all-action finale of Elvira Meets H.P. Lovecraft - encrusted in covers by BAAL, DAVE ACOSTA, ROBERT HACK, and the ever-photogenic Queen of Screams herself!

dienamitevol1-6.description_text: VAMPIRELLA hurtles through space on a Drakulon ship, desperate to uncover a dark mystery...A 100-year-old JOHN CARTER OF MARS grasps for an awful memory just out of reach...PETER CANNON: THUNDERBOLT battles waves of evil he does not understand...RED SONJA is faced with an impossible choice... DIE!NAMITE is an event series that unites all of the hit Dynamite characters as you've never seen them before! They will come together to battle the biggest threat they have ever faced. Many...are even missing faces! Collects issues 1-5 PLUS the Die!namite Valentine's Day (2021) Special.

vampirella_thedarkpowersvol1-5.description_text:
The Cosmic Saga featuring Vampirella and the heroes of Project Superpowers is here!

Welcome to THE PROJECT- an interdimensional collective of superheroes- tasked with recruiting members from across infinite worlds. And their newest recruit is...VAMPIRELLA!?

Superstar writer DAN ABNETT and artist PAUL DAVIDSON (along with the Dynamite Bullpen) bring you an epic tale that will affect thousands of planets- billions of lives- and will answer the question: 'What happens when you ask a vampire to save the universe?

Collects issues 1-5, along with a complete cover gallery.

monsterwarvol1-4.description_text: The first appearance of the Classic Monsters is now available in one trade paperback collection! Debuting in a special cross-over with the Top Cow Universe, the Classic Monsters have their sights set on Ash in the current AOD storyline, but see where it all began in this new TPB! Reprinting the entire Top Cow/Classic Monsters: Monster War 4-issue mini-series by writers Christopher Golden and Tom Sniegowski along with artists Joyce Chin and Vitor Ishimura along with a cover gallery featuring the artwork of Marc Silvestri, e-Bass, Joyce Chin, and Joseph Michael Linsner!

purgatorimustdievol1-5.description_text:
Purgatori's always pissing somebody off - but this time she's gone too far! It may have some connection to her growing insanely powerful and probably starting to kill and eat the gods. In fact, that last part for sure. And gods are like potato chips, right? It's not like she's going to stop at one. And so, the various pantheons have pooled their not inconsiderable resources to offer up a big prize to whatever psycho manages to kill her. Who wants to try? Hey, who doesn't?!

The creative team behind Vampirella Vs. Purgatori and the recent Purgatori miniseries reunite for the grand third act of this Purgatori saga! Guest-starring Evil Ernie, Vampirella, the Sacred Six... and more! Collects issues #1-5.

dienamitelivesvol1-5.description_text:
The hit series returns, cuz you can't kill a never-ending army of zombies... you can only hope to beat the $%&# out of them! After tragically losing their first Chosen One against the zombie plague, Vampirella, Miss Fury, and what remains of the Project Superpowers look for a new savior -- but Ash Williams is an even more reluctant Deadite hunter than usual! This time, the Army of Darkness has ray guns, super powers and a brilliant new general: Evil Sonja, who takes her role of Queen of Hel quite seriously!

Collecting DIE!NAMITE LIVES #1-5.

lordsofthejunglevol1-6.description_text:
Tarzan has long been the protector of his jungle stronghold... but now he journeys deep into his enemy's territory: the heart of London! Half a world away and nearly a century later, Sheena battles foes of her own when she is mysteriously swept through time and space to 1930's Africa, leaving her own land unprotected. Will these two Lords of the Jungle find enough common ground to join forces? Or will the resulting culture clash lead to mutual destruction?

For the first time ever, literary great Edgar Rice Burroughs' Lord of the Jungle teams up with Sheena, the Queen of the Jungle created by comic book legends Will Eisner and Jerry Iger!

redsonja_ageofchaosvol1-6.human_name: Red Sonja: Age of Chaos, Vol 1-6
redsonja_ageofchaosvol1-6.description_text: The past meets the present with the future of literally everything at stake! The warrior Red Sonja has a plan to keep freshly killed wizard Kulan Gath from resurrecting himself again -- but when the plan backfires, it allows a whole new kind of Chaos! to infest the Hyborean Age! Will these new beings be any easier to deal with than Kulan Gath, or has Sonja called a worse evil to her world? It's the first chapter of a brand-new quest for the She-Devil - and it may be her hardest yet as for the first time ever, Red Sonja meets the badass characters of Chaos!

prophecyvol1-7.description_text: The biggest crossover event ever from Dynamite Entertainment stars an astounding array of characters who must form an uneasy alliance and save the world from the Mayan doomsday prophecy! From sword-wielding woman warriors to mad scientists, from vampire vixens to undead overlords, Prophecy has everything ... and then some! When flame-haired warrior Red Sonja follows sorcerer Kulan Gath through time from the barbaric Hyborian Age, she unleashes a chain of events that will put her side-by-side with an unprecedented gathering of characters: Dracula, Vampirella, Pantha, Athena, Eva, Herbert West Reanimator, and Ash from "Army of Darkness." Even Sherlock Holmes, Dr. Watson, and Alan Quatermain get in on the action!

greenhornetandmissfury_issue3.description_text:
THE UNTHINKABLE HAPPENS - KATO VS. THE GREEN HORNET!

As the true identity of the ""Mask Murderer"" is finally revealed, The Green Hornet finds himself pitted against his closest friend - with Miss Fury's life hanging in the balance!

Luckily, the pulp heroine is no shrinking violet herself - and the shocking results of her own investigation may prove to be the key to survival for all three of the costumed crimefighters!

Writer ALEX SEGURA and artist FEDERICO SORRESSA turn up the heat on their streetwise heroes in The Green Hornet/Miss Fury #3 - stoked by inflammable covers from FRANCESCO FRANCAVILLA, JAE LEE & JUNE CHUNG, JONATHAN CASE, and JACOB EDGAR!

redsonjaandhellsonja_issue1.description_text:
TWO SONJAS TEAM UP TO BATTLE UNSPEAKABLE EVIL!

HELL MAY HAVE NO FURY LIKE A WOMAN SCORNED - BUT HELL'S IN REAL DANGER WITH TWO SONJAS! NEW THRILLS FROM WRITER JORDAN CLARK AND ARTIST MIRIANA PUGLIA!

HELL ON EARTH! Hell itself has begun caving in, forcing Hell Sonja to escape through a portal...she finds herself stranded on Earth, powerless, but still hunted by the evil from her home dimension. There is only one warrior strong enough to help her fight back against horrendous Hell creatures: RED SONJA!

legenderry_asteampunkadventurevol1-7.description_text: Bill Willingham, the bestselling author of DC/Vertigo's Fables, reimagines the most iconic characters of the Dynamite stable in a gorgeous and expansive Steampunk universe! A mysterious woman named Magna Spadarossa searches the many kingdoms of her world to find her missing sister, Sonja. From glamorous airships to clockwork cities to primordial jungles, Magna evades the pursuit of strange and dastardly villains, thanks to the help of many brave heroes. Featuring Red Sonja, Vampirella, Green Hornet, Kato, Flash Gordon, The Phantom, Silver Star, Captain Victory, The Six Million Dollar Man, and Zorro, as you've never seen them before!

greatestadventurevol1-9.description_text:
Heroes and heroines - along with the villains - from the entire Edgar Rice Burroughs library stand together! Tarzan, Jane Clayton and Meriem Clayton, John Carter and Dejah Thoris, Korak The Killer, Jason Gridley, Billy Byrne, Bridge, The Oskaloosa Kid, Barney and Victoria Custer, Jim Stone, Townsend Harper, Virginia Maxon, Johnny La Fitte, The Rider, Shannon Burke, Ulysses Paxton, and more! Together for the first time!

Tarzan and Jason Gridley have assembled a crew of the greatest adventurers their world has to offer. Aboard the Martian sky ship Venture, they've set off in pursuit of a powerful gemstone called the Eye of Judgment. They're in a race to find the gem against an alien battleship called the Resolve. If the villains aboard the Resolve get it first, they'll be able to construct a death ray that can reach across the stars themselves, and kill anyone on any world, with the touch of a button.

Explore the worlds of Edgar Rice Burroughs as never before with Eisner Award-winning writer Bill Willingham (Fables) and artist Cezar Razek (Red Sonja) exploring every corner of the Burroughs world in this 248-page hardcover collecting the complete, 9-issue epic, and featuring all of the covers by Cary Nord (Conan), Greg Smallwood (All-New Guardians of the Galaxy), Roberto Castro (Red Ronja/Conan), and more!

masks2vol1-8.description_text: Before Superheroes, there were Masks! The Shadow. The Green Hornet and Kato. The Spider. In 1938, these masked vigilantes operated outside the law, working independently to strike fear into the hearts of evildoers. But when the corrupt politicians of the Justice Party transform New York into a fascist state run by mobsters, when an oppressive regime grants jack-booted stormtroopers free rein to imprison, extort, and execute the innocent, when the law itself becomes unjust - justice must be served by outlaws! Outnumbered and outgunned, the legendary vigilantes emerge from the shadows to fight, joined by Zorro, the Green Lama, Miss Fury, Black Terror, and the Black Bat! Nine renowned pulp heroes, brought together for the first time in an epic conflict of Law vs. Justice!

vampirellaandarmyofdarknessvol1-4.description_text:
Horror icons from two universes collide as Ash Williams, the chainsaw-armed Chosen One of the small and big screen, crosses paths with the supernatural superheroine Vampirella in a story set during the events of the cult classic film, Army of Darkness!

When Ash misspoke the incantation to acquire the Necronomicon, an unholy book written in blood, the spell ripped Vampirella - a force for good, despite her blood-hungry fangs - from her own time and back to 1300 AD. Infected by Deadite magic, she stalks the halls of Lord Arthur's castle, unable to control her thirst. Even if that time-lost chucklehead Ash can free her of the demonic mutation, can he convince his allies - primitive screwheads that they are - that she shouldn't be burned at the stake?

redsonjaandhellsonja_issue3.description_text:
A HORDE OF NIGHTMARES HAVE INVADED THE EARTH!

AS REALITY UNRAVELS, HELL SONJA MUST FACE THE HORROR OF HER NEW HUMAN BODY!

Alone and surrounded by cosmic horrors, Hell Sonja must find a way to escape the nightmares hunting her. But there is one horror she cannot escape, her new human body. Reality continues to unravel in this chilling adventure by writer Jordan Clark and artist Miriana Puglia.

redsonjaandtarzanvol1-6.description_text:
Eson Duul is an evil man. The mere mention of his name makes powerful quake with fear. He has no regard for life, including that of man. But he may finally have met his match when he finds himself up against Red Sonja and Tarzan!

Gail Simone (Birds of Prey, Red Sonja) and Walter Geovani (Red Sonja, Clean Room) reunite to bring us the crossover event featuring two of fiction's greatest heroes side by side at last!

bloodqueenvsdracula_issue1.description_text: The Prince of Darkness clashes with Elizabeth Bathory in this explosive new mini-series! Dracula returns from war to face a potential threat in the form of the Blood Queen. Whether they become allies or adversaries, there will be blood!

comicbooklegaldefensefund.description_text:
Donations to support Comic Book Legal Defense Fund are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Comic Book Legal Defense Fund is a non-profit organization protecting the freedom to read comics! Our work protects readers, creators, librarians, retailers, publishers, & educators who face the threat of censorship. We monitor legislation & challenge laws that would limit the First Amendment. We create resources that promote understanding of comics & the rights our community is guaranteed. Every day we publish news & information about censorship events as they happen. We are partners in the Kids' Right to Read Project & Banned Books Week. Our expert legal team is available at a moment's notice to respond to First Amendment emergencies. CBLDF is a lean organization that works hard to protect the rights that our community depends on. Please support our important work!

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Dynamite Character Crossover Comics by Dynamite
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: Killer character crossovers for the new year
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Chaos! Vol 1-6, Masks, Vol 1-8, DIE!NAMITE Vol 1-6, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: We’ve assembled Dynamite Entertainment’s hottest eComics into a bundle you won’t want to miss. Vampirella, John Carter of Mars, Red Sonja, and the universe’s greatest heroes collide in an epic series of battles across DIE!NAMITE Vols. 1–6. Grab your boomstick for the action-packed mayhem of Army of Darkness: Ash vs. the Classic Monsters, Vols. 1–6. Bad guys beware—the femme fatales of Dynamite unite to stop a legendary evil in Swords of Sorrow: The Complete Saga. Pay what you want and help support the Comic Book Legal Defense Fund!
from_bundle.author: Dynamite Entertainment

voices_shortphrasesvoiceoverpack.human_name: Voices: Short Phrases Voice Over Pack
voices_shortphrasesvoiceoverpack.description_text:
Click here to view the full list of voice lines in the Short Phrases Voice Over Pack.

Introduce a new level of immersion with the Short Phrases Voice Over Pack by Ovani Sound. This collection provides a diverse range of high-quality voice lines, recorded by real human voice actors - ensuring authentic, natural performances, and not AI or computer-generated voices.

With a total of 190 finely tuned voice lines, this pack includes both male and female voices across various categories:

Affirmations: Boost character interactions with confident responses like "I got it," "I understand," and "Yes, I can do that." Ideal for task confirmations and supportive character feedback.

Commands: Add authority and urgency to your scenes with commanding lines like "Chop chop," "Keep walking," and "Don’t go messing around." Perfect for leaders, guides, and assertive characters.

Greetings: Set the tone with friendly welcomes and goodbyes such as "Hello there," "Have a nice day," and "Welcome to paradise." Great for NPCs, merchants, and approachable characters.

Merchant: Bring your shopkeepers and traders to life with engaging lines like "Can I interest you in some information?" "We got all sorts of stuff here," and "Thanks for stopping by." Perfect for in-game marketplaces and interactions.

Observations: Enrich your storytelling with observational comments like "I think I heard something," "It's dark in here," and "This place is beautiful." These lines help characters react naturally to their environment.

Questions: Add curiosity and interaction with probing questions such as "Can you help me?" "What do you need?" and "Is that all you've got?" Ideal for creating engaging dialogues and quest prompts.

Statements: Enhance emotional depth and character backstories with lines like "For honor and for glory," "I got your back," and "Victory is ours." These statements are perfect for motivational moments, battle cries, or casual conversations.

Elevate your voice-driven projects with the Voices: Short Phrases pack. Each line is meticulously designed for seamless integration, ensuring an immersive auditory experience that adds personality and realism to your characters.

44.1kHz/16bit

childrensmiraclenetworkhospitals.description_text:
Payments to Children's Miracle Network Hospitals are made via the PayPal Giving Fund.

Children's Miracle Network Hospitals raises funds and awareness for 170 member hospitals that provide 32 million treatments each year to kids across the U.S. and Canada. Donations stay local to fund critical treatments and healthcare services, pediatric medical equipment and charitable care. Since 1983, Children's Miracle Network Hospitals has raised more than five billion dollars, most of it one dollar at a time through the charity's Miracle Balloon icon.

minecraftmusicplugin.description_text:
Unlike standard Minecraft Addons that are limited to starting and stopping songs, our groundbreaking Music Plugin completely changes the game. This plugin allows you to fully control your in-game music experience, offering developers the power to adjust song intensity, choose specific tracks, and enable random song play, all through an intuitive user interface.

Key features include seamless looping, the ability to fade volume up or down at any time, crossfade between songs, and even play different music to different players. You can queue up playlists or use our built-in "Intensities" mode, which lets you dynamically crossfade between low, medium, and high-intensity tracks.

Whether you pair it with our custom music packs or use your own tracks, our plugin empowers you to create immersive soundscapes that elevate gameplay to a new level.

unrealmusicplugin.description_text: Adding music to a game can be overwhelming. Our Unreal Audio Plugin takes the headache out of the process and frees you to handle the more creative aspects of game development. You’ll see how you are able to easily trigger changes in song intensity, song selection, and random song play through our easy to use UI. All of this while working with seamless looping capability. Pair this with one of our specially-made music packs, and you’re set up to make a captivating experience that players can get lost in.

unityfrequencylinkplugin.description_text:
Connect Sound with Game Actions

Elevate your game design with the Unity Frequency Link Plugin from Ovani Sound, a powerful tool that links audio to in-game elements.

View the entire audio spectrum directly within the Unity Editor, define specific frequency ranges or broader audio patterns, and broadcast them across your game. Visualize these patterns in real-time to see their impact, and easily pick up on them through scripts or Components to drive in-game actions—controlling colors, animating objects, or creating responsive effects. From subtle visual shifts to dramatic gameplay changes, this plugin lets you connect your audio environment with interactive, engaging game experiences.

godotfrequencylinkplugin.description_text:
Connect Sound with Game Actions.

Elevate your game design with the Godot Frequency Link Plugin from Ovani Sound, a powerful tool that links audio to in-game elements.

View the entire audio spectrum within the Godot Editor, and easily define measurable audio patterns that can be broadcasted across your game. Visualize each pattern to understand their connections, then use scripts or Nodes to link frequency ranges to control elements such as colors, object movement, or other game mechanics. Whether adjusting a light’s intensity or syncing a bouncing ball to the beat, this plugin gives you the freedom to create truly dynamic audio-responsive gameplay.

voices_wordlessexpressionsvoiceoverpack.description_text:
Click here to view the full list of voice lines in the Voices: Wordless Expressions Pack

Enhance your characters’ emotional depth with the Voices: Wordless Expressions pack by Ovani Sound. This unique collection features verbal gestures and non-verbal sounds, recorded by professional voice actors Bryce Garland, D'laina Hunt, Serina Moonshine, Hannah Weeks, Michael Smith, Simoné Oosthuizen, and Stefanie Wolfes - ensuring authentic, natural performances, and not AI or computer-generated voices.

With a total of 170 finely crafted voice lines, this pack is organized into key categories across multiple performers:

Attack and Effort Sounds: The largest category, featuring a wide array of grunts, yells, and exertion noises. Whether it's intense combat, heavy lifting, or pushing through tough situations, these sounds provide the raw energy needed for action-packed scenes. Each actor contributes multiple variations, ensuring versatility for different scenarios.

Pain and Struggle Sounds: Capture the distress and physical strain of characters with numerous pain grunts, cries, and struggle sounds. These are perfect for conveying injuries, combat damage, and moments of endurance under stress, adding realism and intensity to your characters' experiences.

Annoyed, Taunting, and Flirtatious Sounds: Express irritation, playful mockery, and light-hearted interactions with a range of sighs, scoffs, taunts, and flirtatious giggles. These sounds bring out the personality in your characters, whether they're teasing, provoking, or engaging in more intimate moments.

Breaths, Gasps, and Sighs: Immerse players in high-stress or emotional situations with varied breath sounds, gasps of surprise, and deep sighs. These vocal gestures enhance scenes where characters are reacting to danger, relief, or exhaustion.

Laughs and Joyful Sounds: Lighten the mood with an assortment of laughs, chuckles, and joyful expressions. These sounds are perfect for adding warmth and charm to your characters, making them feel more relatable and alive.

Miscellaneous Expressions: Includes a selection of other non-verbal sounds such as coughing, throat clearing, drowning, and emerging from water. These additional cues are ideal for specific situational needs, adding extra layers of realism to your scenes.

Elevate your voice-driven projects with the Voices: Wordless Expressions pack. Each sound is meticulously designed for seamless integration, ensuring an immersive auditory experience that transcends language barriers, making it a versatile choice for any project.

basic_data.description:

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $561. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF, MOBI, and ePub formats, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Worldreader. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

gettingoutofdebtfordummies.human_name: Getting Out of Debt For Dummies
gettingoutofdebtfordummies.description_text: Say farewell to Buy Now/Pay Later habit and get spiraling debt under control. This practical, commonsense guide provides straightforward strategies for coping with every kind of secured and unsecured debt, including, personal loans, car loans, mortgages, home equity loans, lines of credit, credit cards, finance company loans, and student loans. Inside: Decide which bills to pay-off first Consolidate debt Use credit cards responsibly Build up a solid credit score Really understand the buy now pay later platforms Distinguish between good and bad debt Manage student loans the right way, plus explore the new student loan repayment plan (SAVE) by the Biden administration Start a system to track debt and protect life after debt How to recognize the warning signs of serious debt How to negotiate with angry creditors, collection agencies, and the IRS How to design a realistic and painless payback schedule

makingfriendsasanadultfordummies.human_name: Making Friends as an Adult For Dummies
makingfriendsasanadultfordummies.description_text: Maybe youve been trying to make a new friend for years now and wondering why you havent had success. Or perhaps youre new to the area and would like to meet some new people, but dont know where to start. Perhaps youve just retired and have to create an entire new social circle from scratch. Or maybe you have hundreds of Facebook friends but dont feel close to any of them. Whether youre single or married, have children or are childfree, many people face these same challenges. You are not alone. Making Friends as an Adult For Dummies, 1st Edition will explore many reasons why its so hard to make new friends as an adult and how to gain new ones, including: Information on how many hours it takes to make a casual vs. good vs. close vs. best friend Quizzes to help you assess your friendship needs and assess if you're struggling with loneliness How to know when you've found a person who'd make a good friend, and how to know when a person isn't your kind of people Methods of effective communication to resolve conflict in new and existing platonic relationships How to kindly end a friendship The basic requirements of how to maintain and be a good friend

sidehustlesfordummies.description_text: EVERY DAY IM SIDE HUSTLIN A side hustle can be anything from developing apps, driving for Uber, or starting an online boutique. In this book, well help you find your niche, and teach you all the steps to turning your side hustle idea into a reality. While a side hustle is going to require effort and time, the energy will be poured towards an interest of yours, which is a main differentiator between a side hustle and any other job. In these pages youll learn:   What you need to learn to set up a side hustle How to plug any holes in your plan Understand time commitments Is investment capital necessary Steering clear of side hustle scams How to broaden, expand, and evolve your side hustle as time goes by

solotravelfordummies.description_text: After a few years of being cooped up in our homes because of the pandemic, interest in traveling alone is absolutely booming. Google trend data saw a 760% increase in solo travel searches in 2021! With the help of Solo Travel For Dummies, seasoned jet-setters and trepidatious travelers alike will learn everything they need to know, from choosing their destination to planning a fulfilling itinerary to saving money and crucial safety information. Readers will learn how to overcome common concerns associated with solo travel such as loneliness and getting lost, and how to plan for both domestic and international travel. With a portable, easily digestible size, Solo Travel For Dummies is packed with all the information readers want without any unnecessary fluff to weigh it down

rentingfordummies.description_text: The process of finding and securing a rental home or apartment can be confusing, complicated, and frustrating. With more and more people renting (many for the first time), they're looking for a comprehensive reference to guide them. Renting For Dummies is a practical how-to guide for renters that walks readers through the rental process, from the initial apartment hunt, to finding roommates and furnishing your new space, moving out and getting your security deposit back, and everything in between. Renting For Dummies will streamline the renting process and provide real-life scenarios to ensure the reader gains the best perspective. INSIDE: Navigating the application process Questions to ask a potential landlord or property manager Dealing with bad or no credit  Negotiating a lease Moving essentials Securing renters' insurance Renter-friendly ways to spruce up your new place Getting your security deposit back

cookingforonefordummies.description_text: NO DINNER GUESTS, NO PROBLEM Cooking For One For Dummies will teach the large singles market how to cook delicious, healthy meals even when there isnt a packed dinner table. Living alone doesnt have to mean take-out, frozen dinners, or weeks of leftovers. Learn from step-by-step guides, re-think your grocery shopping, and follow dozens of fantastic recipes to transform your kitchen into a cooking-for-one paradise. INSIDE: Over 100 recipes 8-page color insert Step-by-step explanations Examples grocery lists

moderndatingfordummies.description_text: The dating landscape continues to evolve, shaped by technology, cultural shifts, and individual preferences. Online dating platforms remain popular, offering a vast array of choices and personalized algorithms to match potential partners. Video profiles and virtual dates have become commonplace, bridging geographical gaps and allowing for more meaningful connections. However, amidst the digital noise, theres a growing desire for authenticity--people seek genuine interactions beyond curated profiles. Offline encounters regain significance, with singles attending events, joining clubs, and participating in shared activities. Navigating this dynamic world involves balancing vulnerability, communication, and self-discovery. Whether swiping right or meeting face-to-face, the quest for love remains both exciting and challenging. Modern Dating For Dummies offers a helpful resource to guide you on a journey to find love. How to deal with being ghosted How to remember what you bring to the table Relationship anxiety management techniques How to protect from romance scams and dating fraud Navigating non-monogamous relationships, intimacy challenges THE FOLLOW UP and how to avoid the friend-zone Dating after a breakup or losing a spouse or partner Dating in 50s, 60s, and 70s. Same sex dating, and more

moneymanagementessentialsfordummies.description_text: Manage your money with just the essentials Money is one of the major stressors in life, and trying to achieve financial security with a mountain of debt can seem impossible. Money Management Essentials For Dummies is here to show you the steps to get to a place of stability with your money. With this book, youll tackle the basics of creating an emergency fund, managing debt, acquiring insurance, investing your money, and setting financial goals. Set yourself up for financial success with this essentials guide. Includes: Understanding financial security Building an emergency fund Managing debt Investing your money Planning your estate

homebuyingkitfordummies8thedition.human_name:
Home Buying Kit For Dummies, 
8th Edition
homebuyingkitfordummies8thedition.description_text: Your one-stop guide to navigating the housing market Your home will likely be the biggest purchase you ever make in your life. It's also the purchase governed by the most rules, regulations, and steps on the road from falling in love with a house to calling it your own. This bestselling guide aimed at first-time and inexperienced home buyers offers a map to navigating the occasionally choppy waters of buying a home. Get insight on evaluating if you're financially ready to buy a house, how to secure a mortgage, building a team of advisors, negotiating a deal, and what to do after you buy. A small investment in know-how now will pay off in making the home buying process a smoother road. Inside... Setting your home buying budget Getting approved for a mortgage Choosing the home that fits your needs Determining a fair price Surviving inspection Exploring the paperwork of a real estate deal

financialliteracyessentialsfordummies.description_text: Tackle financial insecurity with just the essentials Money is a constant in life. No matter where you go, expenses are inescapable. Financial Literacy Essentials For Dummies gives you the foundation you need to get your finances on track and plan for the future. Youll understand the basics of earning, saving, investing and more. Start spending smartly with a budget and work on growing your financial health. Money doesnt have to be scary with this essentials guide. Includes: Budgeting basics Creating savings accounts Demystifying debt Investing your money Managing financial risks

budgettravelfordummies.description_text: The pent-up demand and desire for travel predicted throughout the height of the pandemic has arrived, and Budget Travel For Dummies will help you plan enjoyable and affordable vacations.   Budget Travel For Dummies is written by a travel expert who has visited 60 countries across 6 continents without breaking the bank. This helpful guide will help you find the best deals, including finding cheap flights and accommodations. Youll learn: how to pick a destination; how to set and stick to a budget; how to focus on less so you can enjoy more; how you can set up your credit cards and bank accounts to minimize fees; managing health and travel insurance; how its possible to travel without a plan; what to pack and what to leave behind; how to live for months with just carry-on luggage; how to create specific packing lists for different climates; which electronics to bring on every trip and gadgets to avoid; how to get inexpensive international data anywhere in the world; must-have apps ; how to explore efficiently; how to navigate local metro systems; how to avoid the most common travel mistakes; tips for staying flexible, so you can stay longer if your plans change; best practices for changing flights vs.  canceling flights; and dealing with passport or visa issues.

personalfinanceinyour20sand30sfordummies.human_name: Personal Finance in Your 20s & 30s For Dummies, 4th Edition
personalfinanceinyour20sand30sfordummies.description_text: Make financial choices that don't haunt you People in their 20s and 30s get their first tastes of making their own financial decisions. Faced with making decisions about budgeting, investing, purchasing insurance, and making housing choices for the first time, making a bad choice could have long-term consequences. This book offers friendly guidance designed to help new adults with adulting for the first time. Get proven advice on topics like managing debt, co-managing finances with a partner, and gathering good information. Written by the best-selling author of Personal Finance For Dummies, this guide offers a roadmap to building financial health in the future. Inside... Completing a financial checkup Saving for future goals Maximizing your earnings Managing bank accounts wisely Safeguarding your income Identifying trustworthy advisers Prioritizing the value of your money

upcyclingfurnitureandhomedecorfordummies.human_name: Upcycling Furniture & Home Decor For Dummies
upcyclingfurnitureandhomedecorfordummies.description_text: Upcycling Furniture For Dummies shows readers how to turn household items that would normally go to waste into exciting home furnishings for their own homes, or as a fun money-making. This book is for people who want to turn trash into treasure, and for those who are thrifty and eco-conscious and who want to save useful furniture from hitting the landfill. This book will give readers the knowledge and confidence to create beautiful, upcycled furniture, offering ideas and specific techniques that make the process easy and enjoyable!

adultingfordummies.description_text: Adulting For Dummies helps readers learn the essential skills they need to be independent and empowered adults.  This book will cover the basics, such as making financial decisions, how to create a budget, making investments, loans, and credit; preparing your taxes; laundry and clothing repairs; healthy food choices; how to manage your career goals; and how to strengthen your communication skills and have satisfying and supportive relationships. Adulting For Dummies will help fill the life skills knowledge gap for younger generations.

cookingbasicsfordummies5thedition.description_text: Packed with easy-to-follow guidelines and recipes, Cooking Basics For Dummies, 5th Edition, helps the novice chef navigate the kitchen and learn fundamental techniques and recipes. From dicing vegetables, cracking and hard boiling an egg to roasting meat, this edition includes information on:         Popular cooking techniques such as using pressure cookers       How to cut open hard-shelled vegetables       Sautéing basics       Quick and delicious sauces to take fish, pork, chicken, or beef to a whole new level.       Shopping at farmer's markets, CSAs (Community Sustainable Agriculture co-ops), and buying organic        Navigating a new world of greens: Curly leaf and Tuscan Kale, Bok Choy, escarole, and scallions       Plus online articles on adapting to the latest dietary trends, such as low-sugar, low-sodium, low-fat, plant-based, vegetarian meals, and classic techniques such as grilling and slow cooking

breathingexercisesfordummies.description_text: We breathe automatically day and night without thinking about it, but what if we're doing it wrong? It turns out many people arent breathing correctly, which can lead to a variety of health issues, including anxiety, asthma, stress, lack of focus, poor sleep, and more. Breathing Exercises For Dummies will serve as a powerful path to improve your everyday breathing. Additionally, these exercises can reduce stress and anxiety in the moment, while also improving focus, decision-making, energy levels, and creativity. Breathing exercises can help us relax when needed, and also energize us when required. Included: The benefits of breathing exercises Types of breathing exercises: From pursed lip breathing to diaphragmatic breathing to 4-7-8 breathing, and more Exercises to achieve benefits in a wide range of issues including: managing acute/chronic pain; helping with insomnia, anxiety, depression, sleep, improving creativity and mindfulness Breathing exercises in the workplace, at home, and even school Breathing exercises to help with athletic and performing arts performance

nutritionfordummies7thedition.description_text: The 2020-2025 Dietary Guidelines for Americans will be out later this year. The guidelines provide evidence-based nutrition information and advice to help Americans make healthy choices about food and beverage in their daily lives.   Nutrition For Dummies, 7th Edition, will include the latest information, including what readers need to know about the upcoming report and its suggestions for living a nutritionally-sound life. New and updated information includes: Focus on life stages: For the first time, specific guidance will be included for pregnant women, as well as infants and toddlers from birth to 24 months. Dietary patterns: What is the relationship between dietary patterns (at each stage of life) and disease? Obesity and dementia: A study has found that obesity in midlife is linked to a greater risk of dementia later in life. The end of the peanut allergy?: Peanut allergies could become a thing of the past as breakthrough research from the University of South Australia develops a radically novel vaccination thats poised to cure the potentially life threatening condition. Eating disorders: New research on DNA samples from thousands of people with anorexia has found a link to genes involved in regulating metabolism, as well as those connected with anxiety and obsessive-compulsive disorders.

worldreader.description_text:
Donations to support Worldreader are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Worldreader is a global nonprofit bringing digital books children and their families, empowering them to read, think, and grow in order to improve their lives and their world. In its first five years, Worldreader has reached 5.6 million readers in 69 countries with a digital library of 28,500 local and international e-books to e-readers and mobile phones, and aims to reach 10 million readers with its digital library by the end of 2015 and 15 million readers by 2018. To read free books on your mobile phone, visit booksmart.worldreader.org For more information on Worldreader, visit http://www.worldreader.org.

jobinterviewingfordummies.description_text: Job Interviewing For Dummies provides readers with a structured, step-by-step approach to succeed in job interviews.    The goal is to level the playing field by providing information, strategies, and examples to empower anyone to present their best self in an interview, with advice on how to anticipate and prepare for the most likely questions. Job Interviewing For Dummies will also offer advice for common challenges and special situations, including: how to prepare for an interview when given short notice; how to explain awkward gaps in your resume; how to brush up rusty interviewing skills if you are out of practice; and how to change your interview approach when want to change careers. The book focuses on actionable advice, with examples and stories from the interview trenches. Successful interviewing is an important lifelong skill and it can be learned. This book will help readers boost their confidence!

stressmanagementfordummies3rdedition.description_text: The consequences of not dealing with stress range from poor health and broken marriages to premature death: not a very cheerful outlook. Whether it's love, work, family, or something else that's got your anxiety in the red zone, this third edition of Stress Management For Dummies helps readers identify the stress triggers in their life and cut them down to size, with new and updated advice. New to this edition: New scientific findings on the relationship between stress and our health A new chapter introducing readers to ACT therapy, Acceptance and Commitment Therapy Updated material diving into the power of gratitude and perspective An expanded section on how technology can negatively affect us and our children

howtofixeverythingfordummies.human_name: How to Fix Everything For Dummies
howtofixeverythingfordummies.description_text: This hands-on, informative Do-it-Yourself (DIY) manual shows readers not only how to fix faulty appliances but also tend to all those irritating repairs that cost more to have someone else fix than the item is worth.  Featuring clear, concise directions, How to Fix Everything For Dummies will explain how to fix furniture (like wobby chair or table legs and fixing nicks, etc), vacuum cleaners, refrigerators, washers, dryers, dishwashers, garbage disposals, toasters, blenders, radios, televisions, and even computers and printer glitches. How to Fix Everything For Dummies will also cover using the proper tools and materials to get the job done correctly without breaking the bank.  It's an excellent reference guide to have in the home for fixing everyone's stuff.

sustainablefashionfordummies.description_text: Sustainable Fashion For Dummies is an easy-to-read handbook that helps consumers get started on their sustainable fashion journey, and sets them up for long-term success by providing practical tips and strategies.  The book outlines, in a digestible format, inexpensive options to help readers meet their goals of making more environmentally-friendly fashion choices. Until the fashion industry begins to minimize its negative impact on the environment, consumers must pick up new habits to align with a more sustainable future - this book will show you how!

investinginyour20sand30sfordummies3rdedi.human_name: Investing in Your 20s & 30s For Dummies, 3rd Edition
investinginyour20sand30sfordummies3rdedi.description_text: Investing in your 20s & 30s For Dummies, 3rd Edition will provide emerging professionals with the targeted investment advice they need to establish their own unique investment style. Covering everything from the latest tax laws to new and popular investing funds, this latest edition helps Millennials evaluate assets and manage risk to invest money wisely, and monitor their progress. Start building a nest egg for retirement Understand investment lingo Determine a investment timeline and goals UPDATES: ? New tax laws and impact on investors ? The Robinhood investing phenomenon ? Investing through Robo-advisors ? From impact to socially responsible investing: Top fields Millennials are investing in Lessons from COVID-19 on the market and real estate investing Marketing

findingyourpassionfordummies.description_text: Finding Your Passion For Dummies is for anyone who wants to find their passion and pursue it in a way that aligns with their values and interests. The book provides motivation and inspiration, discusses the benefits of pursuing one's passion, and guides readers through self-discovery, goal setting, exploring different areas of interest, building connections, finding passion in your current career, entrepreneurship, pursuing education and training, developing your skills and expertise, and overcoming obstacles.  Finding Your Passion For Dummies offers guidance and practical advice on how to identify and pursue your passion - with tips and exercises to help you understand your values, interests, and natural talents, and identify what you are passionate about. The book shares success stories of people who have found their passion and pursued it, and will inspire readers to take action and make positive changes in their lives.

reducingyourtaxesfordummies.description_text: Get year-round insight on reducing tax burdens Tax filing season can be a painful process if you discover u owe the government more than you anticipated. Avoiding that unpleasant scenario requires planning and managing finances well before your returns are due. This guide offers strategies, tips, and plans to individual taxpayers for managing your money so more stays in your pocket. Written by the million-selling financial guru Eric Tyson (Personal Finance For Dummies, Taxes For Dummies), the book explains investments, savings plans, and other strategies for reducing your personal tax burden. Inside... Avoiding common mistakes Maximizing your retirement account Investing in a tax-wise way Getting breaks in real estate Finding breaks in your family Planning your estate

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Adulting for Dummies by Wiley
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get , , Breathing Exercises For Dummies, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Need some cheat codes for life? We’re here to help you figure out adulting with a little help from our latest For Dummies Bundle. The experts at Wiley can prepare you for anything with their award-winning series of ebooks, including Renting For Dummies, Modern Dating For Dummies, How to Fix Everything For Dummies, and much more. Make 2026 the best year of your adult life and help support Worldreader when you learn new skills and save big.
from_bundle.author: Wiley

basic_data.human_name: Decked Out Collection: Great on Handheld
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb:
If you’re in the midst of travel planning for the new year (or just have a really long commute to and from work every day) you’re likely looking for some portable entertainment on the go. If games are what you’re looking for and you have a Steam Deck, we have good news for you: a bundle of great games you can take with you anywhere, that will transport you even further. Enjoy the best of ‘90s shooters with the delightfully retro skill-based action in ULTRAKILL. Slay or be slayed by hordes of the undead and survive the night in Vampire Survivors. Outrun the end of the world through multiple universes in Haste, and more! Take these games with you wherever you go, and support the American Cancer Society with every purchase at the price of your choice.

Keys expire. Please redeem keys before January 28th, 2027.
