vampiresurvivors.callout: The OG that kickstarted the Survivors genre! Get to slaying some vampires, now with local co-op! (Steam Deck Verified)
vampiresurvivors.description_text:
Vampire Survivors is a time survival game with minimalistic gameplay and roguelite elements.
Hell is empty, the devils are here, and there's no place to run or hide. All you can do is survive as long as you can until death inevitably puts an end to your struggles. Gather gold in each run to buy upgrades and help the next survivor.

The supernatural indie phenomenon that lets you be the bullet hell!

Now with local co-op for up to 4 players!

  • Supports mouse, keyboard, controller, and touch screen.
Starting Tips
  • Take your time to grab gems and items, they won't disappear.
  • Get two or three offensive weapons at first, but focus on leveling them up one at a time.
  • Armour and Luck are good starting power-ups to spend money on.
  • Refund power-ups often, it's free, and try new upgrade paths.
v0.1.0 release date:
- itch: Mar 31, 2021
- Steam: Dec 17, 2021

ultrakill.callout: Keys are low. We are in the process of restocking keys for this title.
ultrakill.description_text:
ULTRAKILL is a fast-paced ultraviolent old school FPS that fuses together classic shooters like Quake , modern shooters like Doom (2016) and character action games like Devil May Cry .

Mankind has gone extinct and the only beings left on earth are machines fueled by blood .
But now that blood is starting to run out on the surface...
Machines are racing to the depths of Hell in search of more.
  • Use your many movement abilities to stay mobile and avoid the relentless attacks of the dead, demons and other machines.
  • Destroy them with an arsenal of incredibly powerful weapons, each with multiple available variations.
  • Soak yourself in their blood to regain health and keep fighting.
  • Kill fast and with SSStyle to rack up combos and gain points that can be used on weapon variations between missions.
  • Master the many levels to achieve high ranks and take on unique optional challenges.
  • Explore the varied and unique campaign environments inspired by Dante's Inferno to find plentiful hidden secrets

haste.callout: Key delivery delayed. We are in the process of restocking keys for this title.
haste.description_text:
Haste is a high-speed third-person running game, set in a collapsing universe. Race through a variety of worlds, master your movement and use items and abilities to progress through each level before it falls apart around you. The game consists of ten Shards, each featuring a collection of procedurally generated levels that must be completed without fail to unlock the next. You’ll encounter challenges and characters on your journey, seeking answers about what lies behind the destruction, and how to escape it!


FEATURES

  • Third-person high-speed running gameplay

  • Both single player and online co-op running

  • 10 Shards, each featuring a collection of procedurally generated levels that must be completed without fail to advance to the next Shard

  • 90+ Items that let you customize your build for each attempt to clear a Shard

  • A story to explore and a lovable cast of characters to befriend

  • Four spectacular biomes with several different variations

  • 4 abilities to master and 4 different bosses to discover

  • An unlockable endless mode



MASTER YOUR MOVEMENT

Mind-blowing speed is key and every landing counts! Hit the ground running (literally) and you’ll build up speed, but if you fumble it will cost you. You’ll need to think fast and keep track of your ever-changing surroundings to escape before the world crumbles beneath your feet.


ITEMS

In your run you'll be able to collect Sparks to use in the shop levels to manifest items. Items help you customise your run, affecting speed, damage, luck, health and other variables.


PROCEDURAL WORLDS

Speed through procedurally generated levels as you make your way through each Shard, completing every level before you run out of lives to advance to the next. Gather items and experiment with builds to help you on your way. Your journey through the broken worlds will be unique to you as you try to outrun the apocalypse.

CO-OP RUNNING

You can now play through the entire game with other Zoes! It's cooperative in that you work together to progress, but we also keep track of player times in levels, which allows for some friendly and pleasant competition. To keep your friends apart we have unlockable skins!


THE CREW

As Zoe, you’ll meet different characters to aid you on your journey, whether through wisdom, encouragement or items to assist you.

nidhogg2.description_text:
The wurm has returned and it must feed! Shed your garments and paint the walls with the flesh of your enemies, for only one can be worthy of sacrifice.

The rules are simple. Reach the other side and kill anyone that stands in your way. Deftly parry and rend their throats, riddle their bowels with arrows, or squish their brains between your toes. The wurm cares not for chivalry.

Sequel to the indie hit of 2014, Nidhogg 2 builds upon the award-winning gameplay of its predecessor with new weapons to wield and levels to master, head-to-toe character customization, and the captivatingly grotesque art of Toby Dixon.

And, with music from artists including Mux Mool, Geotic, Doseone, Osborne, and Daedelus, Nidhogg 2 has a soundtrack so good that even the menu screens are awesome.

Game Features:
  • Challenge the AI or a friend in 1v1 combat.
  • Fight for the top seat in 8-player tournaments.
  • Master the distinctive traits of four weapons.
  • Get stylish with full character customization.
  • Ten stages from castles to Nidhogg innards.
  • Alter the rules with over 10 different game variables.
  • Go online with matchmaking and private games.

deathbulge_battleofthebands.description_text:
You play as Faye, Ian and Briff, a 3-piece band of dysfunctional friends who unknowingly stumble into a cursed battle of the bands contest, where all entrants can attack with music and must fight to the death.

Kick down every single door you come across. If you're gonna rudely enter every RPG house despite lack of invite, might as well enter in style.

Customise the band with 9 musically-themed classes to choose from, each with their own attacks, perks and COOL OUTFIT. Inspire your bandmates as a BUSKER or recklessly deal huge damage at the cost of damaging yourself as a HEADBANGER.

Fancy combat system that focuses on MEASURE EFFECTS. What happens BETWEEN turns makes all the difference, combining real-time elements with turn-based combat in a way that we're ALMOST CERTAIN has never been done before. (It's been over a year since release and no one's said otherwise yet!)

Other features:

  • Roughly 15-20 hours of game time.

  • Late game dating segment.

  • Sew patches of band logos onto your BATTLE JACKET for extra perks in battle.

  • No Random Encounters! Monsters will be shown on the field for your avoiding leisure, and 3 different FIELD ABILITIES with which to avoid them.

  • Unique item system. Say good bye to individually stocking up on consumable items! Once you get a piece of MERCH, you keep it forever, and it simply costs STOCK to use, a refillable global resource for all your merch.

  • Original soundtrack that'll make you say things like SIIICK and OH RIGHT ON.

  • Incredibly rich world boasting a wide variety of colourful characters whose dialogue changes as you progress through the game. Every single NPC is unique, armed with their own dialogue portaits to express themselves TO THE MAX.

  • Even the ITEMS have personality. Say bye bye to the generic "health potion". Local NPC Barry Friendly is taking care of the soothing beverages around here. Sink into a warm cup of BARRY FRIENDLY'S TEA whenever your health is low. Maybe you'll even have the pleasure of meeting Barry at some point.

americancancersociety.description_text:
Donations to support American Cancer Society are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

The American Cancer Society is committed to saving lives from cancer and reducing the threat of the disease, not just in the United States, but globally as well. Cancer causes 1 in 8 deaths worldwide and is rapidly becoming a global pandemic. Our global work is focused on preventing cancer, saving lives, diminishing suffering, catalyzing a local response in the countries where we work, and shaping the global policy agenda.

The American Cancer Society does not endorse any product or service.

backpackhero.description_text:
The inventory management roguelike!
Collect rare items, organize your backpack, and vanquish your foes!

Backpack Hero is a twist on your standard deck-building roguelike. It isn't just about what you carry, but how you organize the items within your bag!

Placement has a huge impact on your items – find the right spot in your backpack to increase their power! Explore ancient dungeons, caves, swamps, and more! Meet colorful friends and fight deadly foes! Don't get lost!

When you aren't putting your life in danger, you can make good use of the resources you have gathered and rebuild your hometown of Haversack Hill!

Turn it into a charming and efficient hamlet to attract new residents. Buy and sell items, conduct research, and unlock heroes, challenges, and quests. By organizing the perfect village, you will restore the world of Orderia and rescue the animals who live there!

Experiment with your strategy and create game-breaking solutions
  • Collect 800+ distinct items , with ingenious powers and synergies to harness
  • Battle with over 100+ enemies. Learn their attack patterns and vanquish your foes
  • Dive into the endless dungeons! Start every run with randomly generated levels and discover unpredictable items, unique layouts, events, and challenges
  • Explore 5 unique play styles by selecting different heroes
  • Play standalone runs or experience the full adventure and meta progression in Story Mode
  • Rebuild Haversack Hill and help its inhabitants
  • Turn the village into an appealing and efficient hamlet to attract new residents. Buy and sell items, conduct research, and unlock heroes, challenges, and quests
Enrich your game with mods created by the community
  • Enjoy the game on PC or Steam Deck
  • Play with full controller support

Join our community and share your feedback - our developers visit every day!

creaturesofava.description_text:
Features:
  • Join a young nature explorer, Vic, on her expedition to planet Ava
  • Explore 4 distinct and colorful ecosystems bustling with life
  • Tame over 20 wild creatures with the music of a special flute
  • Meet the naam, Ava’s inhabitants, and learn their unique customs
  • Save the planet’s inhabitants from an infection called “the withering”
  • Help Vic solve the secrets of Ava and her own troubled past
Can you save a life?

Welcome to Creatures of Ava, a unique creature-saver game inviting you to explore a world brimming with wild beings. Instilling joy and wonder, they provide a unique bond that enables you to utilize their skills for traversing the planet and solving environmental challenges. Once peaceful creatures, they now succumb to an unknown infection driving them to behave aggressively, which makes your mission to save them an urgent necessity.

Exploration-driven Gameplay

The gameplay encourages curiosity-driven exploration of its distinct ecosystems—such as the colorful Nari jungle or mysterious Mâruba swamp—creating an interconnected world. With non-aggressive combat mechanics designed for healing rather than defeating and indigenous Flute melodies that you play to tame creatures, the game further highlights the creature-saver nature of the experience.

Meaningful Narrative

Step into the shoes of Vic, a 22-year-old nature adventurer as she navigates through the immersive expedition alongside Tabitha, a composed and astute researcher. Together, you confront the recurring infection—called “the withering” by the local race of Naam—threatening Ava’s inhabitants. The game's narrative, co-created by Rhianna Pratchett, is a journey of wonder and mystery but also discovery, leading to the revelation of the planet's captivating secrets.

Saving Through Understanding

Creatures of Ava is a game featuring a dense, populated world of rich ecosystems filled with creatures that play a vital role in the planet’s natural balance. It goes beyond traditional creature-related genres, offering a deeper understanding and connection with the things you’ll encounter on Ava. Once you come to understand the true meaning of the infection, you will be challenged to step out of the human-centric point of view and learn about the real toll it takes to preserve the primal beauty at the very roots of Ava.

After all, can you save something you don't understand?

hunt_showdown1896-lloronasheir.callout: Based on the Mexican legend of La Llorona. She has earned a fearsome reputation for drowning her victims and haunting the bayou like a vengeful shade.
hunt_showdown1896-lloronasheir.description_text:
This DLC contains one Hunter:

- Llorona's Heir (Hunter)

Llorona’s Heir

Much like the legend whose name she uses, Llorona earned her fearsome reputation by drowning her victims and haunting her enemies. Like a shade, she is fast and subtle, with both gun and knife

hunt_showdown1896-lastgust.callout: A single-weapon DLC. This Winfield was the faithful companion of a legendary hunter named Alison throughout her entire career.
hunt_showdown1896-lastgust.description_text:
This DLC contains one Weapon:

- Last Gust (Ranger 73 Swift)

Last Gust

A faithful companion throughout an illustrious career, Alison's Ranger 73 Swift was reliable to the end and a constant, comforting reminder of the home she left behind when she traveled to Louisiana.

hunt_showdown1896-thelastlaugh.callout: Harlan Grant was a big-game hunter who joined a "Murder Circus" with his pet hyena, Cackle. After Cackle was corrupted and had to be put down, Harlan returned to the hunt for revenge.
hunt_showdown1896-thelastlaugh.description_text:
This DLC contains one Hunter, two Weapons, and one Consumable:

- The Hyena (Hunter)

- Lion’s Roar (Centennial)

- Banner Shot (Pax Trueshot)

- Warm Embrace (Concertina Bomb)

The Hyena

Harlan Grant and his hyena Cackle were inseparable, stars of The Murder Circus. But when the HelioStone arrived, it Corrupted Cackle and Grant had to put his friend down. Now he fights alone against the HelioStone’s minions, carrying the memory of Cackle with him always.

Lion’s Roar

The Ringmaster rescued a lion cub from a failing circus and trained it to jump through flaming hoops. When Corruption struck, the lion turned feral and set itself on fire. The Hyena killed the lion with this rifle to save the crowd.

Banner Shot

Come one, come all! Wield the coveted revolver that once belonged to none other than the infamous Hyena, who dazzled many with its vibrant spectacles of death and grandeur! Perforate your prey with pizazz and try not to cackle at their desperation.

Warm Embrace

Something in an animal’s stare can change the heart of even the cruelest men. This Concertina Bomb was used by Harlan Grant to ensnare a hyena. A glint in the beast’s gaze softened him on the hot savannah, and he turned prey into pet.

A big game hunter who took down every kind of dangerous prey the world had to offer, Harlan Grant was equal parts admired and feared. Much of the fear came from his choice of pet: a snarling spotted hyena named Cackle, who Grant treated like a house cat and who returned Grant’s affection to him alone. Only Grant could control the beast, and they were inseparable. And when a guide told Grant he had killed every creature worth hunting, he put down his guns—temporarily—and joined The Murder Circus. He and Cackle were the stars of the show, or at least they were before the Ringmaster took the HelioStone in. Soon the tendrils of its power reached everywhere, Corrupting everything they touched. Grant stood firm against its influence, but Cackle was not so lucky. Horrified, the big game hunter watched his companion slowly change into something so vile he eventually had to make the call to put Cackle down.

He took up his guns once again. Then, with tears in his eyes, he pulled the trigger and walked away.

Since then, he has rebuffed every effort to recruit him to fight The Murder Circus alongside Post Malone, blaming him for Cackle’s death. But that doesn’t mean he won’t hunt down the circus—or the HelioStone.

hunt_showdown1896-lonelyhowl.callout: Leonel Frisk was raised by wolf hunters and developed an unnatural affinity for violence. He eventually killed the alpha of his pack and now hunts humans with savage instinct.
hunt_showdown1896-lonelyhowl.description_text:
This DLC contains one Hunter, two Weapons, and one Tool:

- Lonely Howl (Hunter)
- Ripper (Pax Claw)
- Stalker's Snarl (Hunting Bow)
- Rawhide (Dusters)

Lonely Howl

An insatiable bloodthirst possessed Leonel Frisk since he first caught its scent. His sanguine dreams and hunger for violence brought him to the Bayou, where he searches for new prey, and fresh blood to spill.

Ripper

Meant to be an heirloom, this Caldwell Pax Claw was modified by Leonel Frisk to rip and tear open the soft necks of forest game – but instead was used by the son against the father in the ultimate act of betrayal.

Stalker’s Snarl

“A predator’s best ally is silence,” thought Leonel Frisk when he crafted this Hunting Bow. Each shot silent as a wolf prowling, it now accompanies him in the Bayou and whispers the death’s song to his prey with each arrow.

Rawhide

Leonel Frisk’s thirst could only be quenched with the rusty taste of blood and the sound of broken bones and cracked skulls. These Dusters ensure each hit fulfills dreams with new and more grotesque scenes of violence.

Beasts skinned to flesh and bone, the stench of boiling innards, and the rusty smell of blood dripping from the veins cut clean were the first images burned into Leonel Frisk’s young mind, and they awoke something terrible in him: An unnatural affinity for violence. Son to revered wolf hunters in Kansas, he watched his mother and father stalk, hunt, and gut the beasts in front of his infant eyes. With each prey brought to the slaughterhouse they called home, the red haze grew and clouded his mind with sanguine dreams. When he held his first small game in crimson hands under the silvery light of the full moon, wolves howled as if to celebrate his rite of passage, unaware of the unholy bloodthirst burning in his heart, and ignorant of the bloodshed he’d bring upon them.

It was the wolves – not his father – who taught Frisk how to hunt. Envious of their savage nature and hunting prowess, Frisk wanted to prove his worth by taking down the alpha wolf with the Caldwell Pax his father gave him. Successful, he adorned himself with the alpha’s skin, and his Caldwell with the fang ripped bloody from its maw and tried to stab his own father in the heart. He would become the mightiest predator in his territory.

But in spite of besting the forest’s alpha, he could not best his father, and so Frisk disappeared in the night, taking only his father’s Caldwell and a Hunting Bow. His bloodlust led him to Louisiana, where he continued hunting, ignorant of the shadows tracking his every move; shadows Hunters in the Bayou would later come to know as Dire Wolf and Luna Wolf; shadows he had once called mother and father. Like a lone wolf, he listened to his instincts and left one pack for another, forgetting his human nature and his father’s words: “A wolf that leaves its pack becomes a threat.

hunt_showdown1896fearthereaper.callout: Focuses on Claeg Grey, a man losing his memory whose only tether to reality is taking lives. His family sent him to the Bayou to "reap" death freely.
hunt_showdown1896fearthereaper.description_text:
This DLC contains one Hunter, two Weapons, and one Tool:

- The Reaper (Hunter)
- Quietus (Specter 1882 Shorty)
- Memento Mori (Centennial)
- The Scythe (Throwing Axes)

The Reaper
Claeg Grey’s memory was leaving him. As his mind drifted and became blank, there was one thing that brought him back: Taking someone’s life. Desperate to keep him alive, Claeg’s family sent him to DeSalle where he could freely reap death.

Quietus
After a month or so of success in the Hunt, Emma encouraged Claeg by gifting him a Specter 1882 Compact that she felt fit his new image: Tarnished but powerful. Sullied yet divine.

Memento Mori
Every bullet has weight and meaning in the chamber of this Winfield M1876 Centennial, and somehow Claeg still knows the importance of each. Though shooting it brings relief, it also brings loss of life, and despair.

The Scythe
Claeg’s childhood friend Jim Mathis stayed by his side even as the Reaper’s memories began to fade. He was devastated when he realized he was using a Throwing Axe to reap his friend’s throat instead of crops.

Claeg Grey donned the mask and robe not for himself, but for the sake of his family. The first time Claeg realized something was wrong was when he went out on an errand for his wife Emma. He kissed her goodbye and mounted his horse to ride into town, but when he blinked once again, he was five miles away from home and his horse lay bleeding from its throat. He walked all the way back home covered in blood to meet the panicked tears of his wife, children, and friends.

From then on, it took Claeg every fiber of his being to concentrate even on the smallest task. Doing work on the farm became insurmountable labor, and his children wept in the corners when he mixed up their names and faces. Emma took him to countless doctors who couldn’t give a name to his ailment, but any person of the cloth they met all said the same thing: A demon was slowly taking over Claeg’s body, and he was in dire need of salvation. “The demon is only sated after sacrifice!” The good Christians would wail. “Stop him before it’s too late.”

But the time to stop Claeg never came. And when he awoke one day to his friend’s blood upon his throwing axe, his wails of anguish echoed through the town. It was death that brought Claeg back to life, and so Emma brought him to the man in DeSalle who they knew dealt in death.
And death he dealt. Waking to become himself only when blood caked his hands, and his prey took their last breath. Countless has to die so that he, in a sense, wouldn’t. So that he remembered the reason he lived this torturous existence. So that he could remember the laughs of his children and the touch of his wife. So that no demon could take his place.

Claeg Grey donned the mask and robe not for himself, but for the sake of his family. So that no one would know his true self. So that his loved ones could finally find peace once more. And so that he could find clarity in freely administering death.

hunt_showdown1896-whenshadowsdance.callout: Once a celebrated Ottoman storyteller and soldier, Hayalî (The Shadow Puppeteer) uses his weapons—named after traditional puppets—to turn the battlefield into a dark, twisted play.
hunt_showdown1896-whenshadowsdance.description_text:
This DLC contains one Hunter, two Weapons, and one Tool:

- Hayali (Hunter)
- Karagöz (Springfield 1866)
- Hacivat (Scottfield Swift)
- Lamba (Alert Trip Mines)

Hayalî

Hayalî can be persuaded, on occasion, to spin stories out of light and darkness. These plays feature two men of opposing temperaments: one canny and the other haughty. Hayalî is a master of opposing forces, hunting by enchanting then punishing, puppeteering his foes to their final act.

Karagöz

Karagöz, Hayalî's Sprinfield 1866, carries out his will in the most direct manner: the impulse to deliver death is manifested immediately in a bright flash, giving range to his darkest desires.

Hacivat

Hacivat, Hayalî's Scottfield Model 3 Swift, serves him with decorum. A good friend for when level-headedness is required. For times when killing must be done quickly but with elegance, personally but with sophistication.

Lamba

Lamba, Hayalî's Alert Trip Mine, is made from his uncle's gas lamp that first enchanted him as a child, making joy from shadow. The treasured heirloom was smashed, and Hayalî pieced it into a crude weapon, a story akin to his own.

In the waning night, when shadows dance in firelight, if the dark is devoid of leering eyes, the Shadow Puppeteer can be convinced to do his show. Out comes a threadbare cloth, and the witty Karagöz and haughty Hacivat are introduced. Although Hayalî's translation from Turkish is not quite perfect, even the most solemn Hunter can be made to laugh or cry at the jostling between Karagöz and Hacivat.

Hayalî's life is veiled in tales and riddles—consequences of a mind split in two. Some details are agreed upon. He had once been something of a heroic soldier, apparently known to the Ottoman Sultan himself. Days spent campaigning; nights spent keeping spirits high with his father's shadow plays. Something happened that caused him to flee to America. There, he turned away from bloodshed and tried to make his living by joining travelling shows, despoiled carnivals, and dreaded circuses. This was either not enough, or all too much, and soon he found himself again hunting in the shadows, directing his quarry to its death.

If Hayalî's plays run too long, they become something else altogether in the space between light and darkness. Karagöz and Hacivat’s janky movements become fluid, their speech projects as if they had lungs, their bodies take on depth, and the threadbare cloth breathes with life.

Only then will Karagöz and Hacivat tell a story unheard of in their homeland. The two friends, now something more, suffer misfortune: Hacivat is confined to a cage, either a dark cell or ornate room of the Kafes. Karagöz hatches a plan. The two stage a bloody fight, and both faces are mauled beyond recognition. Making amends, they bandage their wounds, and one leaves confinement while the other stays. Both depart saying Karagöz’s familiar words: May my transgressions be forgiven.

specialeffect.description_text:
Donations to support SpecialEffect are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

SpecialEffect is the only specialised UK-based charity dedicated to helping ALL people with disabilities enjoy video games – from injured soldiers to young disabled people who can’t play any other way, whether they are in a hospital, hospice, rehabilitation centre or at home. Their team not only provides games access assessments and loans but they’re also changing the way the whole WORLD plays through collaboration with developers.

Their rapidly expanding reputation has meant an ever-growing demand for their services including loaning cutting edge control technology such as gaze-controlled computers and specialised controllers.

hunt_showdown1896-louisianalegacy.callout: A weapons-only pack. The Mountain Air features alpine-style engravings, while the Antebellum Wit is a nickel-plated Romero with ivory and gold detailing.
hunt_showdown1896-louisianalegacy.description_text:
The Louisiana Legacy DLC contains two illustrious firearms: Mountain Air and Antebellum Wit.

The Mountain Air is a Vetterli 71 Karabiner that hails from Alpine old country and bears an abstract patterned engraving that at once encapsulates budding dew, fertile valleys; and shearing winds.

Antebellum Wit is a Romero 77 Handcannon that recalls a bygone era’s charm. A nickel-plated barrel and receiver with exquisite gold detailing is tastefully matched with an ivory colored engraved stock. Discrete in size but ostentatious in display.

hunt_showdown1896-therat.callout: Tona Ramirez inherited her father's nickname and a legacy of misfortune. She lives on the wrong side of the law, scavenging and surviving in the mud of the Bayou.
hunt_showdown1896-therat.description_text: There are two kinds of people in the world, those living on the right side of the law, and those living on the wrong. Tona Ramirez was the second kind from birth. When she buried her father in an unmarked grave on the border, she took her inheritance: his nickname and a story of a man robbed of fortune. The Rat seeks that fortune now, and that search is what brought her to Louisiana.

hunt_showdown1896-legendsofthebayou.human_name: Hunt: Showdown  1896 - Legends of the Bayou
hunt_showdown1896-legendsofthebayou.callout: One of the most iconic packs. It features voodoo-themed characters: a prominent New Orleans Voodoo community leader and his devout initiate.
hunt_showdown1896-legendsofthebayou.description_text:
This DLC contains two Hunters, one Weapon, and one Tool:

- The Bone Doctor (Hunter)
- Weird Sister (Hunter)
- Copperhead (Nagant M1895)
- Blood Oath (Knife)


The Bone Doctor

Born in Senegal and brought to New Orleans as a slave, Doctor John was eventually freed and rose to prominence in the New Orleans Voodoo community, leading a chapter of loyal Hunters.

His abilities led to suspicions that he had caused the very plague he fought, though none who spoke against him survived for long.

Weird Sister

Inspired by the healing powers of Voodoo King Doctor John, Cora Beukes became a Voodoo practitioner and was initiated into John's inner circle of devout Hunters.

Copperhead

This Nagant 1895 has taken a beating, but still shines under the grime and mud. A debt of gratitude is owed by gun to owner, for after all these years it is still hunting.

Blood Oath

Jos and Fin McGowan, the infamous Hunter twins, forged two of these knives when they became Hunters, both displaying their oath and monogram.

hunt_showdown1896theconcubine.callout: Alaz was a sister bound by a merchant's cruelty. After slaying her captor with his own knife, she now hunts to avenge her lost sisters, her clothes permanently stained by the blood of her past.
hunt_showdown1896theconcubine.description_text:
This DLC contains one Hunter, two Weapons, and one Tool:

- The Concubine (Hunter)
- Shahmaran (Sparks)
- Sister's Anguish (Hand Crossbow)
- Pride's Death (Heavy Knife)

The Concubine
As Alaz’s reputation grew, her past became a bloody fairytale, her present soaked in blood and mud. She chases a future molded by hatred and vengeance; a future she promised to herself and her lost sisters.

Sister’s Anguish
When Alaz earned her first coin as a free woman, she bought this Hand Crossbow. Adorned with mementos of her fallen sisters, Alaz wields it with their enduring strength.

Shahmaran
The inscription on this Sparks LRR imbues only a worthy wielder with the strength of its namesake, an ancient myth. No wonder it called to Alaz and fell into her hands.

Pride’s Death
The Merchant's Heavy Knife, embedded with the coins of his travels, was just the thing Alaz needed to put the man in his place. Hours of anguish and torture later, the former concubine had her prize.

Alaz’s garments, once bright, patterned, and colorful, now dulled by mud and blood. The stains of which form new filigrees, new intricate inscriptions of death. So too are her stories. Drenched in bloodshed, unrecognizable from their first times told. But they all start the same: a merchant who set sail from an unfamiliar land, sisters bound by twisted fate forced to follow him. The sails limped, the trade winds failed to blow, and the merchant revealed the evil within him. Trapped on still waters, each day of the voyage was marked by new horrors. Alaz witnessed her sisters wither in pain, finding peace only in the cold embrace of the sea. She promised to avenge their misery and unleash the storm.

At the Port of New Orleans, the rich greeted them as they disembarked. A mansion they had dubbed the Sultan’s Palace had been prepared. Food and drinks were plenty, enough to satisfy any gluttonous desire, and melodies from Alaz's homeland joined the rich music in the streets of New Orleans. Debauchery deafened ears and blinded eyes.

It was not long until the wind howled, the port waters boiled, and Alaz prepared herself to greet the merchant in his chamber once again, but with Pride’s Death in her hand. She carefully tore at muscle and flesh, taking his pride, and leaving him bleeding out on his bed. Her dress bloodied, she joined the guests in the main hall to grant them a quick death with the merchant’s precious rifle, Shahmaran.

When the storm died out in the morning, a river of blood gushed out the Sultan’s Palace into the storm-swept streets. The citizens of New Orleans discovered the bodies piled in the hall. And when puzzled minds started asking questions, Alaz had already spent her first bounty on a weapon she dubbed Sister’s Anguish.

specialeffect.description_text:
Donations to support SpecialEffect are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

SpecialEffect is the only specialised UK-based charity dedicated to helping ALL people with disabilities enjoy video games – from injured soldiers to young disabled people who can’t play any other way, whether they are in a hospital, hospice, rehabilitation centre or at home. Their team not only provides games access assessments and loans but they’re also changing the way the whole WORLD plays through collaboration with developers.

Their rapidly expanding reputation has meant an ever-growing demand for their services including loaning cutting edge control technology such as gaze-controlled computers and specialised controllers.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Hunt: Showdown 1896 / Choice Essential DLC Bundle
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Last Gust, Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Lonely Howl, Hunt: Showdown 1896 – The Concubine, Hunt: Showdown 1896 - Llorona’s Heir, Hunt: Showdown 1896 – Fear The Reaper, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb:
Calling all crack-shots, butchering brutes, and handgun heathens—upgrade your Hunt: Showdown 1896 experience with cosmetic content including playable Hunter and equipment skins. This addictively unforgiving extraction shooter drops players into a twisted offshoot of America’s Gilded Age, where unworldly monsters and rival hunters stand between you and a massive payday. Already own the base game from your January Humble Choice purchase? Even better! Save even more dough on the hottest DLC like Fear the Reaper, Lonely Howl, Legends of the Bayou, and much more. Pay what you want for endless hours of exhilarating gameplay and help support Special Effect.

Keys expire. Please redeem keys before February 3rd, 2027.
from_bundle.author: Crytek

basic_data.human_name: Humble Tech Book Bundle: Ultimate Guide to AI APIs by Mammoth
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Want to learn new tech skills? Make your New Year’s resolution a fresh goal that’ll revolutionize your life with the Ultimate Guide to AI APIs Bundle by Mammoth Club. Get serious about the next frontier of technology and make AI a focal point of your 2026 development plan with hot courses like The Self-Hosted AI Handbook – Guidebook to Building Local LLMs and AI-Powered Career Mastery – Transform Your Personal Brand and Job Search. Pay what you want for industry-leading instruction and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase.
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: Accelerate your advancement in AI today
basic_data.description:
Accelerate your advancement in AI today. Want to learn new tech skills? Make your New Year’s resolution a fresh goal that’ll revolutionize your life with the Ultimate Guide to AI APIs Bundle by Mammoth Club. Get serious about the next frontier of technology and make AI a focal point of your 2026 development plan with hot courses like The Self-Hosted AI Handbook – Guidebook to Building Local LLMs and AI-Powered Career Mastery – Transform Your Personal Brand and Job Search. Pay what you want for industry-leading instruction and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase.

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $1,099. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase. Pay $5 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. All of the software in this bundle is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support One Tree Planted. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

self-hostedaihandbook_guidebooktobuildin.human_name: The Self-Hosted AI Handbook - Guidebook to Building Local LLMs
self-hostedaihandbook_guidebooktobuildin.description_text:
Take control of your data and infrastructure. If you're looking to run Large Language Models on your own hardware—whether for privacy, cost savings, or offline capabilities this handbook is your guide.

You'll learn about model quantization, hardware requirements, and tools like Ollama and Llama.cpp. Inside, you'll follow steps to download open-source models, configure them for your specific RAM/GPU setup, and serve them via a local API. Build with total independence from big cloud providers.

audiobookandebook_learnmachinelearningon.human_name: Audiobook and eBook: Learn Machine Learning On The Go
audiobookandebook_learnmachinelearningon.description_text:
Demystify the jargon of AI while you're on the move. This resource strips away the heavy math anxiety and explains the core concepts of machine learning in plain English. You'll learn how models learn, what data preparation actually involves, and how these systems are applied in the real world.

Inside, you'll gain a conceptual understanding of neural networks, supervised vs. unsupervised learning, and the ethics of AI. It’s the perfect primer to listen to before diving into a coding bootcamp or a technical meeting.

reactcodingchallengesforlovableaimastery.human_name: React Coding Challenges for Lovable AI Mastery
reactcodingchallengesforlovableaimastery.description_text:
Sharpen your frontend skills for the AI era. This collection of challenges moves beyond basic React components and asks you to build interfaces that feel alive.

You'll tackle problems related to real-time data streaming, adaptive UI that responds to user intent, and integrating AI-generated content smoothly into the DOM. Inside, you'll work with TypeScript and modern React patterns to solve UX hurdles common in AI applications. It’s hands-on practice that prepares you to build the "Lovable" interfaces that users expect today.

onetreeplanted.description_text:
Donations to support One Tree Planted are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
We are a non-profit focused on global reforestation. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

masteringclaude_apracticalguidetotheanth.human_name: Mastering Claude: A Practical Guide to the Anthropic API
masteringclaude_apracticalguidetotheanth.description_text:
Get to know the specific strengths of Anthropic’s models. This guide walks you through the Claude API, focusing on its large context window and focus on safety and steerability. You'll learn how to prompt Claude effectively for complex analysis, creative writing, and coding tasks.

Inside, you'll build integrations that require long-document understanding and nuanced conversation. If you want to diversify your AI toolkit beyond just one provider, this is the practical manual you need.

learntocodeinpythononthego.human_name: Learn To Code In Python On The Go
learntocodeinpythononthego.description_text:
Pick up Python one small step at a time. Designed for the busy learner, this resource breaks down programming concepts into bite-sized chapters that you can read or listen to whenever you have a spare moment.

You'll move from "Hello World" to understanding functions and loops without feeling overwhelmed. Inside, you'll find practical examples that relate code to real-world tasks, helping you build a mental model of how Python works. It’s the ideal starting point if you’ve always wanted to code but never found the time to sit down for a massive course.

imagegenerationapipocketbook.description_text:
Keep the essential parameters and endpoints for image generation at your fingertips. This concise guide covers the APIs for major image models, helping you understand how to tweak settings like guidance scale, seed, and resolution to get the exact result you want.

Inside, you'll find direct comparisons of different API structures and troubleshooting tips for when images come out looking "weird." It’s the cheat sheet you need when building creative tools.

generatearecurringrevenueempirewithai_bu.human_name: Generate a Recurring Revenue Empire with AI - Build Million Dollar Lovable Apps that Convert
generatearecurringrevenueempirewithai_bu.description_text:
Unlock the power of predictable income with this step-by-step guide to building your own recurring-revenue web app. Start with why recurring revenue models dominate modern business and how you can architect, build, secure, test, and deploy your own subscription platform with confidence. You'll learn the foundations of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, modern ES6+ features, and React’s component patterns before diving into Lovable’s cutting-edge development workflow.

Inside, you'll create subscription products, set up Stripe payments, implement Supabase authentication, add free trials, manage auto-renewal, and display exclusive content to paying users. Using Lovable’s Chat Mode and AI-powered debugging tools, you’ll plan features, generate pricing pages, test your app, and streamline deployment. Don't wait! Read today. Includes free online source code download access and video course with a certificate of completion.

audiobookandebook_learncybersecurityonth.human_name: Audiobook and eBook: Learn Cybersecurity On The Go
audiobookandebook_learncybersecurityonth.description_text:
Stay ahead of digital threats without being glued to a screen. This course breaks down complex security paradigms into digestible audio lessons, perfect for building awareness while you multitask.

You'll explore the mindset of an attacker and the defensive strategies needed to protect personal and enterprise data. Inside, you'll listen to breakdowns of social engineering, encryption basics, network vulnerabilities, and best practices for digital hygiene. It’s essential listening for anyone who wants to understand the security landscape better, anytime, anywhere.

completegenerativeaiengineercookbookfore.human_name: The Complete Generative AI Engineer Cookbook for Everyone: Become a GenAI Specialist with Python
completegenerativeaiengineercookbookfore.description_text:
Stop reinventing the wheel. This cookbook is packed with practical Python recipes for common Generative AI tasks. Whether you need to scrape data for fine-tuning, clean up datasets, or set up a quick inference endpoint, you'll find a code snippet here to get you started.

Inside, you'll find solutions for connecting to various model providers, handling API errors gracefully, and managing local embeddings. It’s a resource designed to sit on your desk (or second monitor) while you build.

aiappdevelopmentwithgemini3inantigravity.human_name: AI App Development with Gemini 3 in Antigravity and Google AI Studio
aiappdevelopmentwithgemini3inantigravity.description_text:
Get hands-on with the latest from Google’s ecosystem. This course walks you through building applications using the Gemini 3 model via Google AI Studio and the Antigravity library. You'll start with the basics of setting up your environment and obtaining credentials, then move quickly into architecting apps that can reason and generate content.

Inside, you’ll learn how to utilize Antigravity’s Python wrappers to streamline your code, manage context windows effectively, and debug model responses. Whether you are building a simple helper bot or a complex analysis tool, this guide helps you get it running.

javascriptinterviewchallenges_corelogica.human_name: JavaScript Interview Challenges: Core Logic & AI Fundamentals
javascriptinterviewchallenges_corelogica.description_text:
Refresh your core JavaScript knowledge with a twist. Instead of just standard DOM manipulation, these challenges test your grasp of the logic needed for modern AI-driven apps. You'll revisit asynchronous programming, closures, and data handling, but applied to contexts like processing API streams or managing state for a chatbot.

Inside, you'll solve problems that require you to write clean, efficient, and bug-free code, the kind that stands up to technical scrutiny during an interview. It’s a great way to ensure your foundational skills are sharp enough for the AI era.

definitivechatbotandgenaiengineerintervi.human_name: Definitive Chatbot and GenAI Engineer Interview Guide
definitivechatbotandgenaiengineerintervi.description_text:
Bridge the gap between running a tutorial code and landing a senior role. This guide isn't just about definitions; it dives into the system design and architectural decisions that hiring managers care about.

You'll review high-level concepts like RAG implementation, vector search optimization, and handling hallucination in production. Inside, you'll find mock interview scenarios, coding challenges focused on LLM integration, and tips for explaining complex AI concepts clearly. It’s your roadmap to proving you can build systems that scale, not just toys that demo well.

multimodalapipocketbook.description_text:
Your quick-reference guide to the world beyond text. As AI models become increasingly multimodal, you need to know how to handle images, audio, and video programmatically.

This pocketbook provides the essential snippets and endpoints for working with major multimodal APIs. Inside, you'll find concise examples for sending image inputs to LLMs, generating speech from text, and processing video content. Keep this handy when you need to add sensory capabilities to your applications fast.

completeguidetowebdevelopmentwithai_buil.human_name: The Complete Guide to Web Development with AI: Build React Apps with Lovable
completeguidetowebdevelopmentwithai_buil.description_text:
Accelerate your web development process significantly. This guide shows you how to pair traditional React knowledge with AI-powered tools like Lovable to ship products in record time.

You'll learn how to describe your desired UI to the AI and then refine the generated code manually for a perfect fit. Inside, you'll walk through the full lifecycle of a web app: from the initial spark of an idea to generating components, hooking up databases, and deploying to the web. It’s about working smarter, not harder.

ai-poweredcareermastery_transformyourper.human_name: AI-Powered Career Mastery - Transform Your Personal Brand and Job Search
ai-poweredcareermastery_transformyourper.description_text:
Stop staring at a blank screen when updating your resume. This guide shows you how to leverage AI tools to craft a compelling personal brand that stands out to recruiters and algorithms alike. You'll learn how to use generative text tools to refine your bio, tailor cover letters for specific roles, and even practice for interviews.

Inside, you’ll find workflows for analyzing job descriptions to find keyword gaps in your profile and strategies for using AI to network more effectively on platforms like LinkedIn. Take control of your career trajectory with a little digital assistance.

completenanobananaaiimageeditingwithgoog.human_name: The Complete Nano Banana AI Image Editing with Google Gemini: Build an Empire with Prompt Templates & Python App Development
completenanobananaaiimageeditingwithgoog.description_text:
Streamline your visual asset creation and editing. This course introduces you to specialized Python workflows (symbolized by the Nano Banana project) to automate image editing tasks using Google Gemini's capabilities. You'll learn how to create reusable prompt templates that ensure consistency across hundreds of images.

Inside, you'll build scripts that can batch-process images, apply stylistic changes programmatically, and generate new visual content on demand. It’s a powerful toolkit for anyone managing media at scale.

buildllm-poweredrobotsinpythonwithgemini.human_name: Build LLM-Powered Robots in Python with Gemini API
buildllm-poweredrobotsinpythonwithgemini.description_text:
Take AI out of the chat window and into the physical (or simulated) world. This course guides you through connecting Python-based robotics logic with the Gemini API to create machines that can "see" and "think." You'll learn how to interpret sensor data using multimodal LLMs and translate natural language commands into motor actions.

Inside, you'll work on projects that involve pathfinding, object recognition, and decision-making loops. It’s a fascinating blend of hardware logic and cognitive software.

aiengineeringwithlangchainapisandhugging.human_name: AI Engineering with LangChain APIs and Hugging Face
aiengineeringwithlangchainapisandhugging.description_text:
Stop building from scratch and start orchestrating. This guide focuses on glueing the pieces together to make something real, showing you how to combine the structural power of LangChain with the vast model repository of Hugging Face. You'll learn how to swap models easily, manage chains of thought, and build robust pipelines.

Inside, you'll create workflows that can summarize documents, chat with data, and perform multi-step reasoning tasks. It’s perfect for developers who want to move beyond simple API calls and start engineering complex, reliable AI systems.

answerengineoptimization_buildappsthatra.human_name: Answer Engine Optimization - Build Apps that Rank in an AI-Driven World
answerengineoptimization_buildappsthatra.description_text:
SEO is evolving, and you need to adapt. This guide explores the emerging field of Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), teaching you how to structure your content and applications so they are easily cited by AI models like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Perplexity.

You'll learn the difference between ranking for a search link and being the direct answer. Inside, you'll discover schema strategies, content formatting techniques, and API integration methods that increase the likelihood of your app being "recommended" by AI agents. Future-proof your digital presence today.

aiappbackendcodingchallengeswithnode.human_name: AI App Backend Coding Challenges with Node
aiappbackendcodingchallengeswithnode.description_text:
Scale your server-side skills for the intelligence age. While you likely know your way around an event loop, this collection challenges you to build backends capable of handling the unique demands of AI traffic.

You'll tackle problems focused on optimizing throughput for heavy model requests, managing API keys securely, and structuring architecture that won't buckle under load. Inside, you'll work through scenarios involving rate limiting, efficient data sanitation for prompts, and integrating vector databases with Node.js. It’s a practical way to ensure your JavaScript backend is as smart as the AI models it serves.

completegpt-5appdevelopmentandpromptengi.human_name: The Complete GPT-5 App Development & Prompt Engineering Cookbook: Master AI with ChatGPT 5
completegpt-5appdevelopmentandpromptengi.description_text:
Prepare your development workflow for the next generation of LLMs. While focusing on the latest available tools, this guide teaches you forward-thinking strategies for prompt engineering and app architecture that will scale as models get smarter.

You'll learn how to structure prompts that reduce ambiguity and improve reasoning. Inside, you'll explore advanced techniques like chain-of-thought prompting, self-consistency checks, and creating dynamic system instructions. Stay ahead of the curve by mastering the art of talking to the most advanced models.

audiobookandebook_learncomputerscienceon.human_name: Audiobook and eBook: Learn Computer Science on the Go
audiobookandebook_learncomputerscienceon.description_text:
Squeeze fundamental learning into your busy day. This dual-format resource is designed to help you grasp the bedrock concepts of computing from algorithms to system architecture—without needing to sit at a desk.

Whether you're driving, exercising, or doing chores, you can absorb the logic that powers modern software. Inside, you get clear, spoken explanations of how computers process data, how networks communicate, and how software is engineered. It’s a friction-free way to fill the gaps in your knowledge base or refresh concepts you haven't touched in years.

unitycodebasecollection_gamedevelopmentt.human_name: Unity Codebase Collection - Game Development Templates

godot4templatebundle_gamedevelopment2-pa.description_text:

Whether you need a quick prototype or a learning resource to see how the pros structure their code, these assets let you skip the setup. Save hours of dev time, grab the vault now.

first-person3dcontrollertemplateingodot4.description_text:
This First-Person Controller template for Godot 4 provides everything you need to get your 3D game up and running in minutes. Built with clean, well-documented GDScript, it features smooth WASD movement with acceleration and deceleration, responsive jumping mechanics, a fully functional sprint system, and toggle crouch with automatic ceiling detection. The mouse-look system includes vertical angle clamping and optional head bobbing for added immersion. All parameters are exposed through Godot's Inspector, making it incredibly easy to customize without diving into code. The template uses CharacterBody3D for predictable, game-like physics and includes a complete test level with platforms, walls, and obstacles so you can immediately see all features in action.

Whether you're a beginner learning game development, an intermediate developer wanting to skip the basics, or an experienced programmer needing a solid foundation for rapid prototyping, this template has you covered.

makeaminimalist2dgeometrysurvivalgameing.human_name: Make a Minimalist 2D Geometry Survival Game in Godot 4.6 - From Scratch
makeaminimalist2dgeometrysurvivalgameing.description_text:
Prove that gameplay is king. In this hands-on project, you will build a fast-paced shape-dodging game entirely from code, no art assets required. It’s the perfect way to master the logic behind the engine. You will cover:

Drawing dynamic shapes and animations using Polygon2D.

Controlling physics, rotation, and input via script.

Handling collisions and smooth tweening transitions.

Master the essentials of Godot’s 2D engine by building a fun, complete game using pure logic and geometry. Forget the art assets—build your game with code.

basicdefender2d-stylegameingodot46.human_name: Basic 2D Defender-Style Game Template in Godot 4.6
basicdefender2d-stylegameingodot46.description_text:
Designed for both beginners and intermediate Godot users, this project walks you through every system that powers a fast-paced arcade shooter — from smooth player controls and AI-driven enemies to wave spawning, scoring, and UI design.

You’ll explore key mechanics such as 8-directional movement, world wraparound scrolling, and progressive enemy waves with four unique AI types: Basic, Sine Wave, Hunter, and Bomber. Along the way, you’ll learn to manage collisions, health, and scoring, while customizing difficulty and visuals through easily tweakable export variables.

The project also features enhanced UI screens — including a polished main menu with Start, How to Play, and Quit options, plus a Game Over screen with retry and score display. Each system is modular, clearly commented, and designed for effortless modification, letting you expand it with new weapons, power-ups, or enemies.

Perfect for learning Godot’s 2D workflow, this template gives you a complete, professional-quality starting point for building your own side-scrolling shooters.

Create assets that have depth and texture, perfect for game assets or concept art, without opening modeling software. Create stunning 3D assets without opening Blender.

buildimagegenerationaifromscratchwithpyt.human_name: Build Image Generation AI from Scratch with Python, Keras and TensorFlow Diffusion
buildimagegenerationaifromscratchwithpyt.description_text:

You’ll build:

If you want to control generation parameters and truly understand the architecture decisions powering modern AI art, this is the hands-on experience you need. Start coding your own image generator now.

match-3gametemplateingodot46.description_text:
A match-3 puzzle game with swap mechanics, special pieces, combo system, and progressive difficulty. Players swap colored pieces on an 8×8 grid to create matches of three or more, earning points through strategic combos and activating powerful special pieces including striped pieces, bombs, and color bombs with explosive clearing effects.

This template includes 10+ files with 600+ lines of GDScript, featuring an 8×8 grid system with 6 vibrant piece colors, 3 special piece types with unique activation effects, click-to-select controls with visual feedback, and a complete main menu with tutorial overlay.

buildingvoice-drivenappswithgemini.description_text:
Make your applications listen and speak. This guide covers implementing natural language processing and voice input using Gemini so your users can go hands-free.

You’ll set up:

  • Speech-to-text integration pipelines.
  • Direct connections between voice commands and app functions.
  • Natural conversational flows for better UX.

Learn the best practices for handling audio input and turning a standard app into a voice-enabled experience. Upgrade your user experience with voice controls today.

seamlesscinematics-to-gameplay_sequencer.human_name: Seamless Cinematics-to-Gameplay: Sequencer, Possession & Camera Cuts in Unreal 5.7

basicenemyaicontroller_lineofsightdetect.human_name: Basic Enemy AI Controller - Line of Sight Detection in Godot 4.6
basicenemyaicontroller_lineofsightdetect.description_text:
This Enemy AI system provides game developers with a complete, modular solution for implementing intelligent enemy behavior in 3D action games. Built on a clean Finite State Machine architecture, it features three core states: patrol (waypoint-based movement), chase (player pursuit with line-of-sight tracking), and attack (range-based combat with cooldown system).

The AI uses sophisticated detection combining distance checks, configurable field-of-view angles, and raycast-based line-of-sight verification to create realistic awareness. Every parameter is exposed in Godot's inspector for easy tweaking, from movement speeds and detection ranges to attack cooldowns and lost-player timeouts, making it effortless to create anything from stealthy guards to aggressive hunters without touching code.

Designed for maximum flexibility and ease of use, this template includes comprehensive documentation, a fully functional test scene, and clean, heavily-commented GDScript code that serves as both a working system and a learning resource.

checkers3d_strategicboardgametemplatewit.human_name: Checkers 3D: Strategic Board Game Template with AI in Godot 4.6

Players compete to capture opponent pieces or block their moves through strategic positioning, with optional captures allowing tactical depth beyond traditional forced-jump rules. Features a professional wooden checkerboard with realistic materials, clear visual indicators (flat circles for selection and valid moves), and a challenging AI opponent that prioritizes captures, promotions, and board control.

This template includes 24 interactive pieces with collision detection, AI decision system with move evaluation, persistent score tracking across games, match history, and two game modes (Player vs Player and Player vs AI). Features clean architecture with separated game logic, raycasting-based input, comprehensive move validation, and full documentation. Perfect for learning board game AI implementation, 3D click interaction, and turn-based strategy mechanics. Easily customizable for rule variants (International, Russian checkers), difficulty levels, and online multiplayer.

This template includes 44 files with 1,309 lines of GDScript, featuring 20 customizable inventory slots, 8 equipment slots (Head, Chest, Weapon, Shield, etc.), drag-and-drop with split-stacking, rarity-colored borders, and both 2D/3D world item pickups. 10gameuikitsbundle_horrorsci-fimilitaryr.human_name: 10 Game UI Kits Bundle: Horror, Sci-Fi, Military, Racing, Mechs and Environments
10gameuikitsbundle_horrorsci-fimilitaryr.description_text:
Populate your worlds instantly. This 10-pack bundle equips your Unreal 5.7 library with quality assets for almost any genre. The collection includes:

  • Environments: Post-apocalyptic biomes, horror carnivals, and neon cities.
  • Models: Military gear, mechs, street racing cars, and props.
  • UI Kits: A 'Doomsday' dashboard kit.

Whether you're building a horror game, a shooter, or a sci-fi epic, you’ll have the props to make it look professional. Fill your empty scenes with professional assets today.

buildgenaiwithtransformernlpdeeplearning.human_name: Build GenAI with Transformer NLP Deep Learning, TensorFlow Keras and Python
buildgenaiwithtransformernlpdeeplearning.description_text:
Don't just use LLMs - understand the engine that powers them. This course guides you through building generative AI models using transformer architecture, TensorFlow, and Keras. You'll move past the theory and get your hands on the code.

  • Train transformer models from scratch using Python.
  • Implement attention mechanisms and deep learning techniques.
  • Fine-tune pre-trained models for real-world tasks.

From mathematical foundations to deploying working NLP solutions, you’ll gain the technical confidence to build your own text generation systems. Join the course and master the math behind the magic.

appdevelopmentwithgoogleaistudio_buildmi.human_name: App Development with Google AI Studio - Build Mind-Blowing Projects
appdevelopmentwithgoogleaistudio_buildmi.description_text:
Turn your ideas into deployed AI applications. This course focuses on the Google AI Studio development platform, teaching you how to integrate Gemini models properly.

You will learn to:

  • Handle multimodal inputs (text, image, audio).
  • Implement responsive chat interfaces.
  • Structure prompts specifically for app logic.

We focus on the full lifecycle: project setup, API integration, and UI design. Turn your AI idea into a working app, start here.

epicdeveloperassistantinunreal57_buildfa.human_name: Epic Developer Assistant in Unreal 5.7: Build Faster with AI + Prompt Examples
epicdeveloperassistantinunreal57_buildfa.description_text:
Code faster with an AI wingman. This course cuts through the hype and shows you exactly how to use Epic's Developer Assistant to speed up your actual development. You’ll gain a clear understanding of:

  • Practical prompting techniques for Blueprints and C++.
  • The current limitations, what it can do, and where it falls short.
  • How to integrate the assistant into level design workflows.

Whether you are testing the preview or preparing for production, learn how to make the AI work for you, not against you. Future-proof your workflow with AI assistance.

completeinfluencercampaignblueprint.description_text:
Scale your brand through the power of influence. This course takes you from 'Influencer 101' to running high-ROI campaigns. Stop guessing and start strategizing with a clear roadmap. You will learn:

  • Sourcing: Where to find and how to evaluate the right partners.
  • Pitching: How to approach influencers like a pro.
  • Scaling: Measuring ROI and doubling down on what works.

Avoid bad deals and wasted budget. Learn to co-create campaigns that actually drive sales. Launch your first winning influencer campaign.

littlefreelibrary.description_text:
Donations to support Little Free Library are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
Little Free Library is a nonprofit organization based in St. Paul, Minnesota. Our mission is to be a catalyst for building community, inspiring readers, and expanding book access for all through a global network of volunteer-led Little Free Library book-exchange boxes.

Our vision is a Little Free Library in every community and a book for every reader. We believe all people are empowered when the opportunity to discover a personally relevant book to read is not limited by time, space, or privilege.

Little Free Library grants no-cost book-sharing boxes and books to under-resourced communities through our signature initiatives Impact Library Program, Indigenous Library Program, and Read in Color.

gettingstartedwithgodot46_editorandscrip.human_name: Getting Started with Godot 4.6: Editor & Scripting Foundations
gettingstartedwithgodot46_editorandscrip.description_text:
Conquer the learning curve. We start with a guided tour of the Godot Editor to get you comfortable, then dive immediately into the fundamentals of GDScript. You won't just watch; you'll do. We cover:

  • Scene organization and Node hierarchies.
  • Variables, functions, and annotations like @export.
  • Handling player input with practical examples.

Each lecture includes code-based exercises to lock in your knowledge, giving you the confidence to tackle any Godot course or project. Build your development foundation now.

animationfundamentals_masterkeyframingbl.human_name: Animation Fundamentals: Keyframing, Blendspaces & Sequencer in Unreal 5.7
animationfundamentals_masterkeyframingbl.description_text:
Stop settling for stiff, robotic characters. This course breaks down the building blocks of Unreal’s animation system, teaching you exactly how to give your characters natural, fluid movement. You will learn to:

  • Create and edit animations that control multiple body parts.
  • Master Blendspaces to smooth out transitions between actions.
  • Implement Animation Blueprints for total character control.

By the end, you’ll have the skills to take any static model and make it breathe, move, and react dynamically. Bring your characters to life, start animating now.

basicthird-person3dcharactertemplateingo.human_name: Basic Third-Person 3D Character Template in Godot 4.6
basicthird-person3dcharactertemplateingo.description_text:
Third-Person Character Controller is a functional Godot 4.6 project template of a modern 3D adventure/platformer game with orbit camera, WASD movement, double jumping, sprint mechanics, and basic attack output. It's structured as a clean, modular learning asset ideal for students who want to understand 3D character control, camera management, collision detection, enemy AI systems, and third-person game mechanics.

The project includes dedicated scripts for player control (player_controller.gd), camera management (orbit_camera.gd), enemy behavior (enemy.gd), and UI systems (game_ui.gd). All game entities use simple geometric shapes with proper collision layers for easy customization. The template demonstrates best practices for smooth character movement, camera collision avoidance, state machines, input buffering, and modular script architecture.

basic2dplatformerstartertemplateingodot4.description_text:
A 2D platformer starter project for Godot 4.6 with classic Mario-style physics and all core mechanics working out of the box. This template includes floaty jump physics with variable height, enemy stomping mechanics, coin collection, a lives system, countdown timer, and complete UI (HUD, pause menu, game over screen). Two fully playable demo levels showcase the tilemap system, enemy AI, and level progression. Every script is heavily commented with over 800 lines of documentation explaining not just what the code does, but why it works that way.

Built for developers who want to skip the tedious setup and jump straight into creating gameplay. The modular architecture makes it easy to customize - adjust movement speed, jump height, and physics behavior through simple Inspector values, or extend the system with your own features. Perfect for beginners learning 2D game development, game jam participants needing a solid foundation, or experienced developers who want a reliable starting point. Pure GDScript with no dependencies, no plugins, and no complicated setup - just extract, import into Godot, and press F5 to play. Includes everything you need to start building your own 2D platformer today.

facedetectionandimageunderstandingwithpy.human_name: Face Detection and Image Understanding with Python and OpenCV
facedetectionandimageunderstandingwithpy.description_text:
Learn the logic behind facial recognition. Using Python and OpenCV, you’ll build systems that can locate faces in images and extract visual information.

We’ll cover:

  • OpenCV's specific face detection algorithms.
  • Image preprocessing techniques for accuracy.
  • Extracting and classifying facial features.

By the end, you’ll have a working pipeline for image analysis and a solid grasp of computer vision fundamentals. Get the skills to build smart security systems.

littlefreelibrary.description_text:
Donations to support Little Free Library are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
Little Free Library is a nonprofit organization based in St. Paul, Minnesota. Our mission is to be a catalyst for building community, inspiring readers, and expanding book access for all through a global network of volunteer-led Little Free Library book-exchange boxes.

Our vision is a Little Free Library in every community and a book for every reader. We believe all people are empowered when the opportunity to discover a personally relevant book to read is not limited by time, space, or privilege.

Little Free Library grants no-cost book-sharing boxes and books to under-resourced communities through our signature initiatives Impact Library Program, Indigenous Library Program, and Read in Color.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: The Complete 2026 Coding, AI, and GameDev Everything Bundle
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: The complete 2026 coding and AI collection
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Python App and Game 3-Pack Bundle, Match-3 Game Template in Godot 4.6, 3D Modeling Prompt Collection for AI Art, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Get The Complete 2026 Coding, AI, and GameDev Everything Bundle and discover what possibilities await you within these red-hot fields. This curated collection of industry-standard courses from Mammoth Club, like Multiplayer Lobby with Chat – Godot 4.6 3D Game Template and Animation Fundamentals: Keyframing, Blendspaces & Sequencer in Unreal 5.7, lays the groundwork for you to learn the fundamentals. Gain the expert-led instruction and knowledge you need to succeed, and help support Little Free Library when you upgrade your skill sets with Humble.
from_bundle.author: Mammoth Interactive

basic_data.human_name: Humble Comics Bundle: Lone Wolf & Cub and Other Manga Classics by Koike ENCORE by Dark Horse
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Discover the sprawling, epic story of a swordsman and his son in our popular Lone Wolf and Cub bundle from Dark Horse Comics—back again for a limited time! This formative 1970s’ manga series, written by the brilliant Kazuo Koike and featuring the breathtaking visuals of Goseki Kojima, is widely regarded as one of the most influential works of graphic fiction ever created, inspiring countless storytellers, artists, and filmmakers across Japan and beyond. Read these and other classic Koike series like Crying Freeman and Lady Snowblood, and help support the Hero Initiative too.
basic_data.description:
Formative manga curated for you. Discover the sprawling, epic story of a swordsman and his son in our popular Lone Wolf and Cub bundle from Dark Horse Comics—back again for a limited time! This formative 1970s’ manga series, written by the brilliant Kazuo Koike and featuring the breathtaking visuals of Goseki Kojima, is widely regarded as one of the most influential works of graphic fiction ever created, inspiring countless storytellers, artists, and filmmakers across Japan and beyond. Read these and other classic Koike series like Crying Freeman and Lady Snowblood, and help support the Hero Initiative too.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $420. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support Hero Initiative. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

lonewolfandcub_vol4.human_name: Lone Wolf and Cub Vol. 4: The Bell Warden
lonewolfandcub_vol4.description_text:
Dark Horse continues its presentation of the entirety of Japan's Lone Wolf and Cub, one of the unquestioned landmarks of graphic fiction, packaged in the digest format preferred by creator Goseki Kojima. The fourth volume of this ambitious monthly program collects four classic Lone Wolf tales, including one never before seen in America, where little Daigoro searches for his lost father while amazing a well-known samurai with his warrior's eyes and cool demeanor. Also, the Lone Wolf takes on the sons of the war-bell warden, legions of organized crime bosses, and a mysterious tattooed lady with a dark story and impeccable killing skills. It's bloody and romantic...and among the best the comics medium has to offer.

This volume contains the following stories:

The Bell Warden

Unfaithful Retainers

Parting Frost

Performer

lonewolfandcub_vol5.human_name: Lone Wolf and Cub Vol. 5: Black Wind
lonewolfandcub_vol5.description_text:
This volume contains five powerful, classic tales of the assassin Itto Ogami, the Lone Wolf, as he continues his journey to hell. The Yagyu clan, fearful of the growing legend surrounding Lone Wolf, has decided to protect itself by sending its own assassin after him, and later pit the greatest swordsman of a rival clan against him. Also, Lone Wolf must face the leader of a bounty-hunting gang who seeks revenge against Ogami for slaying his young lord years ago, and a master gunsmith who values the art of warfare above all else and will change his life forever. Don't miss a single volume of the acclaimed epic series that belongs on every bookshelf: Lone Wolf and Cub.

This volume contains the following stories:

Trail Markers

Executioner's Hill

Black Wind

Decapitator Asemon

The Guns of Sakai

pathoftheassassin_vol4.description_text: War! Ninjas! Love! Political intrigue! It's all packed into Path of the Assassin. Drafted by classic samurai manga creators Kazuo Koike and Goseki Kojima of Lone Wolf and Cub fame, Path of the Assassin is the story of a young shogun on his way to unite Japan, and the trusty ninja assigned to protect him. Be it in crafty maneuverings of war, political push and pull, or bedroom adventures, young Hattori Hanzo will not be kept from his duties.

lonewolfandcub_vol7.human_name: Lone Wolf and Cub Vol. 7: Cloud Dragon, Wind Tiger
lonewolfandcub_vol7.description_text:
There is more than just blood between parent and child. Itto Ogami and his son Daigoro have seen more blood flowing from more bodies than anyone in Edo, but what connects them is their spirit and path. In this collection of classic stories, Itto must protect a young girl after her family is destroyed by a cunning courtesan. Meanwhile, Itto's arch-enemy, Yagyu Retsudo, has sent the civilian police force to round up the Lone Wolf as a common criminal, and before long, Daigoro is coincidentally tangled in a messy pair of crimes. And, most dramatically, Itto returns to the scene of one of his past executions to enter a tender and honorable sword fight against an executed lord's former retainer.

This volume contains the following stories:

Dragnet

Night Stalker

Cloud Dragon, Wind Tiger

Inn of the Last Chrysanthemum

Penal Code Article Seventy-Nine

pathoftheassassin_vol1.human_name: Path of the Assassin Vol. 1: Serving in the Dark
pathoftheassassin_vol1.description_text:
Path of the Assassin, called Hanzo no Mon in Japan, is the story of Hattori Hanzo, the fabled master ninja whose duty it was to protect Tokugawa Ieyasu. Ieyasu was the shogun who would unite Japan into one great nation. But before he could do that, he had to grow up and learn how to love the ladies!

As the secret caretaker of such an influential future leader, not only does Hanzo use vast and varied ninja talents, but in living closely with Ieyasu, he forms a close friendship with the young shogun.

• Published in original Japanese format and unretouched which keeps the art intact.

• This is a fifteen-volume story starring the legendary ninja and Kill Bill reference Hattori Hanzo.

• Each volume comes shrink-wrapped and carries an 18+ content advisory.

FOR MATURE READERS

pathoftheassassin_vol2.description_text:
It's not easy being Hattori Hanzo. If he's not teaching Leyasu, the young, future shogun, how to love, then he's behind the scenes, teaching Leyasu how not to die in case of a momentary lapse of protection. If you thought you had a tough job, try taking a pudgy, protected youngster, and making him into the leader who will unite Japan under his single rule. From the creators of Lone Wolf & Cub comes a series about two young men bound to a nation's potential future at a time when Japan was in transition from a warlike feudal state into an era of bureacracy and infighting. Another quasi-historical tale from the masters of Japanese samurai culture, Path of the Assassin shows a side of feudal Japan that entertains with action as well as political drama.

FOR MATURE READERS.

lonewolfandcub_vol3.human_name: Lone Wolf and Cub Vol. 3: The Flute of The Fallen Tiger
lonewolfandcub_vol3.description_text:
Join renegade samurai Itto Ogami and his infant son, Daigoro, in five more adventures on the dark road to Hell. What do three mysterious Shogunate assassins, a street entertainer, and the crests of the dead have in common? "The Baby Cart Wolf" continues his dealing of death for gold and encounters one ronin who is bent on putting a stop to his journey. Will he succeed? Follow the monthly adventures of Lone Wolf and Cub, one of the true classics of comics literature, available in America for the first time in over a decade!

This volume contains the following stories:

The Flute of the Fallen Tiger

Half Mat, One Mat, A Fistful of Rice

The White Path Between the Rivers

The Virgin and the Whore

Close Quarters

pathoftheassassinvolume13_hatefulburden.human_name: Path of the Assassin Vol. 13: Hateful Burden
pathoftheassassinvolume13_hatefulburden.description_text: In the politics, struggles, and battles that lead to the birth of a nation, sometimes even good people must die at the hands of allies. And now it's down to only a few warlords of Edo-era Japan. History already tells the story of the victor, but the real guts of Path of the Assassin lie in the characters behind the scenes--the ninja warriors doing the dirty work. Theirs is a story of families and war and intrigue, only far more mysterious and untold.

colorofrage.description_text: Two slaves free themselves from a slave ship, one a Japanese man, the other an African American. After escaping they find themselves on the shore of Edo-era Japan, a society with a strong caste system, isolated from the world. How will the Japanese people perceive this giant black man, how will they survive? But first things first, how will they get these shackles off their feet?
